author: {'steamid': '76561198068169042', 'num_games_owned': 1435, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 629, 'last_played': 1672508197}
review: It's a beautiful game with an emphasis on emotional portrayal of the characters. There are Point&click puzzles but there is a lot of talking and it is not possible to skip the video conversation or sequences. It is really nice but only for the first pass through the game. I can probably say that this game is a combination of an interactive movie and point&click. Video sequences are in high quality and I really like them. But not in the second pass. Not sure if 3D is an advantage but it is made in high quality and it was nice to play that way.

author: {'steamid': '76561199101146858', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1672226664}
review:
挺意识流的叙事，买之前看到有人评论说玩不懂剧情，但我却觉得很有意思。结局挺欧亨利，我难受了好久才缓过来，感觉真的是以最童真的视角讲着最残酷的战争。音乐也很棒，视听盛宴可以说是（不过美术在我个人喜欢与不喜欢之间来回蹦迪哈哈）
不过也有我不喜欢的地方，感觉结尾的地方还是有些仓促了，比如兄妹本来在船上的，妹妹做了个梦和斑斑一起上天飞了一圈怎么下来就到海岸了？可能是一种我不太理解的意识流转场。然后再一点就是最后妹妹从被假女王蛊惑以及为诺亚感到伤心到砸镜子的转变也太坚定和快了吧，有点出戏。但结局还算让我满意。总体还是很棒的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198015275441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1672063731}
review: Silence is breathtakingly gorgeous. It is a sequel to The Whispered World, but it plays quite differently. Whispered World is 2d and focuses a lot on puzzles. Silence is 3d, and while there are plenty of puzzles, the focus is more on the characters. I can understand some people might not like that, but I thought it was fine. I made it through without needing help with the puzzles, so I guess that means Silence is a bit easier than its predecessor. Silence can stand on its own, but playing Whispered World first will provide a lot of helpful context and understanding. Overall, it is a great story and solid point & click adventure with incredible visuals.

author: {'steamid': '76561198807646530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1671896829}
review: j'ai beaucoup apprécié, ce jeu est accessible et pas compliqué. C'est également un très beau jeu

author: {'steamid': '76561199110919698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 478, 'last_played': 1671818730}
review: Un de jeux les plus beaux auquel j'ai pu jouer! Graphiquement c'est superbe, décors et personnages sont tous travaillés comme des tableaux, les effets de couleurs sont magnifiques avec la profondeur de champs: un des plus beaux jeux d'aventure qui existe. Ca aurait pu être parfait si le gameplay suivait mais il faut reconnaître que pour un point & click c'est pas la perfection: on ne comprend pas où veulent en venir les développeurs dans certains situations vu qu'on n' a pas à utiliser les objets car pas d'inventaire. Mais ceci ne fait pas de Silence un mauvais jeu, on rattrape la situation avec une petite soluce pour débloquer l'aventure, le jeu n'est pas difficile puisqu'il cible un public jeune c'est juste que quand on est bloqué on l'est pour de bon. Une belle aventure dans le monde de rêves de Sadwick, ceux qui n'ont pas accroché à "the whispered world" comme moi ne passez pas à côté de Silence qui même s'il reprend les mêmes personnages n'est pas comparable dans sa réalisation bien au dessus à tous les niveaux et la grosse différence c'est que le premier épisode était essentiellement réservé aux enfants alors que Silence cible un public de tout age. 15/20

author: {'steamid': '76561199167275883', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1671874816}
review: Kupno tej gry było wyborem spontanicznym, jechałem własnie do cexa (lombard z grą i elektroniką) aby zwrócić źle dopasowany ram i poprosić o wymianę na inny. Aby nie jechać na marne tylko po głupi ram poprosiłem o pokazanie gry zza lady i po sprawdzeniu wymagań systemowych i po przyjrzeniu się ślicznemu pudełkowi z plakatem i artbookiem postanowiłem kupić ją za ostatnie 20 zł. Po powrocie do domu odłożyłem pudełko na półkę i o nim zapomniałem, Teraz dwa dni po zakupie zauważyłem ze jest ona na promocji na steamie z 71 zł na 11. To mnie zmotywowało do instalacji gry i spróbowania w niej swoich sił. Dawno nie grałem w gry point and click. Ostatnim razem grałem około 4 lata temu w Teenagent ale jakoś los nie pokazał mi abym powrócił do owych gier, aż do teraz. Gra ma śliczną oprawę graficzną, a mówię to grając na najniższych by mi w ogóle działała. Dużo osób może powiedzieć że modele postaci są przestarzałe, ja za to twierdze że mają one swój klimat, piękny klimat. Historia jest urocza i jednocześnie ponura, w głównych postaciach zakochujemy się od razu. Kocham tą grę i nie mogę się doczekać aby jutro po skończonych obowiązkach usiąść wieczorem i dalej w nią grać. Okazuje się że jest to druga część z serii lecz w pierwszą nie grałem a chyba rozumiem co się dzieje. Na koniec dodam że jako wielki skąpiec spodziewałem się że będę zły na zakup za 20zł zamiast za 11 lecz nie żałuje, nie żałował bym nawet tych 70zł z początkowej ceny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122725919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1670946493}
review: Ho iniziato questo senza sapere fosse il successore di The Whispered World e senza nemmeno conoscerne il genere. Inizialmente ero un po combattuto se continuarlo o disinstallarlo, per fortuna ho deciso di continuarlo ed addirittura ho acquistato il predecessore. Che dire, un gioco con enigmi alla portata di tutti che si evolve in un mondo immaginario molto colorato e ben curato nei dettagli. La trama è davvero molto carina ma avrei aggiunto un ulteriore finale che avrebbe fatto felici i tanti romantici come me. Consigliatissimo

review:
와 명작이네요 20000원이 아깝지 않은데 2000원으로 이런 명작을 봐서그런지 더 뭉클해요
초반에 자신의 꿈인줄 알았던 노아가 자신의 꿈이 아닌 여동생이 꿈의 주인이라고 하자마자 시무룩해져서 역할 바뀐게 좀 슬프면서도 귀여웠는데 애초에 노아(오빠) 가 여동생한테 이야기를 들려줄정도면 여동생이 태어나기전에 한번 경험했었던 삶과 죽음의 경계선에 대한 이야기네요 근데 여동생이라고 하는 이 게임의 주인공도 주워온 동생이 아닌가 추측을 크흠

author: {'steamid': '76561198818937225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1674730456}
review: 这款游戏虽然偏向童话故事风格，但是又有一种文学的艺术美，一种暗示和隐喻贯穿了童话故事故事，童话内容暗指妹妹的想象，再加上昏迷前，哥哥所讲的故事，有种弗洛伊德《释梦》里面提到的梦里的事情是曾经发生过的事情，或者某种精神需求。哥哥在妹妹心里是一个最美丽的小丑，虽然不是幸存者，却是用生命去保护妹妹，为了妹妹甚至割舍掉人性的善良，抛弃胆怯。但是这样感觉反对战争这一块有点不够凸显。算是一部不错的作品。下次努力哦。

author: {'steamid': '76561199169039437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 691, 'last_played': 1670247314}
review: 剧情不错，需要动点脑子，很难全成就需要一定的耐心，前期较为无聊，后面剧情精彩，可观看攻略完成游戏避免卡关

author: {'steamid': '76561198412883192', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1670481827}
review:
it is not true
这是面对镜子的假女王中我所想说的，我知道沉寂世界是虚假的，可我也不愿相信诺亚死亡的真相，我既不想沉溺在萨德维克的关怀里，我也不想在冰天雪地里给诺亚讲一个自己的故事。
但这一切又是真实的，镜子里的伤疤是真的，身边人一个又一个的离自己远去是真的，萨德维克与诺亚的死亡是真的，蕾妮的温暖是真的，冰冷也是真的，我恨透了战争，恨透了因为战争我所失去了我的挚爱。
silence  看似是在沉寂世界中面对监察者不发声就能逃避，但其实是在现实中我们已经失去了发声的机会与权力，打破了代表虚妄的镜子，失去诺亚与斑斑，这才是人生大多数的结局吧。
good story

author: {'steamid': '76561199243817073', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 620, 'last_played': 1672153899}

author: {'steamid': '76561197981478843', 'num_games_owned': 308, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 800, 'last_played': 1670267708}
review:
No, just no...

The game looks beautiful. Art is fantastic and together with a music the only thing I liked about the game.

The story is boring and not well written, voice acting is below average, dialogues bring nothing to game's plot, puzzles are pretty much non-existant, characters are forgivable and bland, no manual saves and checkpoints loads with UNSKIPPABLE cutscenes, and loading screens are very long and frequent.

Overall boring experience. I'm wondering who is the target audience. I have a feeling this was a game made for for 8 year olds.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961734538', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 336, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1670131895}
review:
Silence is... alright. It's a sequel to the classic Daedalic point-and-click The Whispered World, but this one is less of a traditional point-and-click experience. It plays more like those modern cinematic narrative adventure games where you don't have an inventory and occasionally have to complete quick time events or use precision mouse movements to achieve a goal. That's fine, I like those kinds of games too, but it's not quite as relaxing and comforting as a traditional point-and-click.

Each screen has a very long load time, which doesn't matter too much because the vast majority of puzzling is "escape room" style - you rarely need to switch locations, and when you do it's fairly obvious why. There are few interactive objects, and those that are interactive are almost always related to a puzzle, so it doesn't feel complex. The fairly thin puzzling could be made up for if the story was really compelling, but it isn't. Silence touches on similar themes to the first game, but because the first game's big reveal is already known from the start of this game, it makes the stakes feel less high than they should. Oh, and the save system sucks because it doesn't exist. There are only checkpoints, which is very annoying when the animations are also unskippable.

I mean, it's fine. The music is great. The graphics are pretty. The world is one of those wonderful modern European fairy tales. It's fun enough. But it isn't really best-in-class for either point-and-click or narrative adventure genres. Worth a playthough for fans, but probably not so interesting for people who aren't diehard adventure gamers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036297204', 'num_games_owned': 1295, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 864, 'last_played': 1659304129}
review:
[i]Silence[/i] is a sequel to [i]The Whispered World[/i], so it's very much advisable to play the first game before the second one as lot of [i]The Whispered World's[/i] events and characters will get mentioned or even will make their appearance. But the true feeling of nostalgia will kick in once you hear the iconic main music track from the first game and see the beautiful background visuals. And of course, once you hatch Spot. <3

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2841692669

[i]Silence[/i] is an adventure game where you get to play as three different characters - Noah, his little sister Renie (she is a real sweetheart) and Spot. Both Noah's and Renie's characters are greatly written and especially Noah undertakes a serious development through the story. As the game is focused on the storytelling and on heavy emotions the gameplay is sadly rather shallow. You have no inventory and the items you find get used mostly on the same screen. There are few (very few) traditional logical puzzles, attention is mostly focused on interaction with the surroundings. I got stuck once, but it was mostly of a bad game design as I wanted to perform an action, but before that I had to perform two other actions even though they were completely unnecessary for the result.

The highlights of the [i]Silence[/i] are great main characters, beautiful soundtrack and gorgeous hand painted graphics. I was a little bit afraid of the 3D characters, but it worked nicely in the end. The story adapts the same theme as the first game, this time without its “wow effect”, but the idea is still very strong to carry another whole similar storyline. Weakest point are side characters whom we meet right at the beginning. Even though we can select in what way to interact with them and their characters develop somehow it all leads into a big nothingness. Their whole presence in the game is pretty much without any meaning and if they wouldn't be there it would have pretty much the same effect. It's rather sad, because in [i]The Whispered World[/i] all important characters got their conclusion during the credits (it was a touching moment). Not this time though and all we can do is ask why they were even there.

To obtain all of the achievements you have to play it twice at least. Some of them are rather tricky so beware as you can't simply load it up. There is only an auto save, which is pretty much disappointing and sometimes leads to replaying a whole scene again as it saves only in certain moments - once you start doing some scene, you better not leave in the middle of it.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2841692034

I have enjoyed the [i]Silence[/i] even though it in some moments felt like a weaker sibling of [i]The Whispered World[/i]. The nostalgic note plays well with me, I admit that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198835430528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 927, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 927, 'last_played': 1669755578}
review:
The visual representation of the game is great, but unfortunately, that is also the best feature the game offers.

The story can be best described as sluggish; the majority of scenes have nothing to do with the main plot and play out as time fillers. The repetitive cutscenes (one of them is played three times in a row), the non-skippable animations, and the shockingly frequent and long loading screens only add to this problem.

The characters can be divided into two groups: the two protagonists (Spot is more a tool than an actor) and the rest who are just part of the set. Both main characters are constantly switching personalities: one minute they are complete buffoons; the next they draw logical conclusions and intelligent decisions.

Unfortunately, this game is a sequel that relies on its predecessor, so I have to assume that most of my story-related questions originate from the lack of knowledge of the first episode.

Another shortcoming of the game is that it fails to establish a consistent mood: it is neither comedic nor dramatic. Instead, it creates a weak mixture of both that accomplishes neither.

Most of the achievements are easy to obtain, but there are a few that require the repetition of scenes or even the whole game. There are broken achievements as well that need a workaround to trigger.

review: Ни разу не пожалела,что  дала второй шанс игре. По началу она мне не особо зашла, но потом, когда я нормально села и вникла в происходящее - меня прям зацепило. Очень понравилась атмосфера а-ля 2010ые, старые добрые поинт энд клик. Офигенный геймплей, который дает тебе достаточный, на мой вгляд, простор фантазии на разные секретные действия в игре или просто интересные смены планов/взаимодействий. Это все не дает заскучать в процессе, а наоборот, мотивирует играть дальше и изучать мир вокруг тебя.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132503739', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 548, 'playtime_forever': 585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 585, 'last_played': 1668970331}
review:
[b]My Playtime:[/b] 9.8h (100% achievement, finished the game twice)
[b]My First Playthrough:[/b] 6.4h
[b]Grindy Achievement(s):[/b] No.
[b]Optional Achievement(s):[/b] Yes (~38 achievements).
[b]Difficult Achievement(s):[/b] No.

[h1]Intro[/h1]
[b]Silence[/b] is a sequel to [b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/268540/The_Whispered_World_Special_Edition/]The Whispered World[/url][/b], telling the tale of the main character long after the events in the first game. It reintroduces a lot of the side characters and references to the story morale in the previous title while still trying to give something unique on its own.

[b]Pros:[/b]
- Beautifully-made landscapes and cutscenes
- Adjustable hint button

[b]Cons:[/b]
- Hint doesn't show interactable objects clearly
- No option to skip cutscenes - only dialogues

[b]Specs[/b]
Intel Core i5-9300H 2.40GHz, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650

[h1]Should you buy this game?[/h1]
[b]Yes.[/b]
[i]If you enjoy modern "point-and-click" games with beautiful scenery, buy this game on sale.[/i]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]In-Depth Review[/h1]

[h3]Visuals[/h3]
If I have to describe it in one word, I would say that it's beautiful. I thought the backgrounds were just still images due to their realistic style and lighting that was more commonly used in 2D, but I was proven wrong once I saw a running water to be animated in one of the backgrounds and rotating scenes. I couldn't help but stop and admire the scenery every time I encountered a new one, and the camera angle is always positioned perfectly whenever it shoots the main character with the background. Sadly, the quality seems to be degraded as you play. The background in the last few areas looks blurry and the lighting was made dimmer to conceal that. The only thing that saves those scenes was the cute-looking characters that are portrayed up close.

[h3]Story[/h3]
If you haven't played [b]The Whispered World[/b], you might want to play it first. The game will give summaries of what happened from the first game, but there are a lot of references and characters that will be reintroduced in this game. Those who haven't played the first game will miss out a lot on that, and if they played the first game after this, they will be spoiled by the ending since it was told at the beginning of this game. That being said, you still can enjoy the story as long as you don't mind about these things.

Despite being presented with several choices throughout the story, most of them don't matter. The only ones that matters are the branching near the end of the game, which only impacts a few scenes right after. To make it worse, there was even a choice that looks different despite giving the same result; I was asked whether to go left or right and the main character will say that he wants to go in one direction regardless of my choice.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1683823450

Although [b]Silence[/b] introduces some new characters at the beginning, they end up being abandoned. It feels like a waste since the game tries to establish some sort of connection with them, only for it to be used as fuel for your decision at the end. Moreover, you still won't know what happened with those characters, or what they were doing in the first place no matter which decision you chose.
 
Unlike the first game, [b]Silence[/b]'s dialogues flow better than the first game. You don't talk to random objects to find the characters spewing random lines; there is one objective that you are geared towards, and the dialogues will switch based on that. Get a new objective? You might want to interact with everything again. Well, there might be some random lines if you interact with the same objects several times, but it's not like it applies to everything like in the first title.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=922679217

As for the ending, the game tries to reinforce the morale that was given at the beginning. You will be given two choices, each having different consequences. It's obvious which is the better choice at a glance, but the main characters' circumstances might make you wonder if it was actually the better choice. However, the conclusion seems to focus more on the despair side, and people might miss some clues that the game wants to tell us unless they notice some little details.

[h3]The Game[/h3]
[b]Gameplay[/b]
[b]Silence[/b] can be said as what a modern point-and-click game looks like, immersing you in a 3D environment with some point-and-click elements - you still need to walk towards some areas and interact with the objects to find a way to proceed. There is no inventory; you can pick up some items, but the said items will be used automatically if you interact with another object. This will force you to interact with everything several times and exhaust the dialogues just to find a way out. The game might be easier because of this, especially with the hint system that tells you what you can do, but it can be exhausting to get through all dialogues this way.

Despite the point-and-click elements, you will mostly spend your time watching cutscenes. Using an object or proceeding to the next area will net you more cutscenes, which is unskippable for the most part. I hated it when I had to spend time waiting for dialogues to finish, and although the game introduces the option to skip dialogues, this option tends to be useless because they don't work for cutscenes.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=806811390

Puzzles are easy. You can solve most of them with trial and error, although some still force you to think. I especially liked the bridge puzzle where you need to move people to the other side and calculate their weight. I wished that they have more puzzles of that caliber.

[b]Length and Difficulty[/b]
I finished the game in 6.4h. I replayed the game again until near the end to get my leftover achievements. There isn't any need to replay the game unless you are an achievement hunter - there is an option to reload the last checkpoint to see both endings. As for the difficulty, the game is easy to beat as long as you don't mind interacting with everything several times. Doing it might bore people out, though.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
[b]Silence[/b] feels like a combination of point-and-click games and Telltale games. It focuses more on the story while still giving you some point-and-click activities. Most of the point-and-click elements might be obscured beneath dialogues, but that makes them easier to point out rather than the nonsensical solutions that the first game has. Despite some of my concerns about the repetitiveness to exhaust all dialogues and a weaker story, the game still has a great quality, and I would like to see something more like this. I won't recommend this game at full price, however.

review: 很推荐的治愈游戏，全程不需要什么操作鼠标点点点就好，故事场景和音乐融合真的塑造出了一股童话般的体验，故事不同结局有着不同意义，像我一样沉浸在silence的世界里真的坐在凳子上想了好久该怎么选结局，如果耐得下心来体验沉浸感真的很棒，流程不算长只是我喜欢哪都探索探索，目前有一个bug就是在蕾妮在森林被搜索者发现然后可以通过鹰去到诺亚在另一个森林那踢树的场景，如果在那关你的视角在诺亚那然后退出，下次进入游戏你视角通过老鹰回去蕾妮那的场景后，蕾妮的场景会出现bug（比如矛没了，你又要去找一次苦浆果等等，不过你依旧能拿起矛），所以游戏过程中尽量不要重进游戏后切换场景除非必要，结局是双结局（千万不要跳过任何一秒！）

author: {'steamid': '76561198264025583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 374, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1666291734}
review:
Silence is a beautiful and emotional adventure game. Although the story can be a bit childish and rather cliché, it manages to catch you thanks to its attractive and charismatic characters (or adorable ones, like Spot and the Lumis) and, above all, due to its outstanding audio-visual section.

It's not a very long or difficult adventure. Ideal for a couple of quiet afternoons (it lasts about 5-6 hours).

* Played on Steam Deck from start to finish, works perfectly.

✪✯✪✯✪✯✪ [h3]7.1 / 10[/h3] ✪✯✪✯✪✯✪

author: {'steamid': '76561198815641642', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 540, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 540, 'last_played': 1666244744}
review:
31元

看在好評與低價的吸引之下，
但是，玩了才知道這是二代遊戲，那一代在哪？
碎碎念的說如果遊戲是二代，請在遊戲名子後面多個2吧！
雖然不知道前因，還是把遊戲玩下去。

遊戲故事是不錯，會讓人想玩下去，
就是謎底好像有點無俚頭，如果都會玩的話，應該能3小時通關。
但是我花了三倍時間才通關第一輪，只能說想像力要豐富才適合玩這個遊戲。

結局倒是蠻意外的，
第一個結局看似壞結局，其實才是好結局。
因為不滿第一個結局選擇第二個，才發現第二個結局的最後，才知道OO原來沒事。
OO沒事的話，那第一個結局就是好結局。
感覺作者很故意，不過我喜歡。

這遊戲缺點的話，
就是讀取好久啊，切換場景會等到睡著。
還有卡住謎題的話會很悶，如果有續作的話，卡關太久後會有提示就好。

31元的話，是很值得買來一玩的遊戲。

author: {'steamid': '76561198394174162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1666062442}
review:
趁着打折入手的，六块九真的很便宜，作为16年的游戏，质量比我想象中的要好太多了。
音乐很好听！[strike]可能是一开始我本来没对剧情有太大的期待（什么）[/strike]，但是比我想象中地要有内容，要完整多了！有些地方很感人！俏皮的地方也让人眼前一亮，很幽默！
但是操作扣大分，我的手柄很难操作到我想选择的物品，有些角度感觉过于刁钻。
可是斑斑加大分，斑斑真的好可爱！
解密有点类似小时候玩的小婴儿逃脱。
我最喜欢的环节还是解谜的时候，每个操作都有不同的反馈！真的很满足！可以干很多乱七八糟的事情！每当我觉得：啊，这种事情制作组应该不会做出来吧。结果真的可以做怪事，很喜欢这种细节！

author: {'steamid': '76561199089705025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 970, 'last_played': 1666021430}
review:
#涉及剧透
------------------------
游戏画面很好，有时候还会停下来欣赏一下自然风景，妹妹超可爱，哥哥除了长得像沈腾之外也没有别的毛病。至于剧情，立意不错，但是讲故事的能力一般，信息量和节奏都不合格，主要是玩着玩着对角色产生了感情才能去体会制作组想要表达的东西，不过这也是游戏比起小说和电影的一个优势吧，你不得不去了解角色的想法。
最喜欢斑斑，看到它傻笑着消失在水中的时候没忍住哭了。反正都是梦境，下一次我肯定不会把斑斑扔出去了，它该不会以为我是不要它了吧。
对于游戏本身，切换场景的时候存档加载非常慢，有时候长达十几秒，不知道是不是我一个人的问题，但除此之外并没有卡顿或者bug的毛病。喜欢本游戏可以自己加减提示的设定，不过还是关掉一些提示自己玩更有意思。解谜难度一般，因为夹杂着大量不可跳过的对话所以推进节奏较慢，适合休闲。

author: {'steamid': '76561198816960151', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 603, 'last_played': 1666008399}
review:
Відмінна гра із захоплюючим сюжетом і приголомшливою графікою. Хоча, я б не назвала 
це грою, бо це скоріше мультиплікаційна казка на пару годин. Чудовий сюжет, чудовий музичний супровід, чудові герої!
 Під час проходження цієї гри нас чекає швидкоплинна, але чарівна історія, здатна здивувати, повеселити та засмутити своїм змістом. 
 Гра бере до уваги зовсім не дитячі теми, а саме війну, та світ між життям і смертю. Це подорож по світу мрій, який примудряється жити сам по собі, а його "господар" лише шахова постать, у подіях, що розвиваються.
 [b] Безмовний світ - історія більше про почуття, дружбу, та мрії. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198047519789', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1665208942}
review:
Игра отличная, мне очень понравилась. Приятный, не надоедающий, саундтрек. Милая графика. Квесты не сложные, хотя иногда заставляют подумать. В общем расслабляющая игра, но при этом задевает душевные струны. А по итогу концовок, даже не можешь сказать, какая лучше. 
[spoiler] Увидела в отрицательных комментариях, что этот продукт - клон игры "Ускользающий мир". Или ее неудачное продолжение. Не соглашусь. Как ни разглядывала эту игру - как отдельный продукт, и даже как продолжение, негативных эмоций это не вызвало. Просто "ускользающий мир", на мой взгляд, сложнее. Да, брат главной героини это тот самый Седрик. И героев поменяли местами. Но история другая - концовки разные. Последствия истории после выбора другие. Концовка этой игры, по моему мнению, более трагичная. [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198027048925', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 403, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 403, 'last_played': 1664727271}

author: {'steamid': '76561198130459133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 777, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 777, 'last_played': 1662827061}
review:
И вновь никому не нужное продолжение. За Daedalic уже давно замечена непомерная жадность в желании “доить” удавшиеся проекты. И ещё ни разу это хорошо не закончилось. Не стала исключением и эта игра.

С первых минут нам настойчиво скармливают идею, что это не что иное, как продолжение прекрасного и трогательного квеста The Whispered World. И персонажи вроде бы те же, и музыка удивительно знакома, и даже мир чем-то отдалённо напоминает тот самый. Но на проверку это оказывается жалким подобием, каким-то слабым отголоском той милой и доброй сказки. От квеста как такового не осталось и следа – теперь это просто симулятор кат-сцен (которые, разумеется, нельзя пропустить). Инвентарь убран. Сюжет сумбурен и наполнен бесполезными ответвлениями, вроде войны повстанцев с монархией или тонкостей местной религии. На всю игру аж 3(!) загадки. Зато бессмысленной болтовни хватило бы ещё на несколько сиквелов. И вы будете слушать её снова и снова, потому что чек-поинты здесь ВСЕГДА до начала кат-сцен, а потому хорошенько подумайте, прежде чем решить сделать перекур и выйти из игры.

С эстетической стороны к “Безмолвному миру” тоже немало вопросов. Саундтрек, без сомнений, роскошный. Вот только он чуть менее, чем полностью состоит из мотивов первой части. Также неоспорима работа художников – задние планы и статичные фоны –  просто произведения искусства. А вот всё остальное, увы, такой красотой похвастаться не может. Если объяснять это кратко, то переход к 3D анимации – не самая лучшая идея. Особенно если уже неоднократно отмечалось, что в эту самую анимацию студия “не умеет, не могёт”. Но главная горечь разочарования постигает во время финального диалога. Меня до самого конца смутно преследовало ощущение, что где-то это всё уже было. И концовка чётко и ясно это обозначила – это бесталанная калька серии игр об Алисе в стране чудес Американа Макги. Чрезмерно яркий и пестрый мир; враги, словно вылепленные из смолы и, конечно же, финт с главной злодейкой в конце. После осознания этого факта Silence выглядит дешево и бездарно.

По итогу мы имеем сиквел, который совершенно таковым не ощущается – новые места, новые события и новые герои. Очень спорные герои, вдобавок ко всему прочему, - пустые, капризные, отталкивающие, а порой и просто отвратительные. Они не вызывают желания сопереживать им (во многом этому поспособствовали актеры, которым, по всей видимости, было плевать на отыгрыш, и поэтому голоса неестественны и совершенно не эмоциональны). Эта история и вполовину не такая душещипательная и сильная, как “Ускользающий мир”. А потому если и решите шагнуть в это “Безмолвие”, то исключительно на свой страх и риск.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082117469', 'num_games_owned': 12527, 'num_reviews': 568, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1663800420}
review:
Suite de l'excellent Whispered World (Chronique de Sadwick en Français)
Mais un poil plus court au niveau des énigmes par rapport au précédents (la fin semble plus vite expédiée)
Peut être la direction artistique plus poussé que le premier opus qui fait ça (on passe du dessin à la main à une 3D récente)
Mais l'histoire du jeu en reste pas moins émouvante et très féerique
Espérons un troisième opus

author: {'steamid': '76561198866049387', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 567, 'last_played': 1663508355}

author: {'steamid': '76561198140775770', 'num_games_owned': 473, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1062, 'last_played': 1663677861}
review:
第一款通关的 Daedalic 作品。
有中文配音难能可贵，配音腔调、和画面的同步等地方还有进步的空间。
存在着许多地方不支持跳过、Noah 的性格割裂、人类角色的塑造不够深刻、故事剧情之间没有衔接得当（有赶工删减内容的感觉）等问题，令人扼腕。
给故事题材与主旨、Reine 和 Spot 好评。

review:
게임 플레이를 1이라도 생각하고 구매하는사람이면 무조건 비추. 그냥 무조건 클릭만 하면 스토리는 다 풀리고 페이스도 느려 터졌고 키 누르면 캐릭터가 반응을 한 2초는 있다가 하는데 쓸모없는 물건을 미친듯이 뿌려놔서 의미도 없이 계속 쳐누르면서 개소리하는거 감상하는 시간이 플레이의 절반 이상이다.
컷씬 말고는 캐릭터들이 인디게임마냥 표정도 거의 없는 수준에 모션도 가만히 서있고 느려터져서 하다 속도 같이 터진다. 같은 시네마틱게임인 언틸던은 2회차나 했는데 이 게임은 보는맛도 없고 현장감도 없고 모션도 거지같고 플레이는 클릭밖게 없는 게임이라기엔 저퀄 똥모션 게임플레이가 없고 영화라기엔 미쟝센도 1도 없고 퀄리티도 쓰레기다. 이도저도 아니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561199159960137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1662123902}
review:
Silence è il seguito di The Whispered World ed è ambientato qualche anno dopo il suo predecessore. Questa volta i protagonisti sono 2: Noah, il co-protagonista di The Whispered World, e la sua sorellina Renie. La storia comincia nel nostro mondo, dilianiato dalla guerra, e prosegue poi su Silence (il mondo in cui è ambientato anche il primo episodio), dove Noah dovrà ritrovare la sua sorellina ed insieme poi dovranno riuscire a tornare nel nostro mondo o forse no?. 
La storia è molto delicata, con una nota di spensieratezza che riesce a far digerire meglio la malinconia e la crudezza di alcuni momenti. Tutta la storia si sviluppata bene fino ai 3/4 del gioco, e poi subisce una brusca accelerata, come se si avesse fretta di chiuderla. Resta una bella storia,ma alcuni passaggi logici sul perchè alcuni personaggi fanno quello che devono fare risultano affrettato e decisamente senza molto senso.

Graficamente si passa dal grafica cartonesca del primo episodio a quella in 2.5D, un mondo di fiabe e mostri talmente bello che mi perdevo a fare screen da usare come wallpaper, stessa cosa si può dire sui personaggi cartooneschi e adorabili all'invero simile (soprattutto Renie con il suo cappuccio gigante e la sciarpa che ti viene voglia di toccarla e Chad Spot).
Le musiche del gioco ben accompagnano lo svolgimento della storia, alcune sono anche molto rilassanti. Il doppiaggio, purtroppo solo in inglese, ma non è un problema visto che per fortuna ci sono almeno i sottotitoli.
Gli enigmi del gioco sono abbastanza semplici, alla fine si tratta soltanto di trovare l'oggetto giusto per risolvere l'indovinello o di parlare con il personaggio che ci può indirizzare, non ci sono mai oggetti da combinare tra di loro oppure enigmi astrusi che possono bloccare il giocatore. Anche chi è novizio delle avventure grafiche non avrà problemi a completare la storia. Si aggiunge un sistema di scelta delle nostre risposte in alcuni punti della campagna, ma è poca cosa e non ha influenza sui finali.
Ecco, un elemento che fa storcere il naso è la longevità del gioco, siamo intorno alle 6-7 ore per una prima run, e non ho messo impegno. Sono andato molto chilli con anche l'attività di fotografo. Leggendo in giro per Steam, viene scritto che ci vogliono almeno 2 run se si vogliono vedere tutti i finali e prendere tutti gli achievement steam. Cosa in realtà non necessaria, in quanto il titolo ha un sistema di autosalvataggio e per delizia dei completisti salverà poco prima della scelta più importante. Parlando dei finali... quello che si teme può diventare realtà, quello che vuole essere solo una fantasia invece rimane.  Tutti e due i finali lasciano una sensazione di malinconia in bocca, forse va bene così. Ogni tanto è giusto così.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215484043', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1662239363}
review:
[b]The Depressingly Hollow World of Silence[/b]
To my utter chagrin, the story is blander than the one in the first instalment. What are the issues? Most of the events that happen in this game do not move the plot – they are absurdly unnecessary fillers of an already short game. It also did not uplift my mood I constantly had to endure a moronic, petulant child, who, at times, conveniently proposed solutions only an intelligent adult could. 

Issues with consistency are sadly not related solely to this character. [i]Silence[/i] is supposed to be a continuation of [i]The Whispered World[/i], yet the prequel is treated as a cheap prop that allows the writers to throw in an occasional reference. Acceptable, had the entire plot not revolved around the existence of the very same fantasy world – world which now feels completely alien and devoid of continuation. One could argue it makes sense since there is a different person imagining it. I say it is lack of writing ingenuity. The cinematics which, despite obvious efforts, fail to induce a dramatic emotional response, attest to that.

There are more flaws that make for a very frustrating experience: broken achievements; insufferably – and I cannot stress this enough – frequent and sluggish loading screens; or repetitive non-skippable animations.

Such an artistic potential… and such a waste.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119888000', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2320, 'last_played': 1661877312}
review:

간단하게 가벼운 이야기 하나 본다고 생각하면 좋습니다.

스킵 시스템이 별로 좋지도 않고, 대화나 관계가 매끄럽지 못해서 위화감이 들어서 몰입도가 좀 떨어집니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198992274387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1661514638}
review:
3시간 정도 하다가 환불 신청 넣어둠ㅜ

이유는 복합적이긴 한데 적어 보자면.

1
  포인트앤 클릭인거 알겠는데 스토리 자체도 잔잔한데 컨트롤단순 하고 캐릭터 행동도 너무 잔잔해서 지루함 퍼즐 적인 요소도 이게 퍼즐이라고 할 순 있나..? 머리를 쓰게 만들어야 하는 건데 그게 아니고 그냥 순서 되짚는 느낌.

2
   대화 스킵은 못 하고 연출씬이 너무 많음..그 많능 가운데 진행에 필요한 내용은 얼마 없음. 보고 있으면 스킵 마려움. 약간 영화로 보자면 배우가 표정, 몸짓으로 감정 전달 하는게 아니고 국어책 읽듯 쓸때 없이 있어 보이는 말들 섞어서 독백으로 감정 전달 하는 거 같음. 심지어 내용이 가끔 뜬금 없다고 느껴지기도 하고 하는 사람이 스토리에 흥미를 갖게 하는 요소가 부족함.

3
  분명 내용상 적이 있는 데 그 적의 모습이 안 보임. 위 내용이랑 비슷 한게 극초반에 누가 나쁘다를 정해두고 인물이 말로 설명도 했는 데...핵심 인물인가 싶은 그 둘은 나오자도 않고 오히려 농담 섞어 가며 대화나 하는 연출신들 보면서 답답함만 느낌.

4
  포인트앤 클릭 + 애매하게 친절한 힌트. 포인드앤 클릭이라 딱히 플에이어가 할게 없음 근데 거기에 힌트도 있음.
웃긴건 애매....함 그 힌트가 명확하게 짚어 두던가 아니면 여기저기 다 띄워 주고 대사나 대화로 넘어 가지 말고 히든요소 수집 이였으면 신나서 적극적으로 시도 하겠지만 그냥 몇마디 대사가 끝인 경우가 있어서 지루할 이유를 만듬.


요약 하자면 힐링 게임 특성상 잔잔한 분위기는 알겠으나 플레이 방식과 너무 많은 연출신들로 인해 게임이 아니라 e-북을 구매한 느낌.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074258777', 'num_games_owned': 795, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1521, 'last_played': 1644705629}
review:
Silence 

The game Silence has a beautiful but sad story. It's about Noah and Rennie, brother and sister, who are stuck in the world Silence, a world between life and death. They know exactly what to do to get out, follow them on their journey through the world of the in between.

I absolutely loved this game. The story moved me quite a bit. The art work is stunning and the voices really fit the characters! The game is a point and click puzzle game. It's story based but to progress you need to solve some puzzles. Some are slightly trickier than others but they are relatively easy! The game also has a bit of humor in it still. But since this game is from Daedalic I was also expecting it because their games are always so much fun! 
I instantly fell in love with Spot and Rennie, they are extremely adorable! The character I hated was Sadwick and I just don't understand why Rennie loves him so much. 

The game is relatively short. It took me around 5 hours to complete it the first time. I've had to do 4 playthroughs to get all of the achievements. There are 2 endings so that means 2 playthroughs. I did one to get the remaining achievements and I had to do 1 more because for one achievement in particular that was broken and will only be triggered while playing with a controller. So just a small tip. To get all of the achievements it took me 25 hours but if I knew beforehand that one achievement was broken it would've been less.

Things I disliked about the game or maybe would've liked to see differently are: 
- Some more background stories about the characters. After another playthrough I've noticed a few dialogs that didn't quite make sense to me but they never explain what they mean. 
- Harder puzzles. Some of the puzzles, if not all, are pretty easy and I'm not sure if you can actually call them puzzles. But on the other hand I also understand that this game is more about the story than the actual puzzles so it also makes sense. This really just is a matter of opinion. 
- Working achievements. Or at least, one in particular that would also be triggered while playing with mouse and keyboard. 

Overall I give this game a 7/10 
The story is beautiful and the artwork is stunning. Which is always a big plus for me. The game isn't perfect and it could've been a lot better if there was a bit more to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001792668', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1659021317}
review: Игра мне сразу понравилась, потому что в ней можно лизать грибы до потери сознания и взрывать болото. Плюс тут вас ждёт тонна классного юмора: от детской непосредственности до шуток про пердеж. Из минусов можно отметить две вещи: актеры озвучки не всегда дотягивают в плане эмоций (иногда как-то оторванно от происходящего звучит), а в сюжете много отсылок на лор первой части (персонажам он уже был знаком, мне - нет). Несмотря на это, Silence - добрый и приятный квест с обилием разнообразных головоломок и персонажей, вызывающих симпатию с первых кадров.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972463372', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 832, 'last_played': 1658774969}
review:
Steam! We need a neutral rating! This game has so many good things to it but also so many not so great things. 
The world building and art style are beautiful! I could have spent hours and ours in Silence. And even without having played The Whispered World, I could easily get immersed into this game. I think the difficulty of the puzzles is just right but I would have preferred and inventory to got some more options to try things. Without it the items you find will be used within minutes and there is no Puzzling involved. 
Things I did not like where the long loading screens that accrued way to often, the flat side characters and the ending that felt kinda abrupt. After chapter 3 is finished it feels like there is a part missing before the final. 

All in all a good PnC with some flaws but a good 3D debut for Dedalic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058791441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1653216886}
review: The artwork of the world and the character actor for the little girl are the best parts of Silence. The personality of the clown is awful and definitely kept me away from trying the first game. And that's a problem because there are constant throwbacks to that game. Otherwise there is barely anything to this game. There is no depth to the characters and the plot is a mess where main objectives change multiple times. There is no adventure. It is short but not sweet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198349632399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1658313330}
review:
キャラを動かしてギミックを探して作り、物語を進めていく読み物ゲーム

さながらピクサー映画のようにとにかく綺麗で引き込まれる背景と、キャラの細かい表情の変化が巧みで、丁寧に作られている作品だなと感じます
英語音声日本語字幕ですが、どの役者さんも演技がうまくのめり込んでしまいます

ストーリーは結構シリアスで、エンディングも好みが分かれそうですが、終盤の塔と星空、城の映像や鏡の演出はとても良かったです

（妹レニーの表情豊かな丸顔と年相応の無垢な言動を楽しむというだけでもプレイしてよかったなと思いました　笑）

author: {'steamid': '76561199202661661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1656874115}
review:
Was würdest du tun, um deine Familie zu retten? 

Silence ist ein weiteres wunderschönes Point & Click aus der Deadalic Schmiede.

Anmerkung vorab, bitte spielt erst "The Wispered World" bevor ihr Silence spielt.

Denn die beiden gehören zusammen und Silence ist die Fortsetzung davon. 

Noah und Renie werden in eine fremde Welt geworfen und müssen zusammen und getrennt den Weg nach Hause finden.

Triff alte Freunde aus "The Whispered World" löse neue Rätsel und lerne neue Freunde kennen.

Auch hier sind die Rätsel angenehm und mit ein wenig nachdenken auch zu  lösen. 

Man durchstreift die welt und findet immer etwas zum schmunzeln und Staunen, aber auch zum Nachdenken.

Wer Point & Click liebt macht hiermit alles richtig! 
Dadurch das ihr variabel Entscheidungen trefft,  kann die Geschichte bei erneutem durchspielen komplett anders ausgehen.


Ein muss für jede Spiele Bibliothek

author: {'steamid': '76561199162764638', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 484, 'last_played': 1660491583}
review:
Можно заняться микродозингом и отпинать застрявшего искателя ❤️

Советую данную игру к прохождению.
Очень понравилась графика. Всё яркое, красивое и сочное.
Музыкальное сопровождение не надоедает от слова "совсем".
Игра приятная и не надоедливая.
Радует, что от многих выборов зависит конечный сюжет в игре. Однозначно добавляю её в избранные игры ❤️

author: {'steamid': '76561199328059669', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1657572168}
review: Ein fantastisches Spiel mit sehr viel Liebe zum Detail. Renie, Sadwick und Spot auf Ihrer Traumreise zu begleiten macht unglaublich viel Freude. Die Grafik ist einzigartig, pittoreske Landschaften mit einem zauberhaften Licht- und Schattenspiel und fantasievollen Figuren. Passend unterlegt mit harmonischer Hintergrundmusik und die Charaktere begleiten den Spieler mit humorvollen Dialogen durch spannende Rätsel. Dieses Spiel lädt nicht nur zum Träumen ein, sondern regt auch zum Nachdenken an. Mit Moral, Esprit und ein wenig Geschicklichkeit geleitet man die Geschwister durch ihre Abenteuer. Das macht süchtig und ich freue mich schon auf eine Fortsetzung. Absolutes Suchtpotential, weiter so!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198981914496', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1657448797}
review:
好游戏，反战亲情题材，很有《纳尼亚传奇》的特点。游戏优点大有人说，咱不讨论，中配的缺点也暂且不论。
但是，问题很大。
首先，先说一下不影响剧情的。字幕，记得开。场景，流水线一样有序进行，但是对于个别地方的刻画，例如港口，或是集市，并不能给人们一个清晰的地图构造，剧情衔接处的地图更是直接跳过。画面，远景很可以，但是个别时间不长的画面，例如蜂巢地下，对于细节的把控很敷衍，不过也就那几秒，其实也问题不大。存档，在你通关游戏之后，如果你想重新体验某一段剧情或者某一个小谜题，你需要从头来，对于多周目玩家和成就玩家很不友好，更何况剧情和人物很是拖沓。
再来说说有关人物方面。对于角色的刻画，除了小主人公和小虫子，其他人物的刻画都有问题。男主，还算说得过去，前期安抚妹妹，寻找妹妹，在他意识到自己并不是国王而是配角，妹妹是女王时，一切的中心便是辅佐妹妹到达灯塔，甚至不惜牺牲自己。但他对于其他角色过于刻薄，哪怕是早就一起同行的小虫子，都无所谓。但是他明白自己只是扮演了妹妹梦境中的一个角色，完成最终目标后，所有的一切都将不复存在，也算能够理解，最能体现这一点的应该就是他对于女战士生命蜡烛的随意。对于其他角色，女战士，刚强但蛮横无比，即便有裁缝店婚纱的故事，也照样没法体现她作为反抗军领导者的魄力，对于自己的救命恩人，完全不在意。胖子，憨厚但无用至极，作为体现女战士一方的唯二者，他所做的事，并不聪明，在小主人公找到碎片，男主破译谜之信件后，反而和女战士一起对男主和小主人公起了疑心，这跟他之前对待一个陌生女孩的热心和真诚完全不对等，人设完全崩塌。老者，一开始我还以为这是个什么大佬级别人物，没想到他唯一的用处就是踩木板，后面他的对话对于主线推动有用但没多少用，可有可无。预言家，这更是的寄吧，非人类的相貌，穿着法师一般的袍子，很帅，但是，随随便便把别人变成雕像，还美其名曰对男主的考验，后来女战士莫名其妙抢夺碎片时男主为保护妹妹拦住刀锋，预言家到反而把男主也给变成雕像了，这又成了对小主人公的考验了？本来男主和预言家早就相识，预言家作为游戏里顶天的智者，绝对知悉男主所做的一切，不论是对于前世还是今生，明摆着找男主茬了，得亏之前男主还拿着电灯泡说预言家的好。假女王，最终的大boss仅存在于最后5分钟，脸上的刀疤是之前小女子所得的碎片状，体现了现实世界受到伤害的小主人公，作为小主人公的阴暗面，为得到最后的碎片不择手段，挺常规的boss，就是没啥逼格，要手下没手下，要实力没实力，最后只能口遁小女主。其他的像小黑人，石头人，谜语玩蛇人等等，也就石头人俩兄弟能提一下，一个礼貌，一个傲娇，挺好俩哥们。
最后，再说说剧情这方面，在生与死的边界，是属于沉寂的世界。根据剧情，男主作为一个仅16岁的孩子，已经是第二次来到这个世界了，说明他已经“死”了两次了，但这次的世界有很多他不知道的事物，像小黑人，就是小孩子所喜欢的那种可爱的生物，是他的妹妹所想象出的。这足够反映了现实世界战争带来的灾难，对于儿童的巨大迫害。这里提一下现实世界一位重要的角色，那就是克拉克小姐，应该是孤儿院的负责人，一直对待两兄妹很好，但战争来到，谁也说不好这位善人的结果如何。而沉寂世界，能够支持小主人公前行的便是诺亚，和克拉克小姐，还有孤儿院后的向日葵田。游戏本身的故事大致讲的是战争到来，男主和小主人公藏身的地堡被炸毁，小主人公进入了沉寂世界，男主追寻妹妹，一路保护妹妹直至返回现实世界为止。而男主为保护妹妹，一路扮演之前的那个“小丑”的角色，萨德维克，那是他不想回忆起的记忆，但他仍然没有怨言的带上了属于他扮演角色的帽子。而后，解密，争吵，解密，合作，解密，分道扬镳，解密，大打出手，解密，大结局。差不多就这样。最后小主人公所照出的4个图案，导弹，翅膀，萨德维克（诺亚），斑斑。其中，导弹是可怕的现实世界中的战争，翅膀是梦想，诺亚是哥哥是亲人，萨德维克是自己向往的英雄，斑斑是自己的同伴。我很庆幸没把其他几个大聪明也算上，但是其中翅膀这一主题，除了最后在船上做梦和斑斑一起遨游云海，貌似并没有怎么提到，稍微有点牵强，换个其他的，像向日葵，或者小主人公最喜欢的草莓也行。解密的个别地方，很是牵强，按照行为逻辑来说，也只能说勉勉强强。其中对于小虫子的解密部分，大多是不好把控的。
总而言之，整个Silence游戏性其实并不强，对于视野的锁定，其实也不是很适合观景，更适合当作一本小说来看，和《纳尼亚传奇》很有异曲同工之妙。

author: {'steamid': '76561199261152415', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1657398008}

review:
A beautiful game for a cheap price.

Characters are interesting. I heard that there is a prequel to this, i never played it but it doesn't really affect much on the game play as you can still comprehend the story as you progress.

The story is short but very touching. Recommend this to people that are into short story telling, but not for those that are looking for adventures since it is really short and no actions in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040234830', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1656448787}
review:
I will just repeat what someone else already wrote and I can only agree with this:

"The plot seems so fragmented and sometimes rushed, the characters pale and unimpressive and sometimes their behavior is not understandable at all. You constantly have the feeling that there is more background to the characters in the game, but it's as if this content was simply removed afterwards. Why certain things happen to them, where they actually come from and why they do what they do - you don't find out. And that's where there would have been so much potential. I feel like I've only played half of a game that originally wanted to be so much more. Nothing really fits together, the game stumbles from setting to setting and doesn't even manage to unite them in the storytelling in a comprehensible way. Even the ending seems rushed, quickly cobbled together and not properly thought out."

Graphics are great, stunning art but lack of interaction and game play made this game quite boring. You can't explore and are almost always 'trapped' in one or two screens with puzzles to be solved before you can continue. There is not really an inventory, since you can't use your items randomly on objects. Quite disappointing I must say.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025364608', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1656347314}
review:
The biggest flaw of Silence is the time-wasting.

* Want to interact with something? Walk over to it slowly and click the interact button. The character slowly turns around in place, slowly moves in to position (to the single specific spot they need to stand in), and then slowly turns to face the object, and first THEN will you interact with it. Constantly. Even just to look at something.

* There is a "skip dialogue" button, but it only works in very specific and rare interactions.

* You can't skip cutscenes.

* The only save method is autosaves, which are not frequent enough. You finish watching a lengthy cutscene to make sure that the game is saved. Next time you load the game you realize that it didn't save after the cutscene at all. Did I mention that you can't skip cutscenes?

The other big flaw is that the puzzles are way too simple.
I never enjoyed combining items in the inventory, so I don't miss it in this game. But the outcome is that you have a very limited number of interactions, and most of the time it's very clear what you need to do. Except when it's not, because you need to interact with some things blindly to get a reaction that is impossible to predict..
Regardless, I never felt a sense of accomplishment for completing a puzzle.

The story is merely serviceable, but not interesting enough for me to put up with the lackluster gameplay.

It's pretty though.

It's clear to see why point & click games are mostly a relic of the past, when even veterans like Daedalic are still designing games with the same flaws that we complained about way back in the 90s.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333642867', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1656339199}
review:
По общим впечатлениями, для меня игра стала раскрываться в конце, всё оставшиеся время мне было не уютно играть за главных героев кроме Рени, остальные персонажи мне мало чем симпатизировали и чаще всего все эти конфликты доходили до абсурда. Многие персонажи не раскрыты как по мне. Я узнал что это оказывается продолжение другой игры, и может они там раскрываются, но здесь явно нет. Впечатление их добавили чтобы мир не был пустым. Сами задники и мир осень красивый и хочется их поставить на обои рабочего стола. 

В целом игра поднимает серьёзные темы суровой реальности и своего внутреннего мира и как война отражается на детях. Но после попадания в этот мир становиться слишком уж радужно и фентезийно и приходилось забрасывать игру так как думал, что она отошла от своей темы. Я решил допройти её и дать игре второй шанс и она его опровдала. Большую часть времени у меня были противоречивые чувства, хорошая игра или нет. В ней есть много минимум но и и плюсов. В общей сложности мне игра  понравилась хоть и к концу.

Я рекомендую эту игру тем, кто знаком с этой вселенной и любит игры с глубоким сюжетом.

author: {'steamid': '76561198993576483', 'num_games_owned': 32, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1662119643}

author: {'steamid': '76561198356137969', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1661688043}
review:
'옵션 - 그래픽 - Vsync 비활성화'하시면 마우스로 캐릭터 균형 잘 잡힙니다.
저 게임 초반에 캐릭터 균형 안 잡혀서 패드로 해야 되나 고민했었는데
우연히 알게 되어서 Vsync 비활성화했는데 마우스로 캐릭터 균형 잡히네요.

처음 1회차는 도저히 모르겠다 싶은 부분을 제외하고 최대한 공략 없이 진행했습니다. 
게임 불러오기를 통해서 엔딩 2개 모두 봤습니다.
그런데, 어지간하면 도전 과제 최대한 달성하면서 진행하는데 지루해서 못하겠더라고요.
개인적으로 딱 1회차까지 할만한 게임이라고 생각합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198853353730', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1656610211}

author: {'steamid': '76561199131195379', 'num_games_owned': 227, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1655872702}
review:
игра понравилась! сюжет интересный, взаимодействия с персонажами и предметами забавные. полизали грибы, понюхали пыльцу, подружились с камнями и половили страшных волосатых гусениц. Кира сомнительный персонаж, который мне не понравился, резкая и грубая, но эта революционная душа имеет место быть в игре. уже в середине начинаешь понимать что происходит и к чему всё приведёт. концовки для меня весьма печальные. игра стоит своих денег (сказала она и купила ключ) 
10 каплей из 10!

author: {'steamid': '76561198069823951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1658096405}

author: {'steamid': '76561199094058394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1655734485}
review:
É mais um filme interativo do que um point-and-click. Se você veio procurando por esse gênero existem outro muito bons da mesma desenvolvedora, incluindo o seu antecessor "The Whispered World". 

O jogo em si tem seus puzzles... mas nada de muito empolgante. Também não consegui desenvolver muito apego pelos personagens e só queria terminar o jogo logo, um objetivo que não consegui cumprir. Acho que investiram muito mais no visual do jogo do que na jogabilidade.

Por fim, gostei de algumas "inovações" pro gênero como o de quick time event e das escolhas de diálogo, mas não é nada de mais e se não tivesse não faria muita diferença.

review:
I'm at 50-50 with this review, because it starts out great, story starting to flesh out, new charaters getting introduced and slowly getting to know them more, you feel like you're at the halfway mark........aaaaaaaand it's over. Just like that boom, questions unanswered, side characters just disappeared like......just sitting there dumbfounded how abruptly it ended.
Music is beautiful, characters and chemistry is great, Renie and Spot are adorable, story went well until it lasted but.....feels incomplete

author: {'steamid': '76561198199590453', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 571, 'last_played': 1654893190}
review:
[h1]Безмолвный мир...[/h1]
[i]Прекрасная игра и моментами печальная. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2818660411
Началась война.Наши герои - брат(Ноа) и младшая сестра(Рени).Из-за бомбежек герои наши укрывались в небольшом бункере. Где они были в своем маленьком мирке фантазий,но недолго это продолжалось.Бомбы их настигли и там..После того,как разрушился бункер,наши герои попадают в другой мир,где миром правит лживая королева. Ноа и Рени разделились и Ноа отправился в путь на поиски сестры с милой гусеницей -Капля. Волшебная капля будет нам помогать во многих прохождениях. На пути наших героев будут попадаться различные опасности,квесты с головоломками,знакомства с новыми личностями и существами. Красивая графика/арты,интересный сюжет. 
Конечно не вижу смысла все писать,что происходило иначе не так интересно будет)..Но подмечу,что в игре есть несколько концовок..
Довольно мало игр осталось,которые заставляют погрузится в мир сказок. 9/10 [/i]

[h1]A silent world...[/h1]
[i]A wonderful game and sad at times. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2819416786
The war began.Our heroes are a brother (Noah) and a younger sister (Reni).Because of the bombing, our heroes took refuge in a small bunker. Where they were in their little fantasy world, but it didn't last long.The bombs caught up with them there, too..After the bunker collapsed, our heroes enter another world, where the world is ruled by a lying queen. Noah and Renie split up and Noah set off in search of his sister with a cute caterpillar -Drop. The magic drop will help us in many walkthroughs. On the way our heroes will come across various dangers, quests with puzzles, meeting new personalities and creatures. Beautiful graphics / art, interesting plot. 
Of course, I don't see the point in writing everything that happened otherwise it won't be so interesting)..But I will note that there are several endings in the game..
There are quite a few games left that make you immerse yourself in the world of fairy tales. 9/10[/i]

 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2819417080

author: {'steamid': '76561198025219557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1654723524}
review: Suchst Du ein Adventure mit anspruchsvollen Rätseln? Dann bist Du hier leider falsch. Silence ist eher eine interaktive Geschichte, mit einigen "kleineren" Rätselpassagen. Die deutsche Syncronisation ist wunderbar, die Figuren sind liebevoll gestaltet und auch sonst merkt man den Entwickler*innen ihre "Leidenschaft" an. Dieses Spiel verbindet Emotionen, Figuren mit Geschichte und lustigen Passagen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206575048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1654688165}
review: Продолжение не так цепляет, хотя картинка очень красивая. Теперь это не классический point and click квест, а интерактивный мультик. Из-за этого сюжет кажется урезанным. Но тем не менее, игра стоит потраченного времени, хотя грустные твисты от данных разработчиков кочуют из игры в игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084291565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 445, 'last_played': 1653843065}
review: The art and story is amazing! The puzzles are pretty easy-ish, but they use a cool new way of interacting you don't see in other games. Spot was adorable, and the voice acting was great!! That said, it's really slow paced, and they don't let you skip the cut scenes. You end up re-watching the same ones A LOT if you quit before one. That's a special kind of torture... and easy to code in so I don't get why they skipped that ability. If you are OK with moving slow and here for the story, I do recommend it because it's so unique! But if you're a bit twitchy, maybe not for you. I think full price is asking a lot without cut scene skip ability IMHO.

review:
Its hard to say i would recommend this game, im not super far in the game yet so take this with a grain of salt

visually its a beautiful game, the backgrounds are the real star when it comes to the environments and all of the creatures are super creative. The dialogue is super clunky and not written super well, same for the characters. The voice acting is pretty good though. The story seems to be alright but like i said the writing is a but clunky so it makes the story come out the same way. personal thing but I dont like spot. why does he inflate and then turn into a piece of gum. its uncomfy.  I

all in all i dont hate the game but i dont think its worth the price

author: {'steamid': '76561198893098090', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 266, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1652725749}
review:
Казалось бы, в чем коренная проблема всяческих "глубокосюжетных" point and click квестов? В иллюзорности реального выбора? В повсеместных сюжетных дырах? да да -- в Silence все эти шероховатости приобретаю прост вселенский охват. 
Казалось бы, почему не создать казуальненькую, но вполне милую квестюшку на разок? -- послушать хороший саунд, понаблюдать над взаимосвязями всякоразных героев -- при этом ловить удовольствие.
Но не срослось -- даедалики взяли за базис свою давненько выстрелившую игру про похождения шута и гусеничи компаньона -- и сделали на этом крайне покомканное и хреново связанное между собой произведение. Казалось бы, с неплохой концепцией -- фантазийное путешествие девчули среди собственных фантазий на фоне разворачивающей катастрофы...
Так вот все минусы перечислены выше -- и браться же за этот продукт или нет... -- я склоняюсь к нет. Мне к моему же знатному разочарованию чрезвычайно не пришлось к сердцу: и в контексте связи сюжета-геймплея, и в плане раскрытия квестовых особенностей жанра (и персонажей!) -- в Pillars of the Earth всё было на крайне высоком и отличающемся от данной игрули уровне -- причем целиком и полностью на более развитом уровне...

5,5/10 за интригующее начало и отличную картинку, но за путаность и несвязанность ВСЕГО в игре

author: {'steamid': '76561199065312958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1676237882}

author: {'steamid': '76561197996859750', 'num_games_owned': 821, 'num_reviews': 397, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1652573839}
review: Beautiful adventure! I tend to prefer the 2D hand-drawn adventures like its predecessor, The Whispered World, but I must say I really loved Silence's new visual style, with those beautiful hand-painted backgrounds and those 3D characters with hand-painted style textures. The experience is mostly easy, simple and really accessible, and the duration is on the short side (it took me about 5 hours). The characters are really charming and the story very touching, like in the previous game. Maybe not as great as The Whispered World, but a nice return to its world.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002986817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 295, 'playtime_forever': 734, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1651966587}
review: It's a pretty good game overall but far from perfect. If you have played Daedalic titles before, then this is another great story from them. It's a good sequel and they really found unique ways to improve their design. The world is beautiful, the story is very engaging and they even found ways to simplify the gameplay. I used a walkthrough much less here then in previous titles. Sadly, my biggest complaint is that I really didn't enjoy the ending and its a tad on the short side. Still, its a great game worthy of another sequel so the characters can have a truly good ending.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260634807', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1651514687}
review:
中规中矩的线性点击解谜游戏，游戏画面制作精良，原版配音也不错，解谜难度系数不超过中等
个人认为不足之处有三，一是平平无奇没有特别突出的亮点，二是无法在一周目内全成就，这里指的除选择性成就外，毕竟这种类型的游戏打两遍的意义不大，三是可能没玩过前作风语世界，有些人物和故事情节不是特别清楚，感觉故事性普普通通而且略微有点虎头蛇尾，有种前期把背景做大了但是结局就一笔带过了，没什么最终挑战，结局来的快且容易
喜欢此类型游戏或画风的可以一玩

author: {'steamid': '76561198334486074', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 334, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1668206218}
review:
ДОСТОИНСТВА:
Сюжет, проработка и озвучка персонажей, музыка.
НЕДОСТАТКИ:
Короткая.
Вступление: Silence - потрясающая сказка, чарующая своей красотой, музыкой и легким юмором. У нее почти нет минусов, да и их поиск равносилен поиску недочетов в оформлении хорошей детской книжки. Она позволяет окунуться в мир детства, оставляя после себя приятное впечатление и немного печали за то, что ее история окончена.
Silence является продолжением игры The Whispered World, которую критики в свое время приняли неоднозначно (мне лично она не понравилась). По моему мнению, этот маленький шедевр - огромный шаг вперед для Daedalic Entertainment. И самое главное, Silence является одной из тех игр, которую любят сами создатели, это бросается в глаза в каждом слове и движении персонажей. Да за одну только Рени хочется выдать им сразу кучу наград))

author: {'steamid': '76561197960620050', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1651431914}
review:
Ich habe mich vor Silence mit dem Vorgänger The Whispered World beschäftigt und war vom Humor, der Geschichte und der Erfahrung wirklich begeistert. Somit kann man sich vorstellen, dass ich mich auf die Fortsetzung hier gefreut habe.
Nach dem Starten des kleinen Spiels war ich von der Präsentation schon mal völlig begeistert. Die graphische Umsetzung ist fantastisch. Da dachte ich noch, dass das nur noch besser werden kann.
Allerdings fing Silence mich bereits in den ersten paar Spielminuten an zu nerven. Noah war mir vom Start unsympathisch. Was soll die Schweißer-/Fliegerbrille und wer hat ihm diese Hose angezogen? Hinzu kamen die ständigen Unterbrechungen im Spielfluß durch längere Animationen und Zwischensequenzen. Wirklich flüssig spielen war so nicht drin. Ach ja, dann gab es ja noch die Ladebildschirme, die scheinbar mit angezogener Handbremse ausgeführt wurden. Alles in allem gleicht Silence eher einem Animationsfilm mit eingeworfenen, kurzen Rätseleinlagen. Und wo bitte war der Humor? Dieses Sequel zu Whispered World ist so völlig anders. Auch wurden die ganze Welt nicht wirklich erklärt. Wo sind die Eltern. Wo kommt Renie her? Warum der Krieg. Wieso flüchten nur sie beide in den 'Bunker'. War es überhaupt ein Bunker? Warum ist Sadwick so ein Miesepeter? Und wieso ist diese Fortsetzung so ganz und gar anders? .... Der einzige Lichtblick ist Spot, dieser scheint sich nicht wirklich verändert zu haben

Ich will nicht sagen, dass Silence ein schlechtes Spiel ist. Das sicherlich nicht, doch mit dem Rückblick auf The whispered world ist es eben nicht das was ich erwartet habe. Würde ich whispered World noch uneingeschränkt empfehlen, so würde ich hier nicht so einfach eine Empfehlung aussprechen. Es ist so völlig anders und an vielen Stellen irgendwie deprimierend.

Wer ein typische Adventure erwartet, sollte die Finger von diesem, ich will mal vorsichtig 'interaktivem Film' sagen, lassen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333038019', 'num_games_owned': 359, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1651315671}
review:
怎么说呢……美术是真的太牛太牛了
2D3D建模都让我觉得这不应该是个指向解谜游戏
差不多就是每一个场景都能截图那种，人物3D表情捕捉都让我觉得这就是部电影吧！
可惜就是……剧情真的不知所云，人物塑造非常失败。
无论是哥哥还是凯拉，都莫名其妙，所以我从头到尾只能喜欢那只跟在身旁的毛毛虫斑斑
然后世界观我看了一下，貌似不打第一作压根不知道这在说啥

最后结局也是让我无了大语
[spoiler]虽然是反战题材，但一个是哥哥活了一个是妹妹活了就没有Happy Ending这制作组你确定？ [/spoiler]

就像只有画面好看的电影而没有好看的内容我觉得不能推荐一样。
另外解谜也并没有特别吸引，后面有些重复甚至烦躁

打折入的，原价就算了吧（其实打折也只能当欣赏美术设定集

author: {'steamid': '76561198312366444', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1651158944}
review:
게임 자체는 재밌는데 조작감이 너무 짜증난다.
마우스 클릭도 아니라 마우스 자체를 움직여서 당기거나 미는 그런게 너무 싫다
이건 그래도 백번 양보해서 할 만한데 마우스를 이리저리 움직여서 중심 잡아야하는게 너무 짜증난다.
심지어 이걸 타임어택으로 하다닛 ㅠㅠㅠ 
너무 짜증나서 게임은 아직 3장? 정도인데 중간에 리뷰 쓰러 왔다.
게임 도중 저장도 없는게 짜증난다.

다 플레이 한 후 비추에서 추천으로 바꿈

장점 : 
내용이랑 게임은 나름 재미었음
애들 말장난 초반 말장난도 재밌고
퍼즐도 나름 재밌음

단점 : 
퍼즐 A->B하면 되겠구나 하고 바로 풀고 싶은데
그 사이에 A-C-D-E-F-B를 해줘야한다는 점;
CDEF를하고주인공이 어 안되네? B를 해야겠다! 
하고 깨달아야되서 화면 이리저리 돌아다녀야되는게 짱남

마우스로 클릭이 아니라 당기기 밀기 균형 맞추기 등을 해야되는데 마우스 조작감 꽝임
마우스가 사라지기도 해서 겜 2번이나 껐다킴
저장기능도 없고 스킵기능도 없어서 같은 대화 영상 2번이나 보고 
또 보기 싫어서 억지로 엔딩까지 밀었다. 

스토리 옆에 어른들 암것도 안하고 이 여자애한테만 시키는거 좀 짜증난다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111334373', 'num_games_owned': 642, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1650908996}
review: This is the best point and click adventure game that I have ever played, and one of the best games that I have ever played. I really don't want to go into too much details, but this game essentially combines a story focused experience, however, with an actually pretty great point and click puzzle adventure experience that was absolutely amazing from the beginning to the end. The puzzles were perfectly balanced, not too easy or too hard, the gameplay was really fun and satisfying, and the characters and especially the setting and world building is just so interesting, beautiful, and unique. It reminds me a lot of classic point and click adventure games when it comes to its charm along with the advantages of being a newer game. The writing is also, just so good. This game is literally a perfect 10/10 game for me, and I highly recommend it.

review:
美术满分，很喜欢这种类似皮克斯的风格
立意很不错，75吧
剧情转折迷惑，突兀感严重，突出个虎头蛇尾，但另一方面多少有点纳尼亚传奇的感觉，60

算了算总分还是能及格的，瑕不掩瑜，瑜不掩瑕，缺点挺大，亮点也挺大

author: {'steamid': '76561198873617314', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 803, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1650716236}
review:
這家公司早期出過許多點擊冒險遊戲 :
Deponia系列
The Whispered World
A New Beginning
The Dark Eye: Chains of Satinav
Memoria
The Night of the Rabbit等
喜歡這類型遊戲的玩家應該對時常90% OFF的The Daedalic Armageddon Bundle不陌生
這類型遊戲的特色不外乎
精緻的2D手繪風格
經常要對同一物件做多種指令的繁瑣流程
令人匪夷所思 毫無邏輯 的解謎方式
因此遊戲的節奏相當緩慢 加上時常卡到深處無怨尤
往往全破兩輪是家常便飯 其中一次是在YouTube上Silence作為十周年紀念作
跟之前的遊戲對比有許多不一樣的革新
除了發行ps4 xboxone家機版本
pc上支援手把操作外
更淺顯易懂的解謎
取消了道具欄跟道具合成
採行一次性觸發指令
大大簡化了過往繁複的遊戲方式
在畫面上採用3d腳色建模配合該公司拿手的的2d精緻手繪背景
透過色調的統一 營造出有如童話繪本般的視覺效果
相信看過的人都會被其所吸引
因此在用手把玩Silence時感受不到過往點擊冒險遊戲的頓感
更像是在玩動作冒險遊戲
在故事上
其實Silence並非獨立作品
而是The Whispered World的續作
但steam的商店頁面並沒有提到
至於會不會有銜接上的問題
就我個人的觀點
(我是看了artbook才知道原來前面還有個The Whispered World )
以及大部份玩家的反應
其實並不會 頂多只覺得有點突兀 好像前面少演了一段一樣
但故事的進展很快的會讓玩家專注當下
事實上Silence開場十分鐘就已經把The Whispered World全部的來龍去脈
及世界觀全部講完了 只不過第一次接觸Silence的玩家大概就聽過不作任何他想
下面就讓我來解說一下The Whispered World
在主角諾亞(noah)九歲時臥病在床 長時間陷入昏迷 這時候他作了一個夢
關於一個叫做薩德維克(sadwick)的小丑帶著一隻可以任意變形的綠色毛毛蟲 斑斑(spot)
要拯救(毀滅)世界(Silentia)的故事
在薩德維克歷經千辛萬苦抵達皇宮的深處
他只看到一面鏡子 在鏡像中一個男孩透過鏡子映射出現實的景象並告訴他
你的人生到此為僅是一場虛幻 世界的全部只不過是諾亞的夢境
男孩告訴薩德維克可以繼續過你的日子 或是砸毀鏡子 讓現實中的諾亞從夢境醒來
在The Whispered World的最後 薩德維克雖然無法接受但還是側隱之心發作下選擇砸毀鏡子
(遊戲的staff中 也有一些關於世界觀的彩蛋
Silentia的許多人事物都是諾亞現實中的投射
例如序言家莎娜是諾亞的老師 石頭兄弟是路邊的兩顆石頭........等)
諾亞甦醒的7年後 世界爆發戰爭 當初在病床邊照顧他的老爸早已死亡
父母雙亡的諾亞跟他的妹妹雷妮(renie)住進孤兒院
照顧妹妹的諾亞時常對雷妮講述他當年在夢中的薩德維克冒險故事
接下來就是Silence的劇情了因此假如先玩過The Whispered World
對Silence裡面的對話比較容易進入狀況
比如雷妮口中當初薩德維克搭著飛天火車到皇宮 諾亞為什麼會自稱是Silence的帝王等.........
加上一些前作出現的人事物 真的有重回Silentia的感覺
其實像steam這樣的安排也不錯
把Silence當本傳 The Whispered World當前傳來玩
更是添加了Silence的神祕感以及讓人想回去玩The Whispered World的衝動
所以我是先玩Silence再玩The Whispered World最後在重新完一遍Silence
再來就是關於結局了
Silence前半給人滿滿的歡樂(雷妮真的笑點十足)
最後卻丟給你揪心的選擇
不論是The Whispered World或是Silence
所要傳達的意念都是相同
只不過Silence的演出更有說服力 催淚的力道也更為強烈:
人是要活在美麗但卻是虛假的夢境裡
抑或是要勇敢面對殘酷且痛苦的現實

author: {'steamid': '76561198044161322', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1650245191}
review:
A very short point and click adventure game.

Pros:
- gorgeous artstyle, some backgrounds and cutscenes are stunning
- an option to skip puzzles is given

Cons:
- many references to the prequel (The Whispered World) but there is no summary, like a 'previously...' cutscene. This can leave players somewhat baffled as to the characters and what's going on
- very short, not many characters and the ones that are there aren't really developed
- dialogue between the characters feels awkward
- story pacing feels off. You try to decipher the location of another rebel and he turns out to be 3 screens away, you get to the port and somehow you're on a ship, etc. It feels like some scenes are missing
- voice acting can be pretty bad, Renie in particular
- puzzles are very simple

Get this if you really like point and clicks, but if you must play this, at least wait for a sale .

author: {'steamid': '76561198082818027', 'num_games_owned': 407, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1650205412}
review:
[전혀 몰입되지 않는 스토리와 구시대적인 시스템]
 다이달릭 엔터테이먼트의 고질적인 문제가 다시 제기되다! 오랜만에 재밌어보이는 포인트 앤 클릭 게임이었으나, 데포니아를 만든 개발사일 것이라고는 생각하지 못했습니다. 데포니아때 가지고 있던 문제를 그대로 답습한 것이 아쉽습니다.

 데포니아 때도 느꼇지만 스토리가 다소 붕 뜹니다. 스토리가 중간부터 급진적으로 진행되거나 화자에게 주는 정보가 너무 제한적이라 어렵습니다. 이는 어찌보면 전작의 후속편이라 그럴수도 있겠으나, 전작의 출시일이 아주 고대인 것을 감안하면 누가 그 게임을 감안하고 이 게임을 플레이 할까요? 그것을 완전히 포기하고 이해할 수 있게 만드는 것이 옳았다고 생각합니다.

 또한, 중간중간에 나오는 컷씬에 스킵버튼이 없는 것이 너무나도 치명적입니다. 가뜩이나 몰입이 잘 안되는 스토리인데 아주 스킵버튼이 없는게 너무너무 짜증납니다. 게임만 하려고 해도 컷씬이 많아도 너무 많습니다. 한 구역 넘어갈때마다 컷씬을 왜 봐야하는지 모르겠습니다. 게다가 원숭이 섬의 비밀같은 경우, 고전게임임에도 불구하고 더블클릭으로 탐구시간을 획기적으로 줄이는 기능이 있었습니다. 이 게임엔 없습니다.. 마치 사이베리아 1을 플레이 하는 듯한 갑갑한 기분입니다

 그래도 그래픽의 발전은 훌륭하게 생각하고 있습니다. 다만 그 뿐이란 것이 문제입니다. 다른 리뷰에선 편의성을 향상했다고 하는데, 그것은 맞는 부분입니다. 하지만 대체적으로 스토리가 그닥 몰입되지 않고, 여러모로 불편한 부분이 많아서 시간낭비라는 기분이 듭니다. [플레이하는 내내 지루했습니다]

author: {'steamid': '76561198151405545', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1650047179}
review:
Jde o pokračování vynikající adventury Whispered world.
Hrdina prvního dílu, který se dostal ze světa fantazie do reality, žije spolu s malou sestřičkou ve zničeném městě, kde zuří válka.
Když na jejich bunkr spadne bomba, upadají spolu se sestrou opět do fantastického světa Silence, ve kterém falešná královna hledá poslední střípek zrcadla, aby obnovila svou moc.
Narazíte na rebely, kteří ji chtějí svrhnout. Na nebezpečné Seekery, kteří úlomek také hledají. Nesmí chybět věrný pomocínk Spot :) z prvního dílu. A spousta dalších postav a zvířátek. 
Grafika je moc povedená, logické úkoly jsou tak akorát. Střídání hry za různé postavy ozvláštňuje děj. Potud klady.

Bohužel, hra je jiného typu než první díl. Spíše než o adventuru jde o interaktivní film. Navíc poměrně krátký. Bez větších záseků jsem hru dohrál za 5 hodin.
Děj je poměrně kontroverzní. Už začátek z bombardovaného města byl hodně krutý. Když se pak přepnete do pohádkového světa, ale pořád víte, že tam vlastně nejste, je to divný pocit. Vím že daedalic se do takových témat pouští často a jeho adventury nekončí tak, jak jsme zvyklí odjinud. Jsou tím docela vyhlášení.
Ale myslím si, že tady to už trochu přehnali :) Andersen hadra.

nicméně s tímto varováním vám hru doporučuju. jen ji nepouštějte dětem !

author: {'steamid': '76561198009156904', 'num_games_owned': 756, 'num_reviews': 278, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 764, 'last_played': 1649987053}
review:
ผมเกลียดเกมนี้นะ

The Whispered World เป็นหนึ่งในเกม Point & Click ที่ผมชอบมากๆ เป็นเนื้อเรื่องในโลกแฟนตาซี ที่ตัวตลกผู้เศร้าสร้อย Sadwick ได้รับชะตาที่จะต้องไปช่วยดินแดนที่กำลังถูกทำลายด้วยการปลุกราชาที่หลับอยู่ แต่ไปๆมาๆปรากฏว่ามันเกี่ยวข้องกับเด็กชายคนนึงที่อยู่คนละโลก แล้วเกมก็จบลงตรงนี้

แล้วไม่รู้ Daedelic กินยาลืมเขย่าขวดรึไงถึงคิดว่า "เรามาทำภาคต่อ ด้วยการโยนทุกอย่างที่ทำให้เกมภาคแรกสนุกทิ้งกันเถอะ!"

และ Silence เป็นเนื้อเรื่องของเด็กชายคนนี้นี่แหละ (แต่ดันเปลี่ยนหน้าตาและช่วงเวลาเฉยเลย แต่เอาเหอะ) ที่อยู่ในเมืองกับน้องสาวที่มีสงครามกลางเมืองคร่าชีวิตผู้คนไป จนทั้งสองถูกพายังไปโลกของ Sadwick (ที่เกมตั้งชื่อว่า Silence) และพลัดหลงกัน

ทีนี้ไอ้ความกากของเกมคือเกมทิ้งทุกอย่างที่ทำให้ภาคแรกสนุกออกไปหมด เกมกลายเป็นแนว Sequence Clicker ที่เราต้องกดของตามลำดับให้ถูกต้องถึงจะผ่านได้ ไม่มีการเลือกบทสนทนา (บทสนทนาส่วนใหญ่บังคับและถ้ามีให้เลือกตอบก็มีแค่สองตัวเลือก) ไม่มีระบบ Inventory ของเก็บและใช้ในซีนเดียวกัน ไม่มีโลกเปิดกว้างให้สำรวจ/แก้ปริศนา จริงอยู่ที่มีบางช่วงที่เราสลับซีนระหว่างสองซีนได้ แต่ก็แค่นั้นแหละ มันคือมีสองซีนให้เล่น ไม่ได้มีโลกเปิดกว้างเหมือนภาคแรกเลย

ตัวละครในเกมโคตรจะ Undeveloped ไม่มีสเน่ห์ ไม่มีความน่าสนใจ และไม่ได้ช่วยอะไรในเนื้อเรื่องเลย เนื้อเรื่องบางจุดก็ห่วยสุดๆ ตัวละครทำอะไรไม่มีเหตุผล ไม่มีความสนุกอะไรเลย

สิ่งเดียวที่ดีในเกมนี้คืออาร์ทสไตล์ ที่ทำฉากเป็น 3D แต่ให้ฟีลลิ่งเหมือนภาพวาด 2D แค่นั้นแหละ

อย่าเสียเวลาเล่น

author: {'steamid': '76561198203957856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1649586020}
review:
SIlence hat mich wirklich sehr überrascht und mitgenommen. Die Story ist sehr liebevoll und auch das Art-Design. Zudem ist das Spiel sehr niedlich und Spot (die Raupe) ist der wohl beste Bestandteil dieser Reihe. Die Ideen die für den Spielverlauf aufkommen, sind außergewöhnlich und abwechslungsreich. Etwas missfallen sind mir jedoch einige Charaktere wie z.B. Kyra und teilweise sogar Sadwick, sie wirkten teilweise unstimmig und zu grausam für mich. Die kleine Schwester Renie ist jedoch sehr süß und ihr Ehrgeiz ist außerordentlich hoch. :) 

Nun gehe ich noch auf die Verbesserungen/Verschlechterungen bezüglich des Vorgängers The Whispered World ein

[u]Verbesserungen[/u]
[list]
 [*]Bezüglich Grafik und Design ein riesen Meilenstein nach vorne
 [*]Spots Form kann schneller geändert werden
[/list]

[u]Verschlechterungen[/u]
[list]
 [*]Weniger komplexes Denken von Nöten
 [*]Gegenstände können nicht kombiniert oder spezifisch aufgerufen/benutzt werden
 [*]Weniger Dialogmöglichkeiten
 [*]Kaum Herausforderungen
[/list]

Silence ist dennoch ein sehr guter Nachfolger und absolut empfehlenswert.
