author: {'steamid': '76561197975018345', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1649309487}
review:
[h1]Silence was very short but sweet[/h1]

Silence took me about 4 hours to complete, so its a really short game compared to games I normally play. It was a good story in which two kids are protagonists. Game is intended for younger audience and its a typical point and click adventure and I enjoyed it, but I remember better games of that genre that had better stories. Overall, the game is beautiful, well voiced, and playable with children.

[b]Pros[/b]
+ Beautiful graphics
+ Spot is a nice helper with lots of abilities
+ Emphasis on bond between children

[b]Cons[/b]
- Some achievements
- Very short game

Overall this game is a rewarding one time experience. There is very little replay value unless you want your children to experience this game as well. Its a very short story presented in beautiful way. This is not a must play by any means and I would not recommend it at full price. If you like point and click games and may share it with children, then buy it during steam sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307912971', 'num_games_owned': 833, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1649263491}
review: 战争从来不可能以喜剧收尾

author: {'steamid': '76561198286575302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 389, 'last_played': 1649173262}
review:
一开始感觉故事讲不清楚，节奏比较拉跨，第二章过后剧情逐渐升华了，使人想知道结局和各个人物后来的命运，虽然细节里埋下的很多包袱最终都没做解释，但总体还算完整。

人物塑造是最大的弊病，尤其男主角的这种固执、不屑、无知又任性的人设，很让人讨厌，他一开口我都有马上删掉游戏的冲动。
其他人物背景交代也极其不清楚，给玩家极大的疏离感；对话看似很多，但都交谈不到点上，都是自言自语，人物之间的感情交互很差，很多刻意的矛盾冲突也是莫名其妙；所有会说话的角色，都不如鲁比人和斑斑有灵魂。

音乐比较优美，很多带有雕塑的场景也比较有意思，有着对一些侧面剧情的隐喻。
总的来说是款精致的小品！

author: {'steamid': '76561198840758559', 'num_games_owned': 35, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1649413762}
review:
打完之后真的沉默了很久
沉寂世界的战争会停止，现实生活中的战争不会停止。
诺亚和蕾妮的故事在沉寂世界还会继续，但是在现实生活中注定只会剩下一人，不论活下来的是谁，都非常令人痛心。
战争带来了幻想中的沉寂世界，也带走了现实中的兄妹二人。希望以后不会有战争。

author: {'steamid': '76561199224559114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1649845995}
review:
[h1]Un gioco tranquillo[/h1]
Silence è un titolo punta e clicca con una storia, seppure triste, molto bella. L'ambientazione si accompagna bene alla trama grazie ai colori e ai vari personaggi che si incontrano lungo il cammino.
Per ogni scenario ci saranno dei piccoli puzzle da risolvere ma niente di impegnativo. 
Le ultime fasi sembrano un po' affrettate (come se gli sviluppatori avessero finito il budget o cose simili) per cui oltre ad arrivare subito al finale, si resta con un grosso punto interrogativo stampato in testa su quale sia il destino dei vari personaggi incontrati durante la fiaba.
Guardando i contenuti extra, si ha la percezione che molto sia stato "tagliato" dal gioco; peccato perché seppur breve (4-5 ore a dire tanto), la storia è molto emozionale e lo stesso finale si apre a mille interpretazioni diverse. 
Consiglio il titolo proprio per come si conclude e suggerisco di leggere i post della community in merito alle varie interpretazioni.
Voto complessivo: 6.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197970161817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1648664634}
review:
Visually, a really beautiful game. Marco Hüllen is a great illustrator whose Art I already loved in the predecessor "The Whispered World". The character design is lovely, the atmosphere beautiful, and so you have all the ingredients for a really good game. You'd think. 

But the plot seems so fragmented and sometimes rushed, the characters pale and unimpressive and sometimes their behavior is not understandable at all. You constantly have the feeling that there is more background to the characters in the game, but it's as if this content was simply removed afterwards. Why certain things happen to them, where they actually come from and why they do what they do - you don't find out. And that's where there would have been so much potential. I feel like I've only played half of a game that originally wanted to be so much more. Nothing really fits together, the game stumbles from setting to setting and doesn't even manage to unite them in the storytelling in a comprehensible way. Even the ending seems rushed, quickly cobbled together and not properly thought out. 

On top of that: the puzzle design is ridiculous and can hardly be described as such. I am sad after finishing this game. Because it could have been so incredibly much more. This wasted potential is at the same time a waste of all the high-quality art this title has in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121911357', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1015, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1015, 'last_played': 1648235238}
review:
Finalmente un punta e clicca rilassante e fluente, dove non è necessario gestire un inventario dispersivo e non si fa a meno di divertenti e assurdi puzzle. È sicuramente un ottimo punto di partenza per i punta e clicca del futuro!
Ottime animazioni, piacevole grafica e personaggi memorabili. Anche se la storia è breve e lineare è memorabile.
Consiglio di cominciarlo dopo aver visto un walktrough del capitolo precedente: The Whispered World.
In saldo si può trovare a un prezzo quasi regalato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053133577', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 1292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1647800214}
review:
Beautiful in the most literal sense, both visually and sonically. I expect one [i]should[/i] play the prequel The Whispered World to get the most out of this game or even most anything period, and while I don't recommend that one unless to the sturdiest of point-and-click fans, this sequel still has "the series" well worth it.

Played specifically now due to being promised by other reviews that it would last just some 4 or so hours but it did not for me; I'd expect probably double that for a leisurely, walkthrough-less first playthrough. Don't use a controller: some things (e.g. catching the  Lumi at the marketplace) are literally impossible with one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004496223', 'num_games_owned': 1048, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1646572500}
review:
Silence is an impressive point & click title featuring stunning visuals and a heartfelt story. It is the best title I've played from Daedalic Entertainment and somewhat of a hidden gem on Steam. It commonly goes on a hefty sale or is bundled, finding its way into many Steam libraries already, but sadly falls victim to gamers backlogs. I highly recommend this title to all story and adventure enthusiasts; it is one that I will not easily forget.

[b] [u]Pros[/u] [/b]
[list]
    [*] Absolutely gorgeous visuals
    [*] Metaphorical cutesy fairy-tale story with dark and poignant undertones about war
    [*] Truly adorable characters & voice acting (Renie & Spot)
    [*] Cinematic experience with many cutscenes throughout
    
[/list]
[b] [u]Cons[/u] [/b]
[list]
    [*] Some characters monologue comments became very repetitive
    [*] No chapter select 
[/list]

[h1]Story[/h1]
Silence is a sequel to the developers first title, The Whispered World (2009). As usual, I launched this game completely blind and was unaware it was a sequel. Luckily, Silence can be played without having any knowledge of its predecessor, although I imagine there are some extra references and Easter eggs for those with a broader understanding.

Silence’s opening scene absolutely took me by surprise. Beginning with a dramatic cinematic cutscene of children running to a bunker to escape an air raid. Having played Daedalic's previous famous titles (such as Deponia), I figured I knew what I was getting into with Silence, but I was quickly proven wrong. There are multiple protagonists in the game, with the main 3 being Spot (the cutest caterpillar shapeshifter you ever did see), Noah and Renie. Noah and Renie are siblings, Noah is the eldest and takes responsibility for his little sisters’ safety, dedicating his every decision with her wellbeing in mind.

Noah and Renie had conjured up a fairy-tale universe called Silence and seem to use this world as an escape to their war-ravaged reality. After the bunker gets ruthlessly bombarded with bombs, the game swiftly swaps to the world of Silence. The polar opposite of the characters real lives, a sunny place with signs of life, fantastical creatures and a castle that is not merely ruins. A place to escape. A place of hope. In this fantasy world, the siblings meet the resistance fighters who are battling the evil Seekers and the false queen. Renie and Noah must join forces to bring peace once more to the world of Silence and overthrow the false leader.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2775014585

Despite this dark contrast, majority of Silence is light-hearted, cute and bright. It could easily be mistaken for a children’s movie, judging solely by the characters and visuals, yet it is so much more. 


[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Gameplay is quite simple, as opposed to the previous Daedalic titles I had played. It maintains the point & click style but there is no inventory system, thus the puzzles are immediately solvable. There is a heavy cinematic and narrative focus which alters the pacing and puzzle difficulty level.  I must admit, I was never a fan of Daedalic's most prominent titles and found them to be over convoluted and frustrating, but I adore the direction they took with Silence.

There are 3 playable characters, and each have their own abilities, especially Spot. Spot is a caterpillar that can shapeshift into a flat and bulbous form. It also can ingest certain liquids to gain new abilities such as water, fire etc. Puzzles are fairly straight forward, and I never found myself completely stuck. There are some choices throughout the game which can lead to different achievements (pacifist or sadist). There are also general conversational choices, but these seemed to have little impact on the story overall. Regardless, I liked their addition, and it made the characters feel more personal. 

Silence is a very short casual game, ranging from 3-6 hours for one playthrough, but has a staggering number of achievements for such a short game. Although there is no chapter select, so the whole game would need to be played from the beginning for achievement hunters and those looking to unlock a different ending.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2773585640


[b] [u] Puzzles [/u] [/b]
As mentioned earlier, puzzles are relatively simple, and most will revolve around Spot. An example is when Spot has to navigate a dragon to obtain a shard fragment. To do this, Spot must change forms multiple times and avoid being pushed backwards by the many obstacles in his way. There is no inventory system, so every item is usable within the section the item was found. This is typically displayed with a highlight, so there is no frustration of endlessly clicking on objects and trying to combine them. Furthermore, there are occasional balance minigames where players must centre the mouse to avoid falling, or to move an item players must hold M1 and move the mouse in the specified direction (like Quantic Dream games). 

Personally, I loved the casual puzzle design and lack of frustrating moments. It draws the focus to the narrative whilst keeping players engaged.


[h1]Visuals & Sound[/h1]
The universe of Silence is gorgeous, there is no denying it. Most settings have soft pastel hues, and the long-range shots are breathtaking. A great contrast to the ferociously cold and drab reality for Renie and Noah. The character designs are adorable. Renie and Spot are extremely charming in their cute, child-like way. Renie's naivety and pure innocence reflect in both her appearance and her voice. Further exaggerated by her trusting and forgiving demeanour. 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2772654251

The audio is another big positive, especially the voice actors. Each voice is so vibrant and dramatic, mimicking that of a children’s fairy tale. Especially the British talking stones! The standout for me was definitely Renie's voice. Her unfeigned innocence in the face of war was both uplifting yet simultaneously melancholic.


[h1]Technical & Stats [/h1]
[quote][b]This game was played using a controller and with the following PC specs.:[/b]
Intel i5-9400 2.9 GHz
16GB RAM
GeForce RTX 2060 6GB
2560x1440 resolution
HDD
Windows 10[/quote]
[b]Playtime:[/b] 5.5 hours, can be finished in as little as 3 hours. 
[b] Controller Recommended? [/b] Player choice. It does feature full controller support.
[b]Replayability value:[/b]  Yes, to obtain the other endings or unlock the many achievements. However, there is no chapter select.


[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
Silence is a standout point & click title. Its poignant story shines right through from the very beginning. It has a cinematic approach and therefore has less of a focus on complex puzzles, perfect for a casual narrative experience. 
Despite its cutesy art style and fantastical story, the harsh undertones of war are ever present, and Silence's emotional narrative will stay with me for some time. In a world savaged by conflict, Silence's portrayal of innocence and war is forever relevant, and I highly recommend this to all story lovers. This will be one of my favourites that I have played this year and if it is sitting, forgotten in your library already, do yourself a favour and put it at the top of your to play list.

Disclaimer: Received for free from AEG. Thank you, Glenn!

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34936724][quote]Follow my curator page, [b]Cookie Reviews[/b], if you enjoyed this review and want to see more like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099662596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1646536254}
review: I have very mixed feelings about this one. I can't really click "don't recommend," because the game isn't *bad*, just a rather lackluster follow-up to The Whispered World. Somehow knowing you're in a dream world from the beginning drains something of the magic from the scene. It's been so long since I played Whispered World that all of the references ended up making me wonder what I was missing, rather than calling up warm feelings of nostalgia. The characters are underdeveloped, and the dialogue and voice acting leave a little something to be desired. Plus, the game is *short*—half as long as The Whispered World. I also found the ending to be much less satisfying. The puzzles, at least, are moderately interesting and generally reasonable. Overall, I'd say play the Whispered World, instead; but, if you're interested in a bit of a follow-on, you can give Silence a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025070619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 404, 'last_played': 1659823491}
review:
Was surprised to realize this was actually a "Whispered World 2" but the naming was mediocre and boring "Silence" with unfamiliar face in the banner. Anyway, after plunging into it, it was very enjoyable journey and 5/5 stars!

The praise:
- Heartwarming (and i used this word, about, never) story
- AAA graphics, animations and camera shots
- good balance between puzzles and cinematographics
- Renie and Spot
- few puzzles but they are challenging enough

The nag:
- could've been longer (passed in 6h)
- sounds are imbalanced (too loud speaking compared to surroundings) and subtitles did not work
- Why not name it after Whispered World?

author: {'steamid': '76561197986430789', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 717, 'last_played': 1629222975}
review:
It's a nice Point'n'Click adventure. However, it does seem a bit too short and at times it feels as if it just scratches the surface.
A good game but it feels like it could have been more. By in large the gameplay was better than "The Whispered World" but the 'world' lacked the depth of the first game... Also, the ending was a bit too predictable for those who played "The Whispered World"!

Visuals, voice acting and music are great. It's a good game and I hope that we see more games set in this universe.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052980230', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1645365513}
review:
One of the most enjoyable point-and-click adventures I've played. It has beautiful locations, interesting creatures, excellent voice-acting. I was never feeling bored (and that means something, because usually I do get bored while playing this type of games).
It is rather short though, but then, a fairytale isn't supposed to be long. And Silence is just that – a fairytale (well, may be a bit dark one, but it still has hope, and hope is the most important thing in a fairytale).

author: {'steamid': '76561198126711666', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 568, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1645109953}
review:
Silence - сиквел еще одного квеста Daedalic Whispered World. По сравнению с первой частью здесь завезли красивую псевдо-3D графику...и на мой взгляд это единственный плюс по сравнению с оригиналом. Длительность стала меньше, игра сместилась ближе к игровому кино, чем к квесту, странная система сохранений (автоматическая, при переходе между локациями) из-за чего появились долгие загрузки игровых экранов. 
В Silence мы играем попеременно за ГГ первой части - Ноя (Седвика) и его младшую сестру Рени. Попав под бомбардировку они перемещаются в Ускользающий мир, и зная его суть, пытаются найти путь обратно. В целом продолжение столь же печально-депрессивное, как и первая игра, хотя отличный дизайн и музыка помогают вжиться в историю.

7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047890068', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1644794471}
review:
Beautiful, clever game and amazing kinda-sequel to "The Whispered World", with a lot of throwbacks. It's also a good spiritual successor to the first one because it plays on the same themes but manages to still be it's own story. Even the puzzles are not quite as non-sensical as they usually are in this type of game. In other words: totally recommended! 

(play the first one, too, it's worth it :-))

author: {'steamid': '76561198160125251', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 812, 'last_played': 1644616487}
review:
Es un juego precioso. Se disfruta mucho tanto gráficamente como por la historia y la forma que tiene de contarla. Precisamente vale la pena por lo anterior mencionado, porque si lo que buscas es un juego con el sistema de point & click básico y que te estruje un poco la sesera, lamentablemente no lo vas a encontrar aquí. No tiene inventario y las acciones son más bien un tanto automáticas (no hay inventario) y con nula dicifultad. Pero no por ello es un mal juego, al contrario, simplemente se toma una forma distinta de proceder donde prioriza facilitar la historia al jugador por encima del resto de cosas.

Aunque se pueda disfrutar sin haber jugado a su predecesor The Whispered World, recomiendo altamente hacerlo en orden, en Silence hay muchos guiños a la anterior aventura, así como cameos de personajes que ya se vieron y eso le añade un toque entrañable si no te has saturado ya con las dos criaturiitas que más protagonismo adquieren en el juego: Renie y Spot.

author: {'steamid': '76561199217533012', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1644595010}
review:
Не люблю писать отрицательные отзывы к проектам, за которые даже не заплатил фулл-цену, но, увы, врать мне тоже не хоцца.

К сожалению, рекомендовать не могу. Игра красивая, но глупая, пресная, пустая и скучная. С первой минуты она вызывает восторг своим визуалом и заделом на драму, обещая всю глубину трагичности ситуации за осознанием положения главных героев. С первой частью я знаком слабо, забросив её почти сразу же, потому как на дух не переношу сам жанр. Эту же игру купил случайно, купившись на визуал. 
По отношению к игре никаких тёплых ощущений не возникло. Впечатление почти сразу же испортили характерные жанру возня со значками и бестолковыми взаимодействиями, на коленке слопаченный сюжет, вырезанные из папье-маше персонажи, даже не старающиеся отработать свои диалоги, призванные заполнить удушающую пустоту мира и происходящих в них событий. Ощущение складывается, что некогда это был более полноценный проект, который просто порезали, как фильм на монтаже, выкатив в итоге угловатое чудо-юдо. 
Не дотянуто ничего. Так называемый "шепчущий мир"- это жалкий сборник малофункциональных закоулков. Так называемая его история- жалкая краткая сводка из газеты. Так называемые события- калька. Неполноценные. 
Я не могу назвать это игрой. Мне жалко потраченного времени, которое я потратил лишь потому, что не нашёл альтернативы. Всю игру меня преследовало ощущение поломанности и скуки, а так же мысли о том, что и как я бы переделал. Нет, у меня нет никаких навыков по созданию видеоигр, визуальной постановке и т.п., однако с художественным направлением я связан очень тесно, ибо сам тяготею к драме и трагедии. Для начала игру стоило сделать в другом жанре. Не жалкая покликушка мышкой, а что-то вроде полноценной бродилки, ну, ладно, пусть даже теллтейловский квест, но с некоторой свободой в передвижении и взаимодействии. Речь не идёт о кинематографичности, но обеспечить наибольшее погружение в атмосферу игры просто необходимо, а это невозможно в имеющихся условиях. Расширить ареал событий, добавить экранного времени персонажам, раскрыть и мотивировать их, усадить перипетии сюжета конфликтами- всё это дополнило бы картину, сделало её намного лучше. Минимизировать ребячливые гы-гы-моменты, добавить трагичности. Подвести к вау-повороту правильно, с нужным накалом, с аутентичной реакцией персонажа на него и из этого вывести формулу его эмоционального развития, обосновать его мотивацию к тем или иным действиям. Чтоб не получилось тяп-ляп, как оно есть сейчас. 
Всё это стоило сделать хотя бы ради того, чтобы персонажами получилось проникнуться, чтобы им можно было сопереживать. И чтобы концовка, а именно финальное решение, принималась не как спасительная кнопочка по "да-да-да, давай скорее заканчивать это хавно", а как действительно тяжёлый выбор, одна из двух альтернатив, достойных принятия, имеющие свои плюсы и минусы, оба предпочтительные настолько, что проще не выбирать вовсе. 

Резюмировать мне нечем. Игра не для меня.

author: {'steamid': '76561198986569114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 345, 'playtime_forever': 738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 738, 'last_played': 1644591636}
review: En mi opinión la saga de Deponia es la joya de Daedalic Entertainment, pero Silence es un juego que debe de ser jugado y lo recomiendo muchísimo para aquellos amantes de los point-and-click. Además, Spot es lindo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129212819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1644509090}
review:
I enjoyed this one as far as point and click games go. Definitely not difficult like some. But with most point and click games I find the puzzles rarely make sense and you find yourself clicking randomly on things for hours. For some reason the puzzles in this one just lined up for me and made sense. 

The characters are adorable. Story decent enough. Music and sounds brilliant.

Seems I could have made some major different choices in a few parts so I may give this another go some time since it wasn't too long and knowing the puzzles now will make the second playthrough faster. 

All in all at 90% off was worth every penny. Just read Daedalic closed its doors early 2021 so that's sad. Some good chill games in their library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128773602', 'num_games_owned': 1045, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1643825720}
review: Bundan daha düşük seviyede olduğunu düşündüğüm fran bowu çok severek oynamıştım ve bitirmiştim. Bu oyunun renk paleti çok hoş, manzaraları güzel ve bol bol sinematik doldurmuşlar. Müzikleri de çok harika. Hem trajik hem de tatlı bir hikayeyi anlatıyor ki fran bowun hikayesine benziyor ve çok hoşuma gitti. Neden bunu sevemeyip fran bowu çok sevdiğime gelirsek zannediyorum ki iki sebep var. Küçük olan sebep ise renk paletinin kullanımı. Bazı yerlerde vay be ne güzel çizmişler derken bazı yerlerde çok abartılıp nedense  biraz beni soğuttu. Çünkü point and click oyununda nesnelerin ne olduğunu çok rahat seçmek isterim. Gel gelelim en büyük sebebe oyun aşırı yavaş. Her anlamda yavaş. Bir yere tıklıyorsun duruyor yavaş bir şekilde fikrini belirtiyor. Farklı bir dünya olduğu için bilgi almak hoş ama en azından bizi salsan da başka yerlere doğru yürüyüp onlara da tıklasak çünkü yavaş yürüyoruz. Etkileşimlerin hepsi animasyonlu ve onlar da yavaş. 3 kere yaptığım animasyonu anlatayım size. Yanımızdaki yaratığın bir yere çıkması gerekiyor. Oraya yavaş yavaş giderken kafasını oraya çarpıyor hala yürümeye çalışıyor birkaç saniye sonra biraz gerilip fırlayıp yavaş yavaş yürümeye devam ediyor. Point and click oyunlarında bir şeyleri deneyip sonuca ulaşmamız gerekiyor bir de yanlış bir şey yapınca bu animasyonlar ve yavaşlık sayesinde vaktinin ziyan olduğu hissi çok ağır basıyor. Ondan sonra gelelim loading screenlere bilgisayarım fena değil, oyundan mı kaynaklı yoksa benden mi bilmiyorum ama loading screenleri de çok yavaş doluyor. Total war warhammer 2 de daha az beklediğimi hatırlıyorum ki oyunla loading screen simulator diye dalga geçmiştim. Bu oyun beni hantal oynanışıyla baymış olup geri kalan müziklerini, görsellerini ve o tatlı hikayesini tecrübe etmeme engel olmuştur.

author: {'steamid': '76561199149741392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1643825363}
review:
I really wanted to enjoy this game. I really did. 
It has beautiful graphics, story is interesting, but the gameplay itself is incredibly dull and boring.
There is no inventory, so anything you pick up you use right away. Puzzles are almost non existent. There's not really much to do but walk around and click on objects and listen to the story. 
It's not that I hate the game, I just wish there was more to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198336071416', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 886, 'last_played': 1637758685}
review:
[h1]Две души в Безмолвном мире[/h1]

Для начала скажу, что события Silence происходят во вселенной игры The Whispered World и являются прямым продолжением её сюжета. Поэтому, дабы понимать всё происходящее, от себя рекомендую ознакомиться с первой частью франшизы посредством прохождения или пересказом сюжета на ютубе.

История повествует о Ное и Рени - двух детях, которые успели укрыться в бункере во время бомбардировки их города самолетами. Моментально потеряв всех родных и друзей, младшенькая впадает в грусть и тоску, поэтому старший брат, чтобы успокоить сестру, начинает рассказывать ей любимую сказку о приключениях клоуна Седвика. Но не успевает он договорить, как снаружи слышится оглушительный грохот, после которого дети резко теряют сознание. Очнувшись, они замечают, что оказались в совершенно ином месте, которое было так похоже на мир из недосказанной истории. Теперь же им предстоит узнать, что происходит на самом деле, и как вернуться в их родные края.

Визуальная часть игры сильно отличается от оригинала. Если первая часть выглядела как классический квест со статичными фонами, то сейчас большинство элементов выполнено в 3D. При всем этом сказочность нового мира никак не пострадала, а даже наоборот заиграла новыми красками. Музыка тоже выполнена в лучших традициях: есть как и полюбившиеся многим знакомые мотивы, так и совершенно новые произведения.

Геймплей же претерпел значительные изменения. В игру добавили несколько новых моментов, очень сильно напоминающих элементы интерактивного кино. В одном месте нужно вовремя провести действие, где-то необходимо соблюдать баланс, двигая мышкой, и т. д. В то же время квестовая часть была упрощена. Загадки перестали выглядеть какими-то антилогичными, чего нельзя сказать о предыдущих играх студии. Инвентаря как такового не осталось: все найденные предметы применяются только в тех местах, где они должны быть использованы.

Самым большим минусом лично для меня было отсутствие нормальной системы сохранения. Нет стандартных для Даэдаликовых игр быстрых загрузок и сохранений. Всё, что мы имеем на руках: три слота, в которых можно только записать три разных прохождения, и кнопку для загрузки последней контрольной точки. Для игры такого плана это очень неудобная система, учитывая тот факт, что в ней достаточно выборов, которые пусть и не сильно, но влияют на игровой процесс. Возможно, подобное было сделано в качестве реиграбельности для второго прохождения (тем более игра сама по себе короче оригинала), либо же возникали какие-то технические проблемы. В любом случае такой недочёт создал мне проблемы с выбиванием достижением, из-за чего пришлось лишний раз перепроходить игру ради пары моментов в финальных главах.

Другие же минусы были для меня почти незначительными, но упомянуть стоит. Во-первых есть шанс словить графический баг, когда объект застывает в воздухе или же, в случае с персонажами, происходит неправильное их позиционирование. У меня такое случилось только два раза, в чем причина их возникновений я не выяснил. Ну и во-вторых, диалоги. Уж не знаю, косяк ли это локализации или нет, но разговоры в этой игре порой бывают слишком глупыми и нелогичными. Пожалуй, на этом всё.

Но в целом, игра мне понравилась, стоит ее опробовать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040811698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 429, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1643577511}
review:
Highly recommended for fans of point and click adventures, art, and a good story.

+Visuals, art style, environments
+Full voice acting
+Characters, story
+Some meaningful choices

-Autosave only
-Some puzzles are unclear and repetitive
-Some fake choices
-Side characters are underdeveloped
-Assumes too much from its lackluster prequel, The Whispered World

author: {'steamid': '76561198014817484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 267, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1643561057}
review:
Deel twee van het bekende spel waarmee je met Spot speelt, 
de rups die verschillende vormen kan aannemen.
Grafisch is dit een meesterwerk, één van de mooierer spellen 
van Deadalic, persoonlijk vind ik alle avonturen spellen goed er
uit zien van ze, maar ze hebben er een paar die er meer cartoony
uitzien en die vind ik persoonlijk iets minder leuk.

Alles is erg goed uitgewerkt en je hebt voldoende keuze in
het menu om grafisch aan te passen maar ook geluid en 
andere zaken. Er is een extra's menu met game lore etc..

Waar ik wel even aan moest wennen waren de spel mechanieken,
met name als je met toetsenbord en muis speelt en vaker
point & click avonturen spellen doet is dit toch net iets anders.
Ook is de pacing is langzamer, ze hebben zelfs een achievement
voor nooit weg klikken van ondertiteling/gesproken woord.
Dus als je dit spel doet zou ik er echt ff voor gaan zitten.

Al met al een fantastisch leuk spel met medium moeilijke 
puzzels, alle puzzels vond ik zelf erg natuurlijk en had nooit
een walkthrough nodig om de puzzels op te lossen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116344006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1643501770}
review:
Wie üblich bei Daedalic super niedliches PaC Spiel. Die Story is schön, die Grafik gewohnt gut gemacht, lediglich die Ladezeiten zwischen den Screens sind absurd lange (nein, das liegt nicht an meinem Rechner). Muss man mehr als zwei Mal hin und her, ist das bereits sehr nervig, nach 4h Spielzeit hat man bereits genug von "auf den Ladescreen warten". 
Darüber hinaus fehlt eine reguläre Spielstand speichern Funktion, man kann also nicht nochmal zurück, sondern muss, wenn Bedarf nach Achievements, alles nochmal spielen. Was, Ladescreens sei Dank, dann vermutlich doch nicht so bald passieren wird.....

author: {'steamid': '76561198888074499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1643338849}
review: **minor spoilers** - Looks pretty but only one interesting character, Renie. Some terrible game design moments - "I need to secure the chasm first." Apparently you actually need to do something seemingly unrelated in a different part of the world first and then secure the chasm! Puzzles that really wouldn't be challenging at all without intentional misdirection by the main character. "If only I had some kind of net" when if he said "bridge" you would know exactly what to do. I'm way more mad about the hours wasted on this than the $2 I spent on it...

author: {'steamid': '76561199222297545', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1643908481}
review:
中文配音给我整破防了。动态漫的声优都没这么拉跨，完完全全棒读了是吧！！！敢不敢有点情绪???老娘tm从楼梯上摔下去叫出来的卧槽都比这配音有感情！！！！！！雷尼的声音跟《成龙历险记》里的小玉的配音演员假装老太太一样，听了就没救雷尼的欲望[无语]诺亚的声优是在变身期吗？公鸭嗓。还有说英文配音好听的能不能大发慈悲给个改成英文配音的地址？
补充，3D版爱探险的朵拉

author: {'steamid': '76561198164016063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1643391974}
review:
pros

+ touching story of two siblings
+ gorgeous looking and detailed hand-drawn background artwork
+ immersive fantasy world and atmosphere
+ enjoyable puzzles. they are not too easy or overly complicated.
+ nice and relaxing soundtrack
+ three playable character
+ there is auto save
+ well made, long and fun to watch cinematic cut scenes
+ good voice acting
+ likeable and charming characters
+ when you press to space, hotspots is highlighted
+ hint system and tutorial very helpful
+ there are steam achievements and cards
+ there are two ending

cons

- frequent and long loading screens halts game's pace. narrative also could do with a little more pace
- controls and interface mechanics made for gamepad so playing this game with mouse and keyboard quite frustrating
- characters and their relationships with each other could have been developed more

Overall, this is an pretty good point and click adventure game and decent sequel to first game. i quite enjoyed and i really recommended those who are fan of first game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166274638', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1643308112}
review:
The game is just a bunch of interactive kinematics, it feels incomplete. 
If, like me, you love graphic adventures, surely this game is not for you! There is not even a freaking inventory, where am I supposed to keep and shuffle my items??? Oh.. right... there are no items to keep.
[spoiler] Of course it's so easy and fluffy, you could buy it for your 3 year old. Ah no wait! There are little girls getting blown up right at the beginning of the game and minors who take drugs by directly licking psychedelic plants. [/spoiler]
This game really sucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344353564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1642700877}
review:
What attracted me to this game was its visuals. 
Since the game was published in 2016, the game might have been such an achievement back then. However, when I played it in 2022, the rest was just okay.

Being the sequel of The Whispered World, people said that this is a stand-alone video game, which makes me disagree for the rest of 6 hours playing this game. The story was super fast; there are so many details untold, especially with the characters. I can't even empathize with what happened to them. The game's mechanics were too simple; it bores me, and the voice acting so flat it hurts me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198867764770', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 445, 'last_played': 1642899476}
review: Bought this game on sale for less than a dollar. Great story and gorgeous art style. review:
Oyun film tadında hikaye içeren, point&click ve verilen cevaplarla farklı senaryolara giden tarzda bir oyun. Gerçi her ne kadar farklı cevaplar versek de hikaye sabit bir çizgide ilerliyor gibi. Aksiyon aramayan kişiler için iyi, ama bazı kişileri de sıkabilir çünkü biraz yavaş ilerliyor hikaye. Ama bir kaç saat kafamı dinleyeyim derseniz, alınabilecek bir oyun.

Renk skalası baya iyi, şimdiye kadar gördüğüm en iyi pastel renkler olabilir.

[Spoiler]Renie[/Spoiler] çok tatlı, umarım onun gibi bir kızım olur.

author: {'steamid': '76561199107125557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 781, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 781, 'last_played': 1653828090}
review:
Histoire très touchante et pleine de poésie. Les graphismes sont très beaux et la BO est géniale. 
Je ne comprends pas certains commentaires très mitigés, personnellement cette histoire m'a vraiment transportée jusqu'à la fin. Ni trop longue, ni trop courte. Les énigmes ne sont pas difficiles, idéal pour ne pas se prendre la tête, et les personnages sont attachants - même si j'aurais préféré un peu plus de développement sur certains.
Pour l'avoir joué trois fois, on note des éléments que l'on avait pas remarqués au premier passage (dont de nombreux clins d'oeil au premier The Whispered World) et ça donne un peu plus de profondeur à l'histoire.
Au final j'ai passé un très bon moment, je ne peux que vous recommander ce jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198854045703', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 586, 'last_played': 1642722327}
review:
Silence é um jogo que enche os olhos com sua arte lindíssima e muito bem feita. A história me cativou bastante e fiquei emocionada. Ver o mundo pelos olhos de uma criança em alguns momentos, nos fazem pensar e refletir bastante. 
Tive alguns problemas de bugs com o mouse, dele parar de responder mas ai coloquei o controle do xbox e consegui dar sequência de boa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094948942', 'num_games_owned': 314, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 499, 'last_played': 1642616501}
review:
[h1] Such a cute game! [/h1]

[b]Short version:[/b]

I would recommend this game to you if you like cute graphics and puzzle games, and you are patient! Because in some places it took me a good 30 minutes to solve a puzzle... It's just not obvious what to do sometimes, and there are minor bugs as well. These aside, I really enjoyed the game, the story is great, and it left and open question at the end that made me think and appreciat the game more.

[b]Long version:[/b]

Alrighty, so you need more details. I get it, let's go: This game was real fun to play, although I wouldn't consider this a one-sitting game, as in some parts it took me so much time to figure out what to do that I just needed a break. For example, in one part you have to switch between 2 of your characters and interact with the map at the same time. For some reason, for the first try everything worked fine, but I messed up the sequence, so I had to restart the moves. And for the second time, my character wouldn't do that same exact interaction it did 5 minutes ago. I had to leave that area and go back in order for it to work. Minor bugs like this can make the puzzles a little bit more time-consuming, but luckily this was the only one I encountered.

Otherwise the story is fascinating, the game itself requires absolutely no skill (it's a click&collect, duh!) so it can be played with a friend by passing the controller to eachother etc. I really liked the multiple-choice parts, although I read here that the choices don't actually change the plot, which would be a pity! Though I didn't test this part, so cannot say for sure.

The graphics are also amazing, and the musical parts were really enjoyable! I liked playing with this game, and I might re-play the whole thing in some time.

10/9

review: Beautiful visual, puzzle, click-point game. But I didn't like the story for some reason... It is easy to understand the story concept.. but it felt like it was sort of inconsistent... author: {'steamid': '76561199024621652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 371, 'last_played': 1642240535}
review:
[h1] The annoying perfection of 6 hours  [/h1]

When I tried the demo version, I expected to find difficult puzzles, well-organized plots, and good character development. In fact, after buying the full version and finished it, this game truly grasped the role as a point & click genre.

There is nothing wrong with the point & click mechanic in this game. Just click your mouse and the game will be over after millions of thoughtless clicks.

Some of the things that I LOVE in this game are the excellent sound design, cartoonist graphics, then Renie and Plot characters. Others, may be the work of an intern developer.

This game gets my thumbs up because I got 90% off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198363200464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1642263616}
review:
[b] ประทับใจเนื้อเรื่องมากๆ [/b]
- เนื้อเรื่องแฝงอะไรต่างๆเยอะมาก ซับซ้อน 
- เนื้อเรื่องบางส่วนอาจดูไม่สำคัญ พอใกล้จุดเคลียร์เกมเท่านั้น ก็เข้าใจ ก็ว้าวไปกับเนื้อเรื่องเล็กๆที่ผ่านมา ว้าวจนถึงเกมจบ
- พยายามเก็บทุกรายละเอียด เพราะสำคัญจริงๆ
.
- บรรยากาศในเกมมันแฟนซีมากเลยอะ ตัวละคร สถานที่ องค์ประกอบต่างๆทำให้เราว้าวไปกับเกม
- พัซเซิ่ลต่างๆมันมีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ ทำให้เราสนุกไปกับมันตลอดทั้งเกม
- เนื้อเรื่องมีฉากจบอยู่ 2 แบบ ถึงเเบบนั้น การตัดสินใจต่างๆก็จะทำให้การดำเนินเรื่องต่างกันไป ควรเล่นซ้ำอย่างยิ่ง
.
- น่าเสียดาย ที่เกมสั้นมากๆ ขนาดคิดว่าติดแก้พัซเซิ่ลนาน ก็ยังจบไว ถึงอย่างนั้นก้คุ้มค่าอยู่ดี

author: {'steamid': '76561199223255037', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1642233407}
review:
Советую данную игру, купил по скидке думал игра такое себе.
Но пройдя игру на две разные концовки, я понял что за эту игру можно отдать полную стоимость, почему же:
1.Отличный сюжет, где каждый твой выбор повлияет на концовку игры, за всё время прохождения игры, сюжет не разу не наскучил, есть как грустные так и смешные моменты.
2.Графика 9/10 всё чётко и красиво, приятно играть)
3.Музыка подходит под все действия в игре, не надоедливая.
4.Так же присутствуют головоломки, конечно не сложные но всё-же разбавляет гемплей)

author: {'steamid': '76561199036681303', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1642215613}

review:
Short version: 10/10, love the game

Long version:
I was skeptical when buying this, given a-lot of people were saying that they weren't fond of the characters, the dialogue was scarce and that it overall was only an O-K game. I saw it was on sale, for a really good price and thought I'd check it out anyway. I'm so glad I did, Sadwick does get on your nerves, but not for long. The story is worth it, and even if it wasn't there was Spot. Spot makes life OK.

author: {'steamid': '76561199232282997', 'num_games_owned': 7, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1642163117}
review:
Метафоричная и интуитивно понятная игра, которая не стоит своей полной цены, но стоит вашего внимания. Искренне жаль тех игроков, кто не видит глубину сюжета, цепляясь за шаблонные квест установки и намекает нам на низкопробную проработку сюжета. 
Меня напротив приятно поразило, что сюжет не вдарился в фэнтези, не оставляя намека на реализм. И всю эту простую и атмосферную игру тебя не покидает чувство тоски. Ты заранее понимаешь финал, и от этого еще паршивее на душе.

Игра богата на приятный саунд, приколы, явно не претендует на супер-квест всех времен и народов. Скоротать вечер вполне, как и возможность еще раз задуматься о пережитом и прожитом. Такая игра для маленьких взрослых или для  взрослых, которые ещё немножко маленькие.

author: {'steamid': '76561198296471304', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1643445317}
review:
В этой игре я:
Смеялся, грустил, бывало скучновато, но это геймплейные особенности, умилялся, боялся и сострадал героям, много думал и не обошлось без слёз. Катарсис - моё нынешнее состояние. Игра заставила задуматься об очень многом: о вопросах бытовых, о вопросах философских, о вопросах ответственности и о многих других.
Я это игру прошёл за один день. Сюжет этого проекта меня покорил и положив руку на сердце, говорю, что эта игра достойна чуть ли не высшего балла за нарративную составляющую.
Но оговорюсь, что во многом от человека зависит, конечно. Каждому своё "что-нибудь к чаю" подавай))
Цена символическая, как скромный донат разработчику на покушать. Восхитительно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101264163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1642015287}
review: Habe dieses Spiel Geschenkt bekommen und bin begeistert. Es ist ein Point und Klick Game man benötigt also nur eine funktionstüchtige Computermaus für das Game. Das Artwork wie auch die Story ist sehr schön gemacht. In einigen Rezensionen hatte ich gelesen, das aufgrund eines Bugs man das Spiel komplett neu starten und neu beginnen müsste. Mir ist dieser Bug nicht aufgefallen, daher konnte ich das Spiel ohne Unterbrechung spielen. Ich würde dieses Spiel definitiv nochmal Spielen. Würde auch ähnliche Games  oder eine Fortsetzungen zocken. Bin sehr zufrieden und hoffe das diese Rezension hilfreich war an die Unentschlossenen Gamer da draußen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198964576091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1641973715}
review:
流程有点短，故事总体比较一般，游戏所构建的世界其实玩到最后也不是特别能理解。
一些地方的互动也比较难经得起推敲。
而且场景之间互相切换的时候真的有点难熬。

但场景真的好漂亮啊，妹妹真的什么都能吃啊。
相对而言，这是更适合非常闲的超佛系玩家在悠闲地假日慢慢品味的作品。

review: 데달릭 사 3D게임 특유의 어색한 모션은 아쉬웠지만 데달릭 사 게임중 가장 훌륭한 아트워크와 나름 도움되는 힌트 시스템,흥미로운 스토리가 강점이지만 후반부 급전개 때문에 플레이 타임을 조금만 더 늘려서 발매했으면 어땠을까 하는 생각이 든다 특히나 아트북 보면 개발하려다 잘려나간 여러 스테이지들이 보여 더더욱 아쉬웠다.

author: {'steamid': '76561199214972640', 'num_games_owned': 400, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1641583093}
review:
。。。
感觉给小朋友玩会很开心。

author: {'steamid': '76561198275688390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 354, 'last_played': 1641577506}
review: Für Deadelic-Verhältnisse sehr leichte Rätsel und kein Inventar (weshalb die Interaktionsmöglichkeiten deutlich begrenzt sind). In dem Game geht es aber auch weniger um die Rätsel als um die Story. Die Story ist wunderschön und traurig, hat durch verschiedene Dialoge definitv wiederspiel-wert. Allerdings keine 20 Euro Wert. hab es in einem 2 Euro Bundel von Deadelic gekauft und solche Aktionen haben sie ja regelmäßig. Also Kaufempfehlung, wenn es im Sale ist!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010004500', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1641491331}
review:
На удивление - не плохое сюжетное квестовое приключение. При этом очень красивое, даже сегодня игра выглядит весьма неплохо
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2710223291
Есть небольшая вариативность в диалогах, что может привезти к нескольким концовкам.
Управление удобное. Всегда можно включить подсказки активных зон, если не хочется возюкать курсор по экрану.
Приятная музыка.
Иногда в игре встречаются баги со скриптами, но пропадают после запуска игры с последней контрольной точки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007513026', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 433, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1641427710}
review:
I really would like to recommend this game. It has great graphics, good voice acting and a strange but interesting story.

What more could one want from a game. How about a game that doesn't have a game breaking bug and no proper saved game feature so if you encounter the bug you have to restart the game. Unfortunately I encountered this bug and since there is only one save and it auto saved with the bug I had to restart the game from the beginning.

As many have complained about the load times are very long. Also, when you exit the game and come back later you will have to rewatch long sequences because the auto save intervals are too infrequent.

How about the puzzles? What puzzles? Daedalic isn't, at least to me, known for creating good puzzles. I enjoyed the Deponia series in spite of some really bad puzzles. There are essentially no puzzles in Silence, there is only trial an error. You only have a single inventory item so it comes down to trying that item, if you have it or one of the other characters on every object in the scene. Even then Daedalic manged to create a few nonsense "puzzles".

I bought this game on deep discount and I did enjoy the good parts of the game. But the negatives outweigh the positives so I can't recommend it.

Update - after a few more hours of play, the negatives greatly outweight the positives. Somehow Daedalic manages to create "puzzles" that are as bad as Deponia even though there are almost no interactive actions in the game. I just got stuck on a "puzzle" which turned out to be an arcade sequence, but there was no indication there was an arcade sequence. Even after reading the walkthrough it took me several attempts to solve this "puzzle". Definitely not recommended, even at the 90% discount I bought the game at.

author: {'steamid': '76561199067891440', 'num_games_owned': 59, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1641403075}
review: Прекрасная атмосферная игра, 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198350866184', 'num_games_owned': 493, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1640846690}
review:
可以说是一个成就内容都非常丰富的游戏
刚开始是因为工作室和画风以及游戏类别使我购买
游戏的体量不小，大致5-6个小时就能通关
整体的画风和内容其实充满了幻想要素，但是故事的内核却挺耐人寻味的
就像是故事中说的那样，打破还是修复，苏醒还是沉睡
回到现实还是继续留在这个世界，面对的结局是不一样的
游戏的操作和过关难度其实不高，中间有一些选项带来的效果也不同
反而是为了达成成就会显得麻烦一些，需要多周目流程才行
其实最有意思的还是这个可以变化的小毛毛虫
虽然个人不是特别喜欢虫子，甚至因为这个是绿绿的稍微有一点不舒服
但是它利用吃东西和变形来达到不同效果的感觉，反而让我觉得这个其实只是借着毛毛虫外表的百变怪
在梦境里有这种帮手帮忙，也是一个非常有意思的过程

author: {'steamid': '76561198026026858', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1578154222}
review: I absolutely love this game. I dived into this world for about 6 hours and it was such an awesome experience. I loved the story (don't wanna spoil anything here), which is so emotional. The storytelling hit home a few times and I literally shed some tears. A beautiful masterpiece.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970587571', 'num_games_owned': 742, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1640714662}
review:
The backgrounds are great, and so are some of the characters. It looks pretty decent for a point and click adventure.

The story is ok, interesting enough. But the game is a bit too simple, no inventory and very easy puzzles. The voice acting is irregular, some characters are insuferable.

On overall, an ok game, it has some charm and it's quite pretty. Worthy of buying at a discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334799792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2082, 'last_played': 1640277023}
review:
Ein an sich schönes Spiel mit liebevoll gestalteten Persönlichkeiten und einer Story die durchaus zum überdenken der getroffenen Entscheidungen anregt. 

Leider nicht zu empfehlen für Leute die nur mit M&KB spielen - zumindest so man die Erfolge wirklich alle bekommen möchte. 
Generell benötigt man wohl  mindestens 2 Durchläufe für die Erfolge - wenn man mit Controller spielt.

Ebenso schade das viele Szenen nicht geskippt werden können denn teilweise wird nach dem 4.ten durchspielen - und dem letzten immer noch fehlenden Erfolg  - irgendwann doch der Spielspaß getrübt.

Es wird im Spiel auch oft auf den Vorgänger hingewiesen allerdings ist nicht erforderlich diesen durchgespielt zu haben um der Story folgen zu können.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114853867', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1639916421}
review:
[h1] 판의 미로라는 영화를 게임으로 옮긴거같은 게임 [/h1]

 나는 해피엔딩보다 배드엔딩을 더 많이 좋아하는 사람으로서 엔딩이 다 배드였지만 그래도 나는 여운이 남았고 좋았던거 같다.
게임자체는 너무 쉬움 퍼즐도 쉽고 만약에 진행이 안되면 힌트도 볼 수 있기때문에 바로바로 진행 할 수 있다. 나는 이게임을90프로 세일할때 샀기때문에 2200원의 가치를 했다고 본다 근데 원가 22000원의 가치를 하는가? 그건 아니다 왜냐면 스토리의 캐릭터가 5명인가 6명정도 나오는데 리니와 노아의 캐릭터성만 제대로 표현했지 나머지 4명은 뭐랄까 그냥 대충대충 만든것 같다. 그래서 스토리중간중간이 빠진 느낌도 난다. 그래서 세일할떄 꼭 사길 바란다.
이게임은 영화 판의 미로와도 유사점이 주인공 모두 전쟁이 일어났다. 그리고 둘다 판타지 스러운 모험을 해서 어려움을 해쳐나간다. 그리고 이거는 스포라 못 말하겠는데 엔딩이 너~~무 비슷하고 관점을 어떻게 보느냐에 따라 배드엔딩이냐 해피엔딩이냐라고 나눌 수 있다는점이 너무 비슷하다 그래서 이게임을 플레이하고 판의 미로도 보면 좋을거같다!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197968878172', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1641572025}
review:
Leider der Tiefpunkt und auch das Ende der Daedalic-Adventures ... RIP Daedalic!

+ sieht sehr gut aus
+ tolle deutsche Sprecher
+ kam noch in einer schicken Box mit Steam-Key (bei Release erworben)

--- kein echtes Adventure, Gameplay like Telltale (Interaktive Geschichte), traurig, wird Deadalic nicht gerecht und entäuscht auf ganze Linie ... kein Rätsel, kein Inventar ... blame on you Deadalic 
- konsolenoptimieres "Gameplay", Interface und Menü ... man traut sich gar nicht das Gameplay zu nennen ... man klickt sich durch die Geschichte
- Dialoge sind teilweise zusammenhanglos ... zusammengeschnitten? per Google ins Deutsche übersetzt?
- Story ist kurz und wenig mitreißend
--- keine Speicherfunktion

Enttäuschung pur.
Hier sollte offensichtlich der Konsolenmarkt erschlossen und der vermeintlich erfolgreichere Konkurrent Telltale (wir wissen wie erfolgreich sie tatsächlich waren ...) kopiert werden. Bitter wenn das Kapital bestimmt und gute Studios zu Grunde richtet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094935504', 'num_games_owned': 182, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1639329163}
review:
Silencio es un mundo que se encuentra entre la vida y la muerte, un mundo que Noah ya conoce porque ya estuvo allí. Sin embargo, ahora también le acompaña su hermana Renie, y Silencio está gobernado por una "reina falsa". Si quieren regresar a casa, tendrán que enfrentarse a ella y decidir el destino de Silencio. 

Es evidente que el juego se centra más en hacerte disfrutar de la historia y del arte, que del juego en si, ya que no es muy largo y los puzles no son complejos. Pero acierta en ese aspecto, y consigue hacerte pasar un buen rato. La única pega que le veo es que no tiene rejugabilidad ninguna (solo dos finales, y puedes verlos seguidos solo con cargar la partida de nuevo una vez has visto uno), así que no aconsejo pagar los 20 euros que vale de normal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198223164124', 'num_games_owned': 946, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1637699158}
review:
Yet another beautiful game from Daedalic, with a compelling story, ruined by poor logic and bad interface decisions.

Here are the two things that made me give up:

Being a Point & Click, you'd expect it to work nicely with a gyroscope mouse - as do other games of this genre. Not so, because of those balance challenges, and those pull or wiggle prompts.

I was expecting it to be a bit of a puzzle game, yet you can't deviate much from the predefined trail - meaning, sometimes you can only do an action (like picking an item that's just lying there) after doing something not reasonably related (like removing something elsewhere).
So, thinking in advance is definitely discouraged, and some riddles are rendered needlessly more difficult due to having to retry actions at different times to try to get different outcomes.

Having tried most Point & Click games from Daedalic, i advise you to steer clear from all of them - including this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000713888', 'num_games_owned': 960, 'num_reviews': 327, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1637481914}
review:
Очень крутая игра, которая через фантастический мир показывает судьбу двух детей в военное время. Игра в основном забавная, но чувство тревоги периодически возникает и не это просто так. 

Если по геймплею, то у нас тут point-and-click квест с элементами хождения по локацией. Управлять по факту мы будет целыми тремя персонажами, один из короных очень уникальный по геймплею и вокруг которого завязано много достижений.

К этому всему у нас есть потрясающая картинка, трогательная музыка и красивая история. Некоторые эпизоды весьма упоротые, но с точки зрения сюжета это вполне объяснимо.

В общем, маленький шедевр, который лежал у меня года 4 в вишлисте и доставил 6 часов удовольствия.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005192602', 'num_games_owned': 422, 'num_reviews': 329, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1636833834}
review:
Öncelikle oyunu bitirdiğimi söylemek istiyorum. Acele etmeden tadını ala ala çayımı kahvemi içerek keyif alarak oynadım. Bu tarz oyunları zaten hep sevmişimdir fakat iyi bir yabancı diliniz yoksa hikaye, karakterler, deneyim anlamında %100 bir etki alamıyorsunuz. Bende riske girmemek adına çok uzun bir süre Türkçe yamayı bekledim. Çok sayıda diyaloglar ve hatta seçimlerin olduğu bu tarz oyunlarda zaten en önemli faktördür konuşma dilini anlamak... Ücretli olsa da türkçe yamayı 18 liraya alıp oynamaya başladım. Bu tarz oyunları 1 defa oynayacağım için, 1 olsun pir olsun dedim. 

Oyunun kendine özgü bir hikayesi, ilerleyişi ve özellikleri var. Yanınızda bulunan yardımcı solucanınızı sık sık kullanmanız gerekiyor.Çünkü farklı formlara ve etkileşimlere girebiliyor. Bazen 2 karakter ile, farklı mekanlarda oynayıp bulmacaları çözmeniz gerekiyor.

müzikleri, atmosfer ve grafikleri tatmin edecek düzeyde. Seslendirmeler çok başarılı. Neşeli ve farklı dialoglarıyla, özellikle bulmacalarıyla insanı sıkmıyor fakat 1 nesneden birden çok etkileşime girmeniz gerekebiliyor. Yani ilk tıklama ile önce anlıyorsunuz sonra kullanıyorsunuz sonrada bazen onu alabiliyorsunuz. Oyunda malzemeler eşyalar alabiliyorsunuz fakat onları kullanmak için envanterden alıp kullanma olayı yok.Yani kullanacağınız malzemeyi aldıktan sonra, direkt kullanacağınız yerde gösteriyor.Sadece tıklayarak kullanıyorsunuz (Oyun menüsünde yardım seçeneklerini görebilirsiniz)

Sadece tek bir yerde bug (hata) ile karşılaştım ve ilerleyişimi etkiledi. Son kayıt noktasından tekrar başladım ve düzeldi. Zaten her bulmaca oyununda en az 1 bugla karşılaşırım çünkü heryeri didik didik eder, geçilmemesi gereken yerler,akla gelmeyecek şeyler denerim.Herneyse...

Steam başarımlarının bazıları 2 nci bir oynanış gerektiriyor. Otomatik olarak tek bir kayıt alıyor. Oyunu bitirseniz bile her hangi bir bölüm seçme yada manuel kayıt alma olayının olmaması kötü olmuş. %100 başarım için tekrar baştan oynamanız gerekiyor. Genelde oyun, size farklı seçimler, tercihler, konuşmalar vs. sunsa da bir yerden sonra tekrar ana hikayeye bağlanıyor. Sadece oyun sonunda karşılaşacağınız seçim 2 farklı sona götürüyor. Her ne kadar beni tatmin etmesede 2 farklı sonda mantıklı olmuş.

Farklı bir hikaye ve oynanış deneyimi açısından, indirimde iken alınabilir

review: Если вам хочется поплакать над сюжетом - добро пожаловать. Если вам нравится искать решения сложных ситуаций - это сюда. Но чтоб лучше понимать происходящее, нужно пройти первую часть игры (The Whispered World). Но игру однозначно стоит купить и пройти

author: {'steamid': '76561197991699715', 'num_games_owned': 1124, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 6982, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6982, 'last_played': 1636286080}
review:
Since I was missing some achievements and I wanted to finish every achievement, I had to finis chapter I & II... for three times :P But I didn't mind since I like the characters and the story, even if the universe is not that familiar, but both main characters have something that I can relate to. The boy is not always 100% sure, he makes mistakes exactly like an older brother, while the little sister is not all sure that something should be done but she is curious about the world in itself, she likes Spot and since she is the little one is exactly like she should be in real life. The story is not bad, but what I like the most is rather the two main characters, since I can relate to them. Kyra is not a bad character, but the secondary characters are introduced without any story, they have a different purpose and we never meet them at the end... in any of the endings. The rock brothers are funny maybe they were used too little since the story is rather short, but Silence is only a story in itself, similar with a dream. 

Try it, you might like it :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198023623749', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 334, 'playtime_forever': 1211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1636585234}
review: Silence, which is a prequel to another point & click game named The Whispered World, offers beautiful visuals, a decent story and quirky achievements to hunt. Also, my 8-year-old daughter was really into it, so it's a fun game to experience together.

𝕺𝖛𝖆𝖙𝖘

Перевод:

Грустная история Рини и Ноа. Поразительно какой глубокий мир в воображений у девочки, которая растет в бункере, думаю история учит , что внутри нас у всех "Тишина," и мы должны принять решение или жить в королевстве, лжи, и иллюзий, внутренней тишины,  или разрушить иллюзию, и жить  реальной шумной жизнью, выбор за нами. В игре чудесная и гармоничная музыка которая добавляет ей больше шарма. Эта игра одна с немногих  цепляет, за душу и дает нам  шанс осознать, кто мы, и к чему стремимся воюя друг, с другом, или с самим собой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198880264399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1637634653}
review:
Silence: The Wispered World, del 15 de Noviembre de 2016, es una aventura tipo “Point And Click”, de unas cuatro horas de duración aproximada. Tuvieron la mala idea de complicarla con mecanicas dicifiles, por eso no l0o recomiendo. Un juego es para disfrutar, no para sufrir...
Somos Noah, el hermano mayor de Renie, que está perdida en un reino mágico entre la vida y la muerte. 
La grafica es preciosa, con fondos pintados a mano, con una banda sonora de Tilo Alpermann...

author: {'steamid': '76561198208140724', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 356, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1636389999}
review:
Gostei!
No geral o jogo é muito bom, gráficos, músicas, história.. É simples de jogar e sem enrolação...

-O que eu mais gostei é que ele possui muitas dicas! E se você apertar espaço o jogo revela tudo que da pra interagir no cenário, esse recurso é incrível porque a coisa que eu mais odeio em jogos Point Click, é ficar clicando aleatoriamente por aí tentando adivinhar as coisas que seguem uma lógica que só faz sentido na cabeça de quem desenvolveu o jogo, ou ficar empacado sem saber o que fazer!

-E eu só não gostei muito da voz da Renie em inglês e o som ambiente, que vezes e estranho.. Silencioso.. Falta uma certa emoção!

review:

The atmosphere and the presentation are awesome and made my eyes glaze over from time to time. Regarding the [spoiler]positive (waking up)[/spoiler] ending I recommend reading this thread in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/314790/discussions/0/217691032449199554/#c208684375410995713]community forum[/url] [spoiler]because I missed this detail in my playthrough[/spoiler].

author: {'steamid': '76561198126302815', 'num_games_owned': 355, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1635670284}
review: 解密没什么难度，让我头疼的反而是操作互动方式，那个保持平衡，鼠标识别不出来，要换成手柄就得退出到主页面打开手柄控制，这也忒麻烦了！！直接用手柄打完又没有灵魂，这可是点击解密游戏啊：（！！剧情方面， 没玩过风语世界直接玩这作，有的地方理解不了，还是能玩，玩到结局差点以为这是内核有点“卖火柴的小女孩”式的悲剧了，虽然成就里有包括死亡的成就，我还纳闷这种游戏也会死？？但是这个故事细究其实并不美好…画面挺好的，优化不咋地，玩这种游戏风扇也好响（也可能是我错觉）…看了一下成就，果然有个，踢遍游戏里所有能踢的物体，我少踢了一个啊啊啊啊，总之各方面都中规中矩吧，跟前作比没有失望但还是觉得弄成3d场景和内容互动物都大幅度缩减了…蕾妮和斑斑真的好可爱！！D

review:
Kolejna rewelacyjna przygodówka. Obowiązkowa pozycja dla osób, które chcą poznać dalsze losy bohaterów The Whispered World. Przepiękna grafika, miła oprawa dźwiękowa, zagadki oraz humor zdecydowanie na plus. Z czystym sumieniem polecam :)

Moja ocena :9,5/10 :)

-:- --- -:- --- -:- --- -:- --- -:-

Another amazing adventure. A "must have"  for those who want to learn more about the fate of the characters from The Whispered World. Beautiful graphics, nice soundtrack, puzzles and humor definitely a plus. I recommend it with a clear conscience :)

My rating : 9,5/10 :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198035403201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1635266355}
review:
Decepcionante e não faz jus ao legado de Whispered World.

Se você é fã do primeiro jogo (The Whispered World) passe bem longe desse.

História fraca e mal desenvolvida, personagens superficiais e sem personalidade, jogo curto com final abrupto e decepcionante, diálogos fraquíssimos e irrelevantes, trilha sonora praticamente inexistente, tudo exatamente ao contrário do brilhantismo do primeiro jogo.

Puzzles fáceis, lineares, não há nem mesmo inventário, uma piada de mal gosto no quesito "Adventure Games".

O primeiro jogo (Whispered World) é uma obra prima, personagens cativantes, diálogos bem feitos, história bem desenvolvida, trilha sonora inesquecível, puzzles interessantes (alguns bens difíceis), e um final épico e de encher os olhos de lágrimas. Um jogo memorável e inesquecível... Ao contrário de Silence.

Silence é uma sequência decepcionante e que não faz jus ao legado de Whispered World. Era melhor nunca terem feito esse segundo jogo.

Em resumo: se é fã do primeiro game, passe longe desse, irá se decepcionar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045336457', 'num_games_owned': 1187, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1531740126}
review:
[b]ATENCIÓN, EL ARTÍCULO CONTIENE SPOILERS DE [i]The Whispered World[/i].[/b]

[h1]GRÁFICOS[/h1]
Solo se pueden definir como “obra maestra”. Es lo más obvio, el juego es realmente increíble. Los fondos están bellamente dibujados a mano –muy parecidos a la primera parte- se superponen para crear una auténtica ilusión de profundidad. Los personajes en 3D están muy detallados y combinan perfectamente con el estilo de los fondos. Los movimientos de la cámara son muy fluidos y el juego de luces y sombras hacen que cada escena sea un placer para la vista. Resumiendo se podría decir que es una obra de arte actual.
Por ponerle pegas, aunque el juego es visualmente impresionante, carece de la variedad a la que nos acostumbró la primera parte. Muchas de las ubicaciones comparten temas en comunes (por ejemplo, una cascada, pues hay tres pantallas que aparece la cascada, desde los lados y desde delante) eso unido a lo corto que es el juego hace que casi no se vean zonas diferentes de Silence.
Aquí quiero hacer un comentario sobre los vídeos. En la mayoría de los juegos los videos aportan algo bueno, pero el problema es que no se pueden omitir las escenas. Al principio está bien, pero no lo han planificado correctamente y si después de estar 3-4 minutos viendo una escena te sales del juego, cuando vuelvas a entrar tendrás que volverte a ver la escena de nuevo. El punto de guardado estaba antes de la escena. ¿Tanto costaba poner un botón para saltártelo si ya lo has visto?

[h1]MÚSICA[/h1]
Aunque es cierto que la banda sonora de Tilo Alpermann no se puede comparar con el extraordinario trabajo de Finn Seliger del primer juego, el tema de sonido complementa maravillosamente lo que sucede en la pantalla, incluso empleando algunos temas del juego anterior. Todos los temas son dignos de descargártelos en tu reproductor habitual para escucharlos cuando quieras.

[h1]HISTORIA[/h1]
El final del primer juego solo implicaba una cosa: Silence es un mundo que está entre la vida y la muerte en el que tu mente solo entra cuando estás a punto de morir. Esto hace que la historia de la segunda parte esté muy limitada y además toda la trama carece el elemento sorpresa que fue el final del 1. En este juego los dos protagonistas son conscientes de esto lo que hace la historia un poco absurda. Sabes que estás en un sueño y que no importa lo que hagas. ATENCIÓN SPOILER. El final es casi una réplica del primer juego, aunque las consecuencias de tu elección final son poco arbitrarias. O mueres y te quedas en Silence o te despiertas y no importa todo lo que has hecho.
La duración del juego es realmente corta. Cuando te estás empezando acostumbrar al juego de repente se acaba, dejándote con una sensación de decepción. Muchas veces parece que han recortado gran parte del contenido (ya sea por motivos de recursos o de presupuesto). A veces estás en un sitio y cambias de pantalla y ya has llegado a otro, no hay una transición lógica, parece como si estuviera diseñado para añadir más zonas y que por alguna razón no las sacaron. ¿Querrían hacer un DLC y al final no lo sacaron? Para que os hagáis una idea, el juego te lo puedes pasar perfectamente en 4 horas.

[h1]PERSONAJES[/h1]
Personajes principales (jugables):
[b]Renie[/b]. En este juego pasamos mucho tiempo manejando a un niño pequeño y es la primera vez que realmente aparenta que es un niño pequeño (gran trabajo de producción). Pequeños deslices al pronunciar palabras complicadas, ser ignorado por los adultos que discuten, la increíble curiosidad, ingenuidad y vulnerabilidad que desprende. Un trabajo extraordinario.
[b]Spot[/b]. Es imposible no encariñarte con el pequeño gusano verde. Los pasajes donde juegas como Spot son, en mi opinión, mecánicamente los más atractivos y desafiantes ya que ofrecen una mayor cantidad de opciones de interacción. Pero sobre todo, ¿lo has visto de cerca? Que monada.
[b]Sadwick / Noah[/b]. Este personaje me decepciona. Los comentarios amargados de Sadwick en ningún momento llegan a ser tan entretenidos como en el primer juego, la mayoría de las veces son simplemente deprimentes (como "Ese es un pozo profundo, también podría saltar"). ¿De verdad ponen eso en un juego de este tipo? Y no solo eso, la "transformación" de Noah a Sadwick se nota algo forzada e increíble. Eso de levantar la tapa y decir “bueno, entonces, ahora soy Sadwick”… Y los demás personajes aceptan eso en todo momento y ni vuelven a hablar de Noah.

Otros personajes y sus interacciones:
El número de personajes distintos que aparecen son casi ridículos, apenas unas diez personas y como en los diálogos no hay opciones para elegir hace que los pocos personajes que nos encontramos sean planos y “esteriotipados”. Incluso cuando un personaje tiene que hacer algo peligroso no se percibe, ya que como no hay opciones para elegir, saber que va a pasar sí o sí, no te llevas ninguna sorpresa.

[h1]PUZLES Y ACERTIJOS[/h1]
Acertijos. Por llamarlos de alguna forma. No hay ni uno que dure más de 30 segundos. Son cortos y sencillos. Además no tienes inventario lo cual también hace que no tengas que pensar si para pasarte una escena necesitas algún objeto que tengas guardado, ya que no tienes nada. Es coger y usar al momento. Los minijuegos son raros y fáciles. Parece diseñado para jugadores casuales que no hayan jugado nunca a este tipo de aventuras gráficas.

[h1]EL HUMOR[/h1]
 Para ser de Daedalic no hay mucho que digamos. Silence carece el tono agridulce e irónico de The Whispered World. En casi todo momento el estado de ánimo es más bien oscuro, melancólico y dramático. Tiene sus pequeños momentos de alivio cómico pero no acaban de ser bien ejecutados. Tal vez los diseñadores se esforzaron demasiado en intentar sumirnos en la tristeza del juego y se olvidaron de la alegría de querer vivir.
Terminando
El juego se centra más en la “experiencia cinematográfica”  -como dirían los desarrolladores-  que en la propia jugabilidad. Si bien es cierto que el tema visual es uno de los grandes fuertes del juego –y así lo venden- hace que el juego se resienta. Sin opciones de diálogo, falta de personajes interesantes, prácticamente ausencia de sorpresas, puzles demasiados sencillos y la corta duración del juego hacen que te quedes a medias –insatisfecho- al terminal el juego. 
Por lo que salvo que te haya encantado el primero y quieras seguir las aventuras de tus queridos personajes, yo no lo recomiendo y más viendo el precio abusivo que tiene. 
[b]Puntuación: 2/5[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198329281115', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1630178309}
review:
Silence kann außer optisch nicht wirklich mit seinem Vorgänger Whispered World mithalten.
Die Stimmung ist eine ganz andere als im ersten Teil, weil es allein damit anfängt, dass man in der richtigen Welt beginnt und es einen Bombenangriff gibt. Der erste Teil ist anfangs nur eine Geschichte, die Noah erzählt, wird aber dann Wirklichkeit. Wer den ersten Teil gespielt hat, wird das Ende nicht sonderlich überraschend finden.


Die Rätsel sind sehr unterschiedlich und interessant.
Die Story ist eigentlich nicht so spannend. Man spielt mit abwechselnden Figuren, weshalb es nicht eintönig wird. Die Nebencharaktere fand ich nicht sonderlich aufregend. 

Alles in allem würde ich aber sagen, ein gutes Spiel, wenn auch nicht das Beste.

Ach ja: Wer die Credits durchsteht, bekommt eine kleine Belohnung in Form einer sehr kurzen Cutscene.

author: {'steamid': '76561198871041253', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 636, 'last_played': 1629800515}

author: {'steamid': '76561198118726910', 'num_games_owned': 19343, 'num_reviews': 185, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1629518490}
review:
Pero que pedazo de juego...!! muy bueno gráficamente, los personajes están bien por de mas, Renie se roba el libreto por mucho,.

El sumamente resaltable el apartado grafico de esta aventura point and click, los diseños están todos excelentes, tanto de los escenarios, personajes, animaciones, etc..

Me saque, calculo yo, que el final mas triste de todos....
Tocara re.jugarlo y ver si consigo los otros

Lo único malo, los tiempo de carga de los niveles, por ahí se ponen demasiado lentos.

Edit: podes ver el final alternativo, solo cargando el ultimo save; el final triste el mejor, el menos triste no llega a ser un final feliz... jajaja

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198266334089', 'num_games_owned': 924, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 571, 'last_played': 1629394364}
review: I enjoyed this, but preferred The Whispered World (this is a sequel to it). I wish Daedalic hadn't been so influenced by Telltale Games and that Silence had been a more traditional point and click game. Although one thing it has going for it is its graphics: it might be the most beautiful point and click game ever made. It's a shame how long the loading times are between screens, but perhaps that's because I don't have a high-end computer. Also, there's no manual saves and I found it unclear when the save points actually occurred. Perhaps it mentioned it at the beginning, but I took a long break between starting the game and going back to playing it. Maybe I forgot how to identify the save point.
