author: {'steamid': '76561198331784232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 558, 'last_played': 1505140416}
review:
포인트 앤드 클릭 형식의 게임입니다. 스토리에 대해 자세하게는 마해드릴 수 없지만 1편의 세계관과 이어진다고 생각하시면 펼할것입니다.
이 게임은 엔딩이 총2개로 만약 후속작이 존재하게된다면 각각 스토리가 크게 나뉘어질것이라고 생각되어집니다.
얼마나 차이가 나냐면 주인공 두명중 누구를 살릴 수 있는가와 동시에 위에 말한 후속작이 나올경우 스토리가 매우 크게 뒤틀릴만할정도로 큽니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088271559', 'num_games_owned': 589, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1539226519}
review:
This is a point and click adventure game with a few other interesting mechanics built in. You play as Noah and his sister Renie in an absolutely GORGEOUS environment. Each scene in the game poses some amount of progression and changes the results of interactions as you progress, and it features an absolutely fascinating story that takes you back into the imagination of a young child. The extra mechanics such as balancing and using spot's different forms work into actions and solving environmental puzzles laid out for you that keep the story moving forward and keep you interacting with the world of silence. I highly recommend this game for anyone who is looking for a fun fantasy story.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198088264980', 'num_games_owned': 604, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1551355347}
review:
Буду предельно краток. Silence это полноценное продолжение одной из лучших игр что выходило из под пера студии Daedalic Entertainment. Но смогла ли она превзойти своего предшественника? Ответ:  и да, и нет.

[url=store.steampowered.com/curator/33578182-1LOVEGAMES/] Специально для 1LOVEGAMES. А ты еще не подписался на куратора?	[/url]

Дело в том что тут разработчики отошли от рисованой 2D графики и окунулись по полной в мир 3D. Мне, лично, понравилась такая перемена. Игра смотрится свежо и будем откровенны – красиво. С этим все в порядке. Но вот с остальным беда. Хоть как бы разработчики не хотели расширить свою аудиторию новыми игроками, но без понимания что было в первой части увы и ах, вам будет не все понятно. Притом если помните, первая часть хранила интригу буквально до самых титров, тут же главный секрет игры всплывает чуть ли не в начале второй четверти игры. И вместе с этим сюжет сдувается. Сдувается настолько, что предсказать что будет дальше совершенно не составляет труда. 
Да, конечно нам в некоторых ключевых точках дают свободу и моральные выборы, но если вы для себя все решили (а что именно решить, открывается нам как я и говорил во второй четверти игры), то де факто эти моральные выборы ни на что не влияют.

Я не хочу сказать что все так плохо, по сравнению с первой частью игра выросла. Выросла в моральном плане, ведь сама по себе она очень коротка. Сюжет тут стал более взрослым и как ни крути сама атмосфера игры довольно грустная. Ее пытаются разбавить шуточками и детскими выходками Рени, одной из главных героев истории, но лично мне, такого показалось мало  и все это больше погружало меня в пучину отчаянья.

Наверное, после всего что я сказал вы подумали что это плохая игра. Нет-нет, не надо так думать. Геймплей тут довольно интересен, разработчики подготовили для нас кучу загадок и головоломок. Они не слишком сложные, но и не дадут на одном дыхании проскакивать игру.

Так что после недолгих размышлений с чашкой чая, я пришел к выводу что все же эту игру стоит рекомендовать. Да, эта игра на один раз, реиграбельность у нее на нуле, по сравнению с той же первой частью или Депонией. Но это все же неплохой квест с грустной историей в которой даже хэппи-энд подгоняет комок к горлу от горя. 

6 из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198063825413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 804, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1537792002}
review:
Das Spiel ist noch gut.

Es ist ein Point & Click, das etwas zu einer Telltale-artigen Darstellung tendiert. Wie sein ausführlicher Titel (Silence: The Whispered World 2) andeutet, ist es eine Fortsetzung von [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198063825413/recommended/268540]The Whispered World[/url], aber nur, weil hier wie dort die Welt Silence eine Rolle spielt.

Die kleine Renie und ihr älterer Bruder Noah geraten durch einen Luftangriff in die märchenhafte Welt Silence, die sie bereits kannten (so wie man in die Welt eines Romans "eintaucht").

Auch Silence ist in Aufruhr. Bösartige, insektenartige "Sucher" greifen sie an, die Königin ist recht machtlos, Rebellen stellen sich ihnen entgegen. Es bleibt aber knuddelig-märchenhaft.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1521840630

Die Geschichte mäandert durch verschiedenste Situationen, die ähnlich einem Traum auch oft episodenhaft bleiben, hin zu dem (letztlich vorhersehbaren) Ende, wo man sich entscheiden muss.

Nun gut, der Grat ist schmal, und man kann gerne alles wunderbar dramatisch und anrührend und ganz toll ansehen. Bei mir wollte es sich nicht recht zusammenfügen. Der Kampf um Silence wurde dann sogar den Nebenfiguren überlassen und blieb unklar.

Insofern fühlte ich mich nicht so bewegt, wie es die Macher des Spieles sicherlich im Sinne hatten. Gut gemacht sind aber ganz sicher die Hauptprotagonisten, insbesondere Renie, die mal fröhlich wie auf einem Badeausflug ist, schlaue Ideen liefert und dann doch ganz Kind ist.

Das Gameplay ist zwar ein P&C, aber stark an eine Visual Novel im Stile von Telltale angenähert. Es gibt kein Inventar, also nur jeweils höchstens ein Objekt, das man an anderer Stelle einsetzen muss. Es gibt ein paar Aufgaben, die etwas (wirklich nur etwas) Geschicklichkeit erfordern, wie das Balancieren auf einer Kugel.

Manchmal muss man einfache Dialogoptionen wählen, die aber meist nur minimale Unterschiede bewirken.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1521839200

Etwas komplexer wird es dadurch, dass sowohl Renie als auch Noah gesteuert werden können, die manchmal voneinander getrennt sind. Das Zusammenarbeiten müssen ist aber überschaubar. Auch Spot macht die Sache manchmal komplex, weil er sehr viele verschiedene Gestalten annehmen kann (Flach, Normal, Rund, Aufgeteilt, Brennend, etc.).

Dennoch: die Aufgaben sind überwiegend sehr einfach. Bei manchen Aufgaben habe ich aber nicht verstanden, was eigentlich los ist (wozu also was zu tun ist) und bei manchen Situationen kam eine unresponsive Steuerung dazwischen: eine Handlung schien nicht ausführbar; erst nach mehreren Versuchen (das muss man erst mal ahnen) klappte es dann. Daher musste doch (obwohl die Rätsel einfach sind) ein Walkthrough her.

Sehr spaßbremsend sind die erheblichen Ladezeiten zwischen zwei Screens. Mein PC brauchte meist zwischen 5 und 12 Sekunden zum Laden einer Szene, die man oft nur kurz besuchen musste, um vielleicht etwas auszuprobieren oder weil es nur eine kurze Zwischensequenz war. Auch Animationen brauchen viel Zeit, was an sich ja nett ist, aber manchmal nerven, wenn man sie zum x-ten Mal sieht.

Die Grafik ist hervorragend. Sehr schön modellierte und animierte Figuren vor wunderschön gemalten Hintergrundbilder, z.B. der traumhaft-burgähnlichen Stadt.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1521842004

Der Sound ist auch gut. Die Musik ist wohl speziell komponiert und eingespielt, die Sprecher sind ebenfalls sehr gut. Als Sprache steht Englisch und (an sich) Deutsch zur Verfügung. Dummerweise wurde mir beim ersten Start im Optionsmenü nur die Sprache für die Untertitel angeboten (glaube ich) und so habe ich das Spiel lange auf Englisch gespielt.

Die Steuerung war nicht fehlerfrei. An sich kann man das Spiel gut mit Controller spielen. Der "Vorteil" ist, dass die Hotspots so noch leichter zu finden sind. Dafür reagierte das Spiel manchmal nicht auf meine Eingaben. Mein Contoller ist etwas betagt und vielleicht nicht mehr ganz top, aber bei anderen Spielen funktioniert er noch ziemlich gut. Hier brauchte es oft viele Versuche. Das Umschalten (weg) vom Controller funktioniert allerdings nur im Hauptmenü, was sehr irritierend ist. Mit der Maus hatte ich wenig Probleme.

Es gibt viele Errungenschaften, die zu erlangen man wohl mehrere Durchläufe durch das Spiel, das keine Zwischenstände erlaubt, erfordert.

Pro & Contra:

+ Aufwendige Grafik
+ Guter Sound (Deutsche Sprecher)
+ Eine nette Hauptdarstellerin

o Oft Visual-Novel-/Telltale-artiges Gameplay

- Überwiegend sehr einfache Rätsel
- Eine vielleicht gute Geschichte (ich fand sie aber nicht toll ausgeführt)
- Es fehlte jeglicher auflockernder Witz
- Steuerung (durch Controller) etwas hakelig

Wertung: 6/10

Ich habe ja (mit der Zeit) Telltale-Spiele geliebt. Der Versuch von Daedalic, ähnliche Wege einzuschlagen, kam mit Silence bei mir nicht so gut an. Dazu war die Geschichte für mich nicht wirklich fesselnd, auch wenn sie ja so gefühlvoll erscheint. Aber das muss man selbst abwägen, ebenso, ob einem das gebotene Gameplay zusagt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037252653', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1536970717}
review:
This game was a rather disappointing experience. Silence is a sequel to one of my favorite games of Daedalic's previous works, The Whispered World. While the chance to 3d models and environments looks quite good it had not impacted the gameplay very well. Doing anything, even the simplest of tasks, takes an unreasonable amount of time. Loading between screens took quite a long time too, although that could just be because of my aging hardware. The story itself was alright but very poorly told. Voice direction is a joke, and the pacing of the dialogue is bizarrely rushed in both the German and English audio. The music was passable but not memorable. 

In conclusion I would probably recommend that anyone curious about this game go play The Whispered World instead, and maybe pick this up if they're desperate to experience another trip into familiar territory.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988741085', 'num_games_owned': 1785, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 388, 'last_played': 1535051200}
review:
(Einen detaillierten Eindruck vom Spiel bekommt man hier: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HT0XZiH-sfY&index=37&list=PLNcEOocQhKzh7G2-Q0YnoZABzWhGO3zYo] Taugt das was? - Silence [/url])

Ein wunderschönes Point&Click-Adventure, das leider einige Probleme hat. So wirken beispielsweise die eingestreuten Geschicklichkeitsspielchen und Quick Time Events ziemlich überflüssig. Man hat den Eindruck, dass sich die Entwickler hier an erfolgreicheren Adventures von Telltale (The Walking Dead usw.) orientieren wollten, ohne wirklich Ideen zu haben, wie sie solche Spielelemente sinnvoll in Silence integrieren könnten.

Außerdem sind die Rätsel von wechselhafter Qualität. Viele löst man geradezu automatisch, indem man einfach nur alle Hotspots auf dem Bildschirm anklickt, sodass man überhaupt nicht nachzudenken braucht, andere wieder kann man gar nicht durch nachdenken lösen, weil man auf das Eintreten völlig unvorhersehbarer Ereignisse angewiesen ist. An manchen Stellen bin ich zum Beispiel eine Weile festgehangen, weil ich nicht darauf gekommen bin, dass ich den Weg noch einmal ein Stückchen zurückgehen musste, damit etwas passiert. Dass ich nicht darauf gekommen bin, hat wiederum einen Grund, nämlich die vielen Ladezeiten. Bei jedem Wechsel von einem Bildschirm zum anderen bekommt man zunächst einen Ladebildschirm vorgesetzt. Das ist vor allem deshalb nervig, weil man ständig zwischen Bildschirmen hin und her gehen muss, um Rätsel zu lösen, manchmal sogar dreimal hintereinander, was dann sechs Ladebildschirme für ein einziges kleines Rätsel bedeutet. An dieser Stelle dachte ich mir: „Das kann der Entwickler doch nicht ernst meinen! Die Lösung MUSS doch irgendwo auf diesem Bildschirm hier sein!“ Aber falsch gedacht.

Außerdem hat man den Eindruck, dass das Spielprinzip vereinfacht wurde, um es für den Mainstream und die Steuerung auf der Konsole zu optimieren. So wurde zum Beispiel auf das genreübliche Inventar verzichtet. Das finde ich gar nicht mal prinzipiell schlecht, da ich auch auf dem PC gern mit Controller spiele und ich es, ehrlich gesagt, nie so toll fand, in einem Adventure ständig mein ganzes Inventar durchprobieren zu müssen, ob sich irgendwas kombinieren lässt. Aber wenn man schon solche Einschränkungen vornimmt, sollte das Spiel dann auch gut mit Controller funktionieren und das tut es nicht. Man braucht oft einige Anläufe, bis die Figur den Gegenstand anvisiert, den man haben möchte. Das ist vor allem an einer Stelle im Spiel schlimm, an der man ein Tier einfangen muss, das sofort flüchtet, wenn man nicht schnell ist. Nach etwa einem Dutzend vergeblicher Versuche mit dem Controller habe ich an dieser Stelle zur Maus gegriffen und es dann sofort geschafft. Aber das sollte ich nicht tun müssen.

Wieso ich dem Spiel trotz all dieser Mängel noch einen Daumen nach oben gebe? Nun ja, es sieht zunächst mal verdammt gut aus. Die Story ist ebenfalls gut, auch wenn sie vielleicht ein bisschen zu stark auf dem Vorgänger The Whispered World aufbaut, um denjenigen noch zu gefallen, die den ersten Teil nicht gespielt haben. Was mich aber wirklich überzeugt hat, sind sie gut geschriebenen Dialoge und die liebenswerten Charaktere. Vor allem die furchtlose, kleine Renie hat es mir angetan. Für ein paar der Nebencharaktere hätte man sich aber noch mehr Zeit lassen dürfen und auch insgesamt ist das Spiel mit 5 bis 6 Stunden Spielzeit etwas kurz geraten. Aber trotz aller Kritikpunkte muss ich sagen, dass sich der Ausflug nach Silence letztendlich gelohnt hat. Ich hoffe aber sehr, dass es mir der Entwickler beim nächsten Mal nicht mehr so schwer macht, sein Spiel zu mögen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057790522', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1535927285}
review:
[b][i]Silence[/i][/b] to gra o niesamowitym klimacie. Aby całkowicie Cię pochłonął, polecam grać tylko w słuchawkach. Dubbing (grałam z angielskim) jest cudowny, słuchanie głosów postaci sprawiało mi ogromną przyjemność. Prawdę mówiąc był to jeden z głównych powodów włączania przeze mnie [i]Silence[/i]. A bajkowa grafika jest niezmiernie miła dla oka.

Pierwsze chwile w grze były dość trudne. Nie wiedziałam jeszcze jak działa ta gra i zdarzyło mi się raz sprawdzić na internecie jak przejść dalej. Także z początku trzeba mocno główkować, a później odpowiednie rozwiązania przychodzą na myśl automatycznie.

Bardzo spodobało mi się, że twórcy pozwolili graczowi w pewnych sytuacjach wybierać kwestie mówione przez bohaterów lub ich czyny. Uwielbiam gry interaktywne, dlatego jest to dla mnie duży plus.

Muszę również przyznać, że [i]Silence[/i] jest tak niesamowite, że pograłabym w to jeszcze (przeszłam grę w niecałe 7h). Stwierdzam jednak, że mimo to czas gry jest idealny.

Nie potrafię określić grupy graczy, którym bym to poleciła. Na pewno fanom takiej kolorowej, bajkowej grafiki. [i]Silence[/i] jest warty swej ceny. Sprawdźcie.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960318168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 742, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 742, 'last_played': 1535747278}
review:
While I enjoyed playing Silence, I cannot recommend it.

First, the most positive aspect: 
The Story is very good and, as an additional bonus, you get to meet some characters from "The Whispered World". Your sidekick, the caterpillar Spott, is really cute. Through his actions, the game tends to be more funny, but the overall story is rather sad and thought provoking.

Now the huge BUT:
Gameplaywise, Silence is a lackluster Point- & Click-Adventure. There are not that many scenes, with only a few Hotspots. Most puzzles are focused on 1-2 vital points and are derived from these. Sometimes, you have to use the same Hotspot for several occasions. Overall the difficulty is very low.
In addition, there are no real dialogues. You can talk to other characters, but you can't choose what to ask. In some cut-scenes, you can choose one of two answers, but whatever you choose, has no effect on the story. Its just a one-liner.
And now, something that never ever came to my mind when playing a Point- & Click-Adventure, but here it is: The mouse-control is horrible. Many items can be pushed or pulled. For these actions you have to drag your mouse and its not working all the time. These kind of gameplay elements seem to me like a concesion to the console release of this game. With a gamepad it might be fun or at least ok, but with mouse-control it just feels plain wrong.
I have played 2,5 playthroughs to get 100% and still I am at only 12h playtime. Therefore SIlence is not a long game, which is okay if the gameplay would have been more satisfying. There is no real challenge. To stretch the time of the game even further, the cutscences are not skipable. And there are a lot of cutscences..

Overall I can only recommend this game to people who really [b]really[/b] liked "The Whispered World" and have no other Point- & Click-Adventure to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074169975', 'num_games_owned': 820, 'num_reviews': 694, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1536050271}

author: {'steamid': '76561198365737780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1535377270}
review:
周一播了这款游戏：）16自己很喜欢！

[b] 关于这款游戏：[/b]
刚开始，16跟直播间的大家说请耐心看下去，相信它的剧情一定很棒。前期节奏是真的拖沓，因为游戏本身在设计上有点问题，既想要做跟电影一样的观感，又想要玩家在游戏交互上多体验，这方面设计平衡不太ok才会造成节奏拖沓严重。加上游戏在解谜上较死板，并不自由需按照游戏设定固定独一的方式解决。虽都不是什么大问题，但确实是会影响玩家的游戏体验。（当然感受因人而异。针对steam上个别对游戏性的评价，16个人觉得不能单以游戏性来评论这款游戏，并不恰当）
游戏美术超级超级棒！有官中，有中英文配音。角色设计很讲究，游戏中奖励选项可以看到游戏设计的部分原稿。游戏表现很好，就如同看一部艺术电影作品。
绝对是值得看到最后，所以请耐心看下去吧！根据玩家选择不同应该还是影响到结局→最后选择打不打破镜子就是不同的结局。视频录播已经上传拉，审核通过之后就能看拉，错过直播的朋友可以看录播：）

[b] 这里是关于【Silence】的个人感想（延伸/联想）：[/b]

“沉寂世界”这款游戏，试玩的时候妖鹿就想到了不少以前看到的影视作品，很多关于战争的反乌托邦奇幻类，只不过直播当时完全想不起来叫什么。其中印象最深刻的当是“潘神的迷宫”，当然潘神跟Silence是不一样的，不过16之所以会联想到，因为Silence开始就给我的感觉→现实的残酷，孩子逃避到幻想世界自我安慰。

这里16想要简单说说“潘神的迷宫”，先复制来它的官方简介：

      12岁女孩子奥菲丽娅有一个凶暴的法西斯军官继父维达，维达的任务就是镇压反抗者，研究各种刑具来折磨残害被抓来的异见人士，奥菲丽娅每天都目睹让人不愉快的事件。眼看着冷酷的继父和其党羽每日作恶还以此为乐，母亲又身怀六甲患病在床，被孤独感和目睹暴行的痛苦困扰的奥菲丽娅开始沉浸在自己的幻想中聊以自慰。 
　　一天，奥菲丽娅遇到了迷宫的守护者，潘神。潘神告诉她，她其实是奇幻王国失踪的公主，要想恢复身份，必须通过三个危险的考验。都说“潘神的迷宫”不适合孩童观看，讲的是童话，可是剥去童话的外衣，就是一出血腥人间惨剧。
“Silence” 沉寂世界，这款游戏16觉得倒没有那么直白的血腥残酷，相比之下没有那么不适合孩童。我想在它可爱有趣光怪陆离的外表下，也是赤裸裸残酷的现实，不过比起想要表达现实的残酷，“Silence”更多的是想要表达兄妹之间的爱。 当然这两部作品没有可比性，只不过是联想到了而已，都很喜欢，推荐w！

Silence官方并没有给游戏定一个确切年代背景，但些许能看到一点类似的影子（战争方面）。16对这方面历史没有大研究也就不谈w。

“生命” “梦境” “死亡”，三点贯穿游戏。多次隐喻明喻“沉寂世界”其实就是孩子的幻想世界。开头哥哥诺亚讲的故事，后来妹妹芮妮（官中是蕾妮）是合法女王，这些全部都是在告诉玩家，沉寂是一个梦，是孩子逃避现实所创造出来的奇幻世界，在那里你可以拥有和平，可以拥有一切现实里所不能有的东西。 现实的确有时候很残酷（和平年代的我们不懂战争这头猛兽的可怕，也无法想象处于水深火热的人们的伤痛），很多时候弱小的我们无法抗衡，只有无奈和悲伤。逃避或许可以自我疗愈，但是我想那只是一时，除非你会是那个骗自己一辈子的人（哪有那么容易呢233）能够欺骗自己一辈子还能让自己相信那是事实这也不是一般人做得到的哈哈哈哈←扯远（脑袋跳线了233）。

所以所以，记得直播这款游戏到了最后的抉择，16毫不犹豫地选择了打破镜子。虽然无法想象，如果我是芮妮，我还能那么果断的选择回到现实吗，选择接受哥哥已经死亡的事实吗，选择独立面对那个冰冷可怕绝望的世界吗。真的无法想象啊！其实也想不出，总觉得自己挺怂包，会想要躲起来逃避吧呵。

为什么会那么选择？因为就算是沉寂世界里芮妮创造出来的萨德维尔（小丑）也是爱着芮妮的吧，希望她勇敢地去打破城堡里的镜子回到现实！那么勇敢的踏出一步吧！那个世界，疼爱自己的哥哥已经不在，即将面临的又是冰冷，孤独，恐惧，可是哪怕是看不到的未来，也要学着拥抱。

本来直播通关那会觉得还挺悲伤，如果选择留在梦境的世界，那么也许现实里的妹妹会死去，怎么都是避免不了的死亡（你们还记得贯穿游戏的三点吗，生命，梦境，死亡）。写到这里，发现不对啊这理解并不完全，相比较来说，潘神是黑暗童话，沉寂世界是关于爱的故事！

[b] 游戏购买游玩建议：[/b]

Silence（沉寂世界）这款游戏不适合所有人，16很不赞同那些那游戏性说事的评价，什么是游戏性，什么游戏才叫拥有好的游戏性？这个本身就没有一个定论跟标准，人玩游戏，就是按照自己主观喜好判断。这款游戏，16个人觉得它并不是游戏性差，在之前关于游戏部分16已经简单分析本作为什么会给玩家不太佳的游戏体验，就那么简单。游戏节奏是本作的一个缺点，但是不是致命问题。这就是为什么本作好评大大多于差评（当然游戏获奖多，不排除跟风吃瓜）。游戏值得购买吗？值得购买（建议打折入手）绝对不亏！值得体验，按照你的想法大胆的选择吧！喜欢的话不要错过！推荐w！

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
“我喜欢你讲的故事......诺亚...现在我给你讲一个......” 
（最后写到这句结局台词，居然有点泪目，这么一想本作居然是越品越有味的作品啊233，越来越喜欢了肿么办？w）​​​​​

author: {'steamid': '76561198133012049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1535263985}
review:
퍼즐게임 싫어하는데 퍼즐게임인 줄 모르고 스토리 좋다는 글 보고 구매.
그렇게 어렵진 않았지만 헤맬때마다 긴 로딩도 너무 싫었고,  캐릭터들도 너무 매력이 없었다.
그나마 가장 마음에 든 캐릭터가 스팟이었으니 말 다했지 뭐.
그리고 엔딩도 어느쪽이든 취향이 아니라 정가주고 사서 돈 날린 기분이다.
퍼즐 좋아하는 사람들은 몰라도 게임을 구매할 때 스토리에 비중을 두는 사람이면 매우 비추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198283782168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1535295610}
review: Bir çocuğun hayal dünyası(rüyası) ne kadar zengin olabilirse bu oyunda o kadar zengin. Güzel hikaye, muhteşem grafikler, oynaması keyifli, güzel bulmacalar. Syberia ile beraber şimdiye kadar oynadığım macera türünde en iyi grafikli oyunlardan biri. Hikaye sizi oyuna bağlıyor. Oyunun sonu verdiğiniz karara göre değişebiliyor. Ayrıca bütün başarımları elde edebilmek için birden fazla oynamanız gerekiyorki bu tarz oyunlarda her ne olursa olsun hiç sevmediğim birşey.Bu yüzden puanım 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198802297833', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1248, 'last_played': 1535064933}
review:
Квест очень трогательный и интересный. Самые наверное главные плюсы в этом квесте это отличная графика и сюжет. Не буду распиывать много, т..к. для квестов это не нужно. Приятно глазу, увлекает так, что мне было не внапряг пройти еще раз (прям сразу) и конечно интересные диалоги, которые не охото проматывать (даже в голос посмеялся в некоторых местах)!

Оценка 9 из 10. Недостаток у нее есть, это багованые 2 достижения + возможности перемотки или пропуска диалога вообще нет. А для меня это было важно т.к. выбивал потом ачивки и тратил вместе 15 минут, 25 минут!

author: {'steamid': '76561198056737914', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1535058619}
review: This one is hard to judge. I never played the original so I went into this blind. It has a very Jim Hensony feel to it in its weirdness..almost like Dark Crystal or Labrynth. Its a beautiful game though the characters are a bit on the ugly side. My biggest complaint is the dialogue. Without spoiling the MCs especially the guy will say things that contradict something he will say literaly 5 seconds later. LIke "This guy know this" then you find out the guy doesnt know that then he says "Why doesnt the guy know this?" I get there is a plot point for why this might be the case but just some of the dialogue is weird. I am going to recommend this game but only on sale because of the price and how short of a game it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295220631', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1534781282}
review: Tolle und gefühlvolle Geschichte zwischen Traum und Wirklichkeit mit atemberaubend schöner Graphik.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022207400', 'num_games_owned': 945, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1535299357}
review:
Also eine Sache vorab. Ich werde spoilern + ich kann nur eine Kaufempfehlung an die Besitzer von 1 eins geben/ nicht geben.
Ich finde das Spiele ist ohne Vorgänger definitiv nicht zu empfehlen, weil dir zu viele Zusammenhänge fehlen.

Kann ich das Spiel empfehlen?
Jein!
Warum ja: Es ist bildlich einfach nur ein Augenschmaus. Die Welt ist zum verlieben. Die Charaktere sind nett und Sympatisch. An manchen Stellen im Spiel dachte ich mir nur "ach ist das schön. ich wünsche ich wäre gerade dabei".

Warum nein. Die Spielmechanik ist primitiv bis kaum vorhanden. Es hätte als Serie vielleicht gleich gut, wenn nicht besser funktioniert. Die Story macht ohne Vorgänger wenig Sinn. Das Ende ist sehr kritisch zu beachtet. Ich mag nicht, dass in einer Version man den Spiegel zerstört und irgendwie das "schlechte" Ende hat weil Noah tot ist. Wenn man aber den Spiegel repariert (sich dafür entscheidet tot zu sein) überlebt Noah. Sry aber diese Entwicklerentscheidung mag ich nicht.
Außerdem hat man das Spiel viel zu schnell durch. Gerade wo ich dachte "ah jetzt gehts los" --> Ende...
Ich mag außerdem nicht, dass man mit mehr Fragen zurück bleibt als man das Spiel angefangen hat trotz Vorgänger wissen. z.B. wenn wollte Kyra heiraten?

Ich kann das Spiel zu 51% eher empfehlen. Also nur 1% mehr... aber NUR weil ich den Vorgänger so geliebt habe und dieses Spiel im Sale gekauft habe.

Für alle Besitzer des Vorgängers empfehle ich einen Kauf bei ca 5€ bis max 7,50€. Das Spiel ist leider echt nicht mehr Wert. Kein Widerspielwert (die Achievments sind witzlos und eher ermüdend). Die Story ist ok aber zu kurz, Ende ist kontrovers und Nebencharaktere dann doch zu belanglos wenn auch sehr sympatisch.
Die Entwicklung innerhalb der Story hat mir zwar gefallen aber war auch nicht zu schwer zu erahnen. Bis auf das abrupte Ende vielleicht. Das kam echt plötzlich.

Also nochmal in kurz.
Ich empfehle an: Besitzer des Vorgänger + Sale,
Ich empfehle nicht an: Wer sich eine große Story erhofft, knifflige Rätsel sucht

author: {'steamid': '76561198014016938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1534593105}

author: {'steamid': '76561198041832614', 'num_games_owned': 2162, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 1757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1682786022}
review:
A story about two kids hiding in a bunker during a bombardment.
The bunker gets hit by a bomb, and both kids awake in the world of Silence.
Well written and beautiful animated point and click adventure.
Adorable characters, especially Spot, a super-caterpillar that can transform into a bridge among other things.
Fully voiced and no need to play the first part (The Whispered World).
A real masterpiece,  10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198068983474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 423, 'last_played': 1533359040}
review:
You play as two sibblings, Renie and Noah. Exploring the world of silence on a quest to get home. I don't want to spoil the story cause that's what makes the game good but suffice to say - it's pretty dark with some good comic relief. 

I really liked this game even if it has its issues.

Pro:
Great story
Interesting characters
Beautiful
Dark
Music

Con:
Gameplay is kinda slow
Load times (even using SSD drive) ruins the immersion and makes progression a bit frustrating

Other:
The puzzles you need to solve to progress are for the most party pretty good however to some extent they can be frustrating cause they take too long due to gameplay mechanics.
You should install it on an SSD drive or you'll spend as long in loading as playing the game. (My CPU also might have been a bit of a chokepoint - using an i5).

Overall: 7.5/10 the story makes it up for some poor gameplay mechanics and makes the game worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198327495029', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1532633618}
review:
Das Spiel hat mich direkt in den Bann gezogen. Sei es die wunderschöne Szenerie..der passende Soundtrack sowie die Charaktere...Renie und Spot hab ich gleich ins Herz geschlossen :) Die Stimmung find ich sehr emotional...
Leider ist das Spiel doch recht schnell durchgespielt...Und es gibt 2 Enden?! Das Ende ist sehr knapp gehalten ;( obwohl ich gerne gesehen hätte was mit den anderen Charakteren sowie Spot passiert ist....:( die wurden am Ende leider garnicht mehr erwähnt...und schade das es kein Ende gibt an dem Renie und Noah wieder zusammen in der realen Welt erwachen...auch wenn sie die da nichts erwartet außer Kummer und Leid...
Trotzallem hätte ich das Spiel noch ewig spielen können ! zu schade das es nun vorbei ist..aber ich bereu es nicht gespielt zu haben :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198293108292', 'num_games_owned': 307, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1503853126}
review:
Худшее переосмысление игры "The Whispered World". Именно переосмысление, а не сиквел. Почему ЭТО считают хорошей игрой в отличии от остальных игр Daedalic??

Единственное, за что можно похвалить - это в целом дизайн игры.  Задники, да и в целом арт игры очень красивы. Но вот за сюжет и изменения геймплея очень хочется всыпать Daedalic. Особенно мне "понравилось",  как они раскрыли второстепенных персонажей, ладно хотя бы главные... Еще непонятно, зачем переписали сюжет оригинальной игры на новый лад. От этого только добавился не совсем внятный сюжет с повторным концом-твистом. Можете сказать, мол "Это сказочка для детей, что ты придираешься?" но эй, если даже в сказке фигово прописаны поступки и действия персонажей, причем так однобоко, то это не сказка, а плохо написанный сценарий. 
По поводу геймплея не сильно хочется бомбить, т.к. тут спорный момент, но лично мне не понравилось, что инветарь был убран. Также без включения подсказок абсолютно непонятно, как использовать те или иные предметы.

В общем, кратко - если хотите узнать Безмолвный мир, то лучше купите и поиграйте в оригинал, там сюжет намного, НАМНОГО лучше. И персонажей отлично понимаешь, чем в Silence.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041581336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1532555379}

author: {'steamid': '76561198060857661', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1532321603}
review: This game is a sequel to The Whispered World. At no point in time does it tell you its a sequel and you dont miss anything if you haven't played the first game. Personally I didn't like this game, It feels terribly easy for a point and click adventure , even more so since you can press space and it will show you all the interractions on screen and give you a hint on what to do. This generates a conflict between story and gameplay, the story has some mature elements but the gameplay feels aimed at people new to the genre. The best part of the game is the art, The main characters remind me a bit of fable and the backgrounds are nice and have some interesting scenery. After finishing it I went back to the first game and its art is completely different, It uses a more cartoon feel compared to this one. (maybe to differentiate the two parts further?). The game is 6 hours long at max, While I didn't enjoy my time in Silence as much as I thought I would, I can see the appeal for fans of the first game. I recommend getting it on sale unless you REALLY REALLY love the series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093476565', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 998, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 936, 'last_played': 1532121044}
review:
Silence è il seguito di The Whispered World ed è ambientato qualche anno dopo il suo predecessore. Questa volta i protagonisti sono 2: Noah, il protagonista di The Whispered World, e la sua sorellina Renie. La storia comincia nel nostro mondo, dilianiato dalla guerra, e prosegue poi su Silence (il mondo in cui è ambientato anche il primo episodio), dove Noah dovrà ritrovare la sua sorellina ed insieme poi dovranno riuscire a tornare nel nostro mondo. La storia è molto carina, sviluppata bene fino ai 3/4 del gioco, e poi subisce una brusca accelerata, come se si avesse fretta di chiuderla. Ciò nonostante resta una bella storia, pervasa da un alone di malinconia, che personalmente mi è rimasto anche dopo la fine del gioco.

Graficamente si passa dal grafica cartonesca del primo episodio a quella in 2.5D, inizialmente l'idea mi ha fatto un po' storcere il naso, ma quando ci ho giocato invece l'ho trovata molto carina, sia per quanto riguarda i personaggi (soprattutto Renie e Spot), che per gli scenari, alcuni davvero incantevoli. 

Le musiche del gioco ben accompagnano lo svolgimento della storia, alcune sono anche molto rilassanti. Il doppiaggio, purtroppo solo in inglese, mi è sembrato di un livello più che adeguato.

Gli enigmi del gioco sono abbastanza semplici, alla fine si tratta soltanto di trovare l'oggetto giusto per risolvere l'indovinello o di parlare con il personaggio che ci può indirizzare, non ci sono mai oggetti da combinare tra di loro oppure enigmi astrusi che possono bloccare il giocatore. Anche chi è novizio delle avventure grafiche non avrà problemi a completare la storia.

Come longevità del gioco, siamo intorno alle 7-8 ore per una prima run, ma ci vogliono almeno 2 run se si vogliono vedere tutti i finali e prendere tutti gli achievement steam. La seconda run è molto più veloce, in quanto si possono saltare anche tutti i filmati ed i dialoghi che non interessano. 

Sicuramente lo consiglio sia agli appassionati del genere sia a chi piacciono le belle storie, mezzo voto in meno per i finali, tutti mi hanno lasciato l'amaro in bocca.

Voto 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197963751900', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1532323661}

author: {'steamid': '76561198840470540', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1532180356}

review:
Vím, že existují lidé, kteří místo aby hráli, sledují na jutubě jak hrají jiní. Místo aby souložili, tak sledují, jak souloží jiní. A možná za chvíli budou místo jídla sledovat, jak jedí jiní. Osobně to mám jinak - pokud to nedělám osobně, tak mne to nebaví.
A jelikož grafiku hry považuji za druho až třetiřadou, zatímco hratelnost za stěžejní...je mi lítečko milé dítěčko.

Pakliže patříte k první skupině - přeju vám to.
Pakliže k těm jako já, tak opravdu nedoporučuji.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107822003', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 870, 'last_played': 1640774378}
review:
I love this game. I'm really glad that it was in a recent humble bundle - I never heard of it before, which is quite sad; this gem really should be more well-known.

The characters are so [i]real[/i], the faces so expressive, and the voice acting is so good that you can't help falling in love with all of them. The story is beautifully melancholic, if confusing at a few points (I recommend interacting with everything until the texts start repeating to get more of the story).

The game only has two flaws. First, there's a bug that makes one achievement nearly impossible to get (if you care about those, play with a controller instead of keyboard and mouse), and from what I read, Daedalic doesn't seem to care. Second, and far worse, though: It's too short. You get four or five hours with those great people, and then you're done.

I'd really love to see a sequel to Silence.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017723245', 'num_games_owned': 659, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1531246541}
review:
I've played the previous game in the series, and honestly didn't enjoy it too much. 
I saw this game and thought it may improve on the good concepts from the first, but sadly, it was worse.
The game was short, the characters were lacking, and the gameplay felt like I'm being forced to interact with the game just to feel like I'm actually "playing" and it's not just a story all by itself...

I was rather disappointed, but perhaps I was too hyped before playing (by all the good reviews and my hopes for a better installment in the series).

If you really liked the previous game, give it a shot, otherwise, I don't think it's worth your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134977218', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1597391386}
review:
[h1]Кратко[/h1]
Неожиданный и настоящий 3-х часовой шедевр. Анимация, графика и музыка на высоте. Особенно анимация, лучшей детализации лиц и эмоций я ещё не видел. Да, они не поражают фотореалистичностью, но выглядят действительно отлично. Эта игра стоит всех своих денег и даже чуточку больше. Так же в наличии система диалогов, пусть и не слишком витиеватых, но выбор действительно есть, он логичен и приятен.
[h1] Сюжет[/h1]
В центре сюжета-брат и сестра, которые попали под авиаудар и балансируют между жизнью и смертью, находясь в волшебном Безмолвном мире.
Приятная история, отчасти сказка, от части суровый реальный мир, но обе грани очень атмосферны и красивы. Сильный контраст между войной и миром присутствует, хотя войну показывают совсем немного.
Следить за общением героев приятно и интересно. 3 часа проходят быстро, но игра наполнена событиями, так что по ощущениям все 6 пролетело.
[h1]Гумплей[/h1]
Типовой квест в духе возьми что-то и соедини с чем-то. И, не смотря на всю банальшину, игра поражает анимацией, сильным детальным подходом к каждому кусочку. Всё движется, лопается, дрожит и рябит. 
Но главное отличие этой игры, в детальных персонажах и, нетипичной для этого жанра, системой диалогов. Т.е. ваши реплики влияют на решения героев и сюжет. Это выглядит не так, как у других подобных игр, а в своём собственном стиле. 
[u]Итого:[/u]
[b]Плюсы:[/b]
+ Приятная графика и звук
+ Отличный сюжет
+ Система диалогов с отличной реакцией персонажей на реплики
+ Скорее мультфильм чем игра
+ Атмосфера
+ Запоминающиеся и характерные герои
[b]Минусы:[/b]
- В некоторых сценах или анимациях fps блокировался до 30, неожиданно и неприятно
- Внезапно коротка
- Отсутствие озвучки

[i]Быстрая и интересная игра про трудности выбора, самопожертвования и семейные отношения.
10/10[/i]
[spoiler]То самое чувство, когда лгущий персонаж, не лжёт...[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198119970142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1532182684}

동화 같은 이야기에 맞게 그래픽이 신비롭고 아름다웠습니다.

review:
I would give this game a good 8/10. 
The game play was very nice as well as the scenes and music. The ouzzles were mostly easy but a few took longer to crack. The story itself I enjoyed very much and involved many suspensful moments. It's a cute game and fun to play and for 20$ it was worth it. I really enjoy games that feature your choices have the effect on what happens in the game. It was interesting to play and my stream enjoyed it very much!

author: {'steamid': '76561197967283277', 'num_games_owned': 838, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1530216007}
review: Silence is not a bad game. It has some nice parts, like the music and some of the art. But the rest of the game is very meh. The puzzles are Telltale-style simple combinations, neither memorable nor interesting to solve. The story and script is downright bizarre, with major characters appearing, saying very little, then disappearing in short succession and I definitely would not have understood what was going on if I hadn’t have played the prequel (The Whispered World). Both of these games are pretty depressing too - and without any noticeable moral or reason in this game. All in all, I couldn’t really recommend Silence - there are so many better point and click games out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198236200726', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 909, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 882, 'last_played': 1595991537}
review:
This game was a delight to play. The graphics were beautiful and the character voice overs were better than most games I have played. I thought the puzzles were difficult to solve in most cases (it might have just been me) because it took me some time to figure out what to do, but once you do get it, it makes you appreciate the minds of the creators. Very well thought out. 
I also liked being able to go back and forth between characters, so if I was stuck in one place, I could go to the next character and come back to it later.  My only critisizm were the two endings. I felt like they both just ended abruptly. In one case, it would have been nice to have seen the outcome play out. This game took me about 15 hours to finish and I only got 19 out of 46 achievements.  I will probably play it again to try and best that score! Definatly one of the better games I have played this year!

I also wanted to add my graphics card is an on-board Intel 3000 and I had no problems at all even though the recommended minimum for Intel is 5000

author: {'steamid': '76561198378005200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 225, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1529842536}
review:
Nice little game with a pleasant story. Worth a playthrough. Buy it on heavy sale or within a large bundle. Only about 6 hours long, so not worth the $20 price tag.... It has regular references / comments about a "previous game" throughout the dialogue, which is kind of annoying - especially when there is no mention of this "other game" in the Silence description. So not a direct sequel but it's linked to another game. Doesn't ruin the game, but there is a few "what the hells" when a character mentions the past.

Graphics is beautiful and runs fine on Windows 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041801559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 394, 'last_played': 1529516675}
review:
Silence est jeu haut en couleurs ! plein de poésie, de charme et de surnaturel.
On s'attache aux personnages principaux, personnellement Renie et Spot sont mes deux protagonistes préférés.
Les puzzles à résoudre ne sont pas très complexes en soit, il faut bien chercher à l'écran pour trouver les solutions, tout est ludique, abstrait, j'ai véritablement accrochée.
Les graphismes et la musique vous transporte, le scénario vous prend les tripes dès le départ et difficile de décrocher.
J'en redemande !
Prenez le jeu à petit prix entre 2 et 4€ et vous ne serez pas déçu !

author: {'steamid': '76561197998118312', 'num_games_owned': 2100, 'num_reviews': 388, 'playtime_forever': 734, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1529448674}
review:
Rating: 7/10
Overview: Point and Click Adventure

The Good:
+ The scenery looks beautiful and really makes the world of Silence come to life. Easily the highlight of the game
+ The story is well told with interesting characters.  
+ Logical puzzles 
+ Great soundtrack 

The Average:
+/- A very short game, clocking in at around 3-5 hours depending on skill level

+/- This is much easier than most other point and click games, people looking to get into the genre will love this game while others looking for a challenge will feel disappointed. 

+/- This is a sequel to A Whispering World, although you don’t have to play it before hand, it does help a little bit. 

+/- Load times felt a bit too long for me. 

The Bad:
- Cutscenes and most dialogue can not be skipped. 
- glitchy achievements. 

Conclusion:
I really enjoyed my time with the game, but it was hard to ignore some of the more serious flaws presented. Those looking for a nice light-hearted fantasy story will enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075503642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1560098653}
review: Silence вышла хорошей игрой для поклонников небольших, но трогательных и местами весёлых историй. Это путешествие по миру грёз, который умудряется жить сам по себе, а его «хозяин» — лишь шахматная фигура, пусть и не пешка, в развивающихся событиях. Живые и яркие персонажи, приятное совмещение двухмерных фонов и трёхмерных моделей, интересные диалоги и увлекательное повествование — всё это достоинства нового проекта Марко Хюллена. Но не лишён он заметных недостатков, в числе которых отсутствие сложных головоломок, малое количество локаций и недостаток подробностей, которые могли бы сделать «Безмолвный мир» ещё глубже, красивее, увлекательнее и, что самое главное — живее.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122087857', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1529419316}
review:
----我喜欢你讲的故事，诺亚...现在我给你讲一个...

    ----好吧，确实玩了个Bad Ending，不过不后悔过程中的各种选择吧~陆陆续续玩，拖了两个星期才完成的游戏，毕竟中前期真的没有太大吸引力，而且节奏拖拉....本身这种解谜游戏类型的游戏就有其自带的缺点，抛开这些不说，画面、音乐以及剧情还是OK的~蕾妮的中文配音和英文配音都很棒~但是诺亚的我实在无法忍受其中文配音，太脱戏了......

    ----作为库里面的喜加一来说，质量非常不错的了~整体玩的感觉也是渐入佳境的感觉，先是以为是诺亚的发散世界（以为沉寂世界是真是存在的），然后觉得可能只是诺亚的梦（蕾妮可能现实因战争而死亡）....万万没想到竟然是蕾妮的梦...可以说是剧情上的一个成功的转折塑造吧~后期少了很多花时间的互动，感觉剧情一下子就顺了很多，游戏体验一下子就上升了一大截~其实那些解谜元素可以说是新手级别的了，相对我库的其他解谜元素而言，所以完全没有对推进剧情有什么影响

    ----操作7、画面7.5、音乐8（为蕾妮配音加分）、剧情7、解谜元素6......整体游戏7/10吧~打折可以考虑入手一波的

author: {'steamid': '76561198125936296', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1529333511}

review: The game graphics look great. I love how the game is structured to step through the story. However, I found it to be exhaustively slow to progress through the game. It takes way too long to do the simplest of tasks. I made it to the tar pit at the beginning of the game and turned it off. The story seemed really promising but the game takes way too long to progress. I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys taking a LOT of time moving through this games unique pace. Not for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119428162', 'num_games_owned': 645, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 640, 'last_played': 1528491175}
review:
Silence iki kardeşin bir kaos ortasında başlayan hikayelerinin işlendiği, Daedalic Entertainment tarafından geliştirilmiş point & click türünde bir oyun. Yaşadıkları şehirde birden bire başlayan savaş ile kendilerine açılan bambaşka bir dünyanın içinde bulucaklar. Oyun ağırlıklı olarak sanatsal bir tasarımla karşımıza çıkıyor. Müzikleri oldukça iyi tasarlanmış. Buna ek olarak grafiklerde kullanılan renk paleti ve çizimleriyle göze çarpıyor. Hikayede işlenen konu tamamen alt metin halinde işlenmiş.

Oyun türü gereği, pek bir çaba sarfetmeden oturduğumuz yerde sadece mouse kullanarak senaryoyu takip ettiğimiz bir oynanışa sahip. Oynanış yönünden bu türü pek sevmesemde bu oyunu oynamaya davet eden şey Hayao Miyazaki'nin animasyonlarına benzer bir içeriğinin olmasıydı. Bu benzerliğinden dolayı bu türü severler için gayet iyi bir oyun olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Oyunda beni en çok bunaltan kısım karakter dialoglarının ağır çekimdeymiş gibi olmasıydı. Oyunun akıcılığı bu sebeple oldukça yavaştı. Oyun sonu yapacağımız iki seçim oyunun sonunu etkiliyor. Birini seçtikten sonra diğerinde ne olduğunu merak ettiğimde oyunun otomatik kaydettiği bir önceki kısıma dönüp diğer seçeneği deneyebildim. Böylece iki farklı sonuda görmüş oldum. Ortalama 6-7 saatlik bir oynanışa sahip. Oyunu merak edenler için ise satın almadan önce demo sürümünden faydalanabilir.

Oyun Puanı: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198116946070', 'num_games_owned': 695, 'num_reviews': 221, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1529247613}

author: {'steamid': '76561198046881436', 'num_games_owned': 421, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 450, 'last_played': 1529220102}
review:
Silence is a short and bittersweet tale of Renie and her brother, Noah, as they travel the realm of Silence in an effort to save each other, and ultimately the realm itself.

This is a puzzle, point + click adventure game. The puzzles aren't anything too tedious save for the occasional bug which may result in the need to revert to the last checkpoint. The game is presented beautifully with its intricate and highly detailed hand painted art and lovely compositions that set the atmosphere and help to convey the emotions of the game and its environments. 

Save for the main characters, you have a few as an aside, some a cameo from the prequel, others new. These characters aren't fleshed out as well as they could be, but serve their purpose in keeping the story moving. 


Ultimately I think Silence is a good game in its own right. The visuals are absolutely stunning, the sound design is competent if not, avegerage for a Deadalic title, and the gameplay is not so tiring to dissuade one from finishing the game. At roughly 7 hours for the average playthrough it can be comfortably completed with little stress. 
 
The only problems I had is that I believe the game to be hampered down by its own design. The characters, save from Renie and Noah, are hollow and bland. The voice acting is weak and entirely unbelievable and only serves to pull you out of the game. This was my biggest gripe as it's one of the most prominent. It only serves to undermine the potential value of interest you have in these characters as their performances are substantially less than stellar. Unfortunate and quite comical that the bulk of the talent was cast into two talking rocks. 

The sound design as I've experienced with Daedelic games seems to be somewhat muffled, nothing truly sounds crisp and clean, but just a not entirely luster polish. The puzzles aren't rewarding as their challenge mainly comes from experimentation of clickables on the screen, and most/all can be solved with little effort. There's a few reported bugs in the game which served to completely undo some people's experience, and I myself had to revert to a previous checkpoint due to a glitch.

To compliment all of this the game features two possible endings - which were somewhat abrupt - and dialogue choices which only prove to be entirely pointless and serve as an illusion of choice. 

Overall:
Story 7-8/10
Characters 5/10
Gameplay 6/10
Sound 7/10
Visuals 10/10

Recommend picking up on sale, it's still tidy and clean little game, if one can overlook its problems.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016913653', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1528966550}
review:
[h1]A Compact Experience into an Established World.[/h1]

I got Silence in a Humble Bundle. I didn't realize it was the sequel to The Whispered World. While it didn't seem necessary to play the first there were some references to it and you might be more investested in the characters and world if you do play that one first. However, I did not.

[list]
[*]I really liked the hint system. Middle Mouse Button.
[*]The end save game is perfect for allowing you to see multiple endings.
[*]The story is interesting.
[*]The art is fantastic.
[*]The switching between characters is a really good change of pace.
[/list]

Even though, I hadn't played the first game its still possible to get invested in these characters and the story. I never felt like I was struggling with the controls or with what to do next. These are pretty big things for me because it allows for me to get immersed into the game. I have so many games in my backlog this was a perfect glimps into this story without having to play the first one.

[url=https://www.twitch.tv/collections/w_RrzCjxNxX9vw]Get a sneak peak by watching my Twitch play through.[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198076030480', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1528662357}
review:
I wish I could recommand it, because I did enjoy playing it. Sadly, every time I left the game and came back, there were more bugs. At one point in the middle of chapter 2, between a cutscene and another, the game did a  jump forward, leaving me to guess a very big chunk of the story. The reverse also did happen, the game back tracking between loading scene. I was stuck having to do many puzzle I already did with renie and sam while I was way forward in the story with Noah and kyra. 
I guess it's a good game if you aren't as unlucky as me with the bugs.

review:
[i]Silence[/i], the closely related sequel (but not required to play in any order) to [i]The Whispered World[/i] shows off a beautifully illustrated world. A large, fun world is available, waiting to be explored. With a nice touch of humor sprinkled in, this game is worth playing through at least twice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027058501', 'num_games_owned': 1317, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1527984256}
review: This is a very beautiful game, I just loved looking at all the backgrounds and animations and the English voices are pretty decent.  The story however is a little weak, especially compared to the first game which was longer and had more characters to interact and talk with. While I do like the new characters in this game they just aren't featured enough. It feel like there is an act missing from the game and the end is far too abrupt. Overall though this is a pretty good game, especially after playing The Whispered World before it. Now we just need a third game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198200980770', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 450, 'last_played': 1527729678}
review:
Silence te trás aquelas experiências visuais exuberantes e um enredo cheio de mensagens sobre o amor fraternal, companheirismo e o combate contra o mal. Ele é dramatico e infantil, e isso são méritos. A história dos protagonistas é fruto de uma infância sofrível durante uma guerra, onde ao se esconderem em um bunker, uma bomba atinge eles e os deixa em coma. Ambos, se vem no mundo dos sonhos Silence para que participem de uma breve aventura para poderem acordar.

Este point & click é curto, porém ele aborda muito bem as consequencias da coragem, teimosia e crueldade. E cada um dos personagens que aparecem, pode muito bem caracterizar unicamente algumas caracteristicas humanas. O jogo também é muito engraçado e aventuresco. Ele tem puzzles que não são uma dor de cabeça, mas te fazem perder um pouco de tempo de vez em quando. Eu tive sensações de Child of Light em alguns momentos, e isso foi muito prazeroso... E finalmente o final. 

Ambos os finais trazem consequencias que eu gostaria muito de comentar, mas não quero dar spoiler, mas posso dizer que mesmo seus finais felizes, ambos são disfarçadamente chocantes e cruéis. Recomendadissimo. Não é uma obra prima, mas é um jogo muito acertado na sua proposta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198369689010', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 559, 'last_played': 1571852511}
review:
Silence, c'est un monde empli de fantaisie et de poésie, d'une grâce et d'une beauté à couper le souffle...

S'il m'est difficile de décrire les émotions qui m'ont étreinte durant ma première traversée de cet univers en perdition, je peux néanmoins affirmer que les OST qui ont transpercé mon coeur pour en extraire les sentiments les plus purs, les graphismes d'une beauté irréelle, presque fragile et l'histoire poignante n'y sont pas pour rien.

Des personnages riches aux caractères et physiques variés, des puzzles originaux, une histoire d'aventure et de fraternité palpitante, des émotions finement recréées, des graphismes à couper le souffle et une bande-son parfaisant l'ambiance, tous les éléments nécessaires à la confection d'un excellent jeu sont, à ma connaissance et à mon humble avis, réunis par Silence.

La réflexion qu'induit Silence est elle aussi très intéressante. La vie et la mort sont bien entendu au coeur de celle-ci, mais on trouve également quelques pistes sur sa place dans le monde, l'innocence enfantine et les sacrifices qui doivent ou non être faits au nom de la paix et de la liberté.

En somme, Silence est un jeu excellent en tous points. Un guide risque néanmoins de vous être nécessaire (car après tout, Silence reste un point'n'click...).

author: {'steamid': '76561198111040148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1527389243}
review:
Silence ist eins der Spiele die in mir den Wunsch hervorrufen es gebe hier ein Sterne-System. Während der geschichtliche Voränger "The Whispered World" mit stellenweise frustrierend kniffeligen Rätseln auffährt, hat Silence mehr Fokus auf die Story gelegt, die wirklich charmant gestaltet und mit einigen emotionalen Hightlights versehen ist; sowie einem Storytwist auf den es zwar von Anfang an den einen oder anderen Hinweis gibt, der sich aber erst zur Mitte hin klar abzeichnet. Er mag für die Spieler auch durchaus ein wenig irritierend kommen... aber wir wollen ja nicht zu viel verraten. 

Über die meisten Rätsel muss man nicht lange nachdenken, wenn man halbwegs aufmerksam bleibt. Sie sind einfach- für meinen Geschmack ein wenig zu einfach- gestaltet, lassen dem Spieler dafür mehr Raum einfach die Geschichte zu genießen. Eine recht kurze Geschichte. Von Sadwick abgesehen, erfährt man auch nicht allzu viel über die verschiedenen Charaktere- und hier empfehle ich das man den Vorgänger gespielt hat, um die Parallelen zu ziehen. Doch auch wenn man ihn nicht spielt, versteht man zumindest um was es geht und das einer der beiden Protagonisten Noah alias Sadwick durchaus mit Silence vertraut zu sein scheint. - Ein wenig als würde Alice ins Wunderland zurückkehren. Was ich auch befürworte ist die Aussage des Spiels und das man am Ende wirklich eine Entscheidung hat- nicht wie bei dem Voränger, wo diese einfach  nicht gegeben ist.

Wie gesagt: Geschichte und auch die Grafik sind charmant und die beiden Hauptcharaktere- vor allem zusammen- sind liebevoll gestaltet. Schade ist nur das Sadwick gelegentlich in sein Verhalten aus "The Whispered World" zurückfällt. 

Was WIRKLICH ein Ärgernis ist: Es kann passieren dass das Spiel abstürzt und es zu Speicherfehlern kommt. Hier rate ich eine Suche im Internet. Es gibt auf der Daedelic-Seite zu dem Spiel Speicherstände zum runterladen, damit man nicht von vorne anfangen muss. 

[b]Fazit:[/b]
Pro: 
[list][*]Schöne, charmante Geschichte. 
[*]Keine Frustration beim Lösen der Rätsel. 
[*]Entscheidung am Ende
[*]Schöne Grafik[/list]

Contra:
[list][*]Gelegentliche Speicherprobleme und Abstürze
[*]Zu leichte Rätsel
[*]Die Story zu kurz[/list] 

[u]Tipp:[/u] 20 Euro für das Spiel sind meines Erachtens zu viel, kauft es euch im Angebot. Dann ist es das Geld definitiv wert. 

Spoiler:
Es betrifft das Ende der Geschichte. Eins der beiden Enden hat noch ein kleines Sequel nach dem Abspann, das gar nicht so unwichtig ist.
Dafür ist das Andere leicht misszuinterpretieren, da der Hinweis, dass der Schein nur trügt gern mal übersehen wird (vorsicht großer Spoiler!):
[spoiler]Wenn ihr euch dafür entscheidet den Spiegel zu zerschlagen scheint es so als wäre Noah tot und Renie nun alleine. Nachdem die Hand jedoch von ihm zu Boden fällt und Renie über seinen leblos wirkenden Körper weint, zuckt die Hand kurz auf. Achtet darauf. Das könnte zart Besaiteten vielleicht ein wenig Hoffnung geben. ;)[/spoiler]

Es lohnt sich also beide Enden mal gesehen zu haben. Und es könnte ein Versprechen auf einen dritten Teil sein: Yeah!

author: {'steamid': '76561198055301588', 'num_games_owned': 1098, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 687, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 687, 'last_played': 1526756345}
review:
[h1]Silence ▸ Brève[/h1]

[b]Version vidéo accessible ici : [/b] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWwDDQ-TKLs

Globalement, Silence n’est pas du tout mauvais, il est super joli, il offre une histoire assez imprévisible, enfin sauf la fin qui, elle, se sent à des kilomètres une fois qu’on a compris un peu le schmilblick. Par contre, en ce qui concerne les étapes intermédiaires, ben ça a été. ça s’est bien enchaîné sans être trop prévisible. Donc rien que pour ça, je trouve que c’est un bon point. Alors ça n’en fait pas le jeu narratif suprême, surtout que c’est très subjectif de ma part mais voilà. 

Hm par contre je l’aurais clairement pas acheté à 20€. J’avais déjà joué à la démo qui était sortie en 2016 et très clairement, j’avais bien aimé. Mais je l’aurais pas acheté à ce prix-là. Même si oui les graphismes et l’histoire sont particulièrement agréables, ben ça fait cher pour 6h de jeu. Basiquement si tu compares ça à un livre, on va dire que pour 13-15€ ça devient ok. 

Mécaniquement, ben c’est un point & click, donc tu pointes et tu cliques avec ta souris pour faire telle ou telle action. De toute manière on le sait très bien, un point & click se base surtout sur une trame narrative et des puzzles que tu peux résoudre, etc… Tu peux pas vraiment innover là dedans, je veux dire t’as juste un personnage que tu promènes en cliquant un peu partout sur les trucs en surbri… Ah pardon on me dit dans l’oreillette qu’il y a une petite innovation dans Silence, Spot ! En jouant à Silence, vous aurez l’occasion de contrôler 3 personnages en gros, Renie, Noa/Sadwick et Spot. Basiquement Renie et Noa sont des humains somme toute normaux et ont des capacités somme toute normales&. Par contre Spot est intéressant parce qu’il offre une dynamique de puzzle assez différente. Cela dit, on ne peut pas considérer cela comme une véritable innovation non plus, c’est juste un personnage avec des capacités différentes. Mais c’est intéressant tout de même. 

En parlant des puzzles, hm je les ai trouvé ni simple ni compliqué. Pour moi c’était un entre deux. Avec parfois des passages où je bloquais un peu, et parfois des passages où ça passait tout seul.

Qu’on se le dise, les deux seules choses qui m’ont gêné dans Silence, c’est le fait que tu ais des saves par checkpoint,  du coup tu peux pas quitter quand tu bloques sur un puzzle. Enfin si mais tu vas recommencer au checkpoint. C’est pour ça que j’ai 11h de jeu sur Silence, j’ai laissé mon jeu allumé pour pas perdre l’endroit où j’étais. L’autre point, c’est cette lenteur peut être un peu trop lente ainsi que le fait qu’on puisse pas “accélérer” une action ou des dialogues qu’on a déjà vus.

Je recommande Silence mais seulement à ceux qui apprécient la lenteur des Point & click, parce que pour le coup, il est un peu plus lent que la moyenne. Je n’ai pas parlé de la bande son, mais je vous laisse l’apprécier en jeu, elle est très bien accordé avec celui-ci.

[quote]Vous pouvez suivre la page curateur ici : [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28282773/]Sacrez'Art[/url].[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198184395153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 280, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1526815534}
review:
プレイ時間 5.1h
Chapter 2.8でギブアップ。Chaper 4.2で終わりらしい。
[h1]良い所[/h1]
[list]
[*]絵柄が朗らかで癒やされる。
[/list]

[h1]悪い所[/h1]
[list]
[*]ロードの回数と時間が長い。SSDでプレイしているのにロード時間が長く感じる。
[*]クリックアンドポイントでクリックする場所などがあまり論理的ではなく総当たりになる。
[*]Chapterをクリアするのに隣の面に何回も移動する必要がある。
[*]面の移動をするのに短くないロードが発生する。
[*]セーブがChapter単位でしか出来ない。
[*]ムービーシーンをキャンセルできず同じムービーを何回も見ることになる。
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198038623950', 'num_games_owned': 646, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1526678270}
review:
Excellent follow up to "Whispered World", just a little bit shorter than I had hoped. The story and the characters were endearing. The graphics great and no glitches/bugs that I could find.

The ending broke my heart, but I guess I was half expecting it. The guys at Daedelic really know how to write stories that touch the heart.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090566114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1526808901}
review:
看封面就想买的游戏，画风很合胃口。游玩之后音乐、配音都非常棒。

缺点是游戏性不足，解密太简单。有很多解密故意做成需要切换场景，而换场景恰恰慢得一批，这无法掩盖剧情很短的事实。此外，过场动画比较长而且不能跳过，每次读档都得等好久。游戏里有些和场景互动的动作很慢同样不能跳过，能把人急死。游戏设计了很多隐藏在细节中的成就，但碍于过慢的节奏我实在没有耐心读档或者多周目完成成就。与其说是游戏不如当成3d短片来看了，我这个好评其实是给萌萌的萝莉的。

二周目通关后的感想：[spoiler]这个游戏特么有毒吧！明明是小清新的外表就没有一个兄妹的good ending吗？我选现实世界哥哥死；我特么选silence之后尼玛哥哥又睁眼了，这就是让我们兄妹天人永隔咯！[/spoiler]

有中文配音值得赞赏！当然配音质量问题可以参考其他评测～

author: {'steamid': '76561198075249177', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 922, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 699, 'last_played': 1528128235}
review: Потрясающая игра! Графика нормальная, пойдёт, зато там прекрасная музыка, главные персонажи, Ноа и Рени очень хорошо придуманы, мне нравится и их образ и характеры, я не могу просто оторваться. Но эта игра на любителя, если хотите расслабиться, порешать головоломки, немного посмеяться (милый юмор). В общем, игра мне очень понравилась, я не пожалела, что купила.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046951138', 'num_games_owned': 1953, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1526214929}
review:
엔딩까지 6시간 동안 몰입하면서 했다. 미술적인 면에서는 꽤 높은 점수을 줄만했고 영화 판의 미로가 연상되는 스토리에도 좋은 점수를 주고 싶다 케릭터는 귀여운데 이야기의 특색 자체는 잔혹하달까. 삶과 죽음의 경계에서 결정을 내려야하는 아이의 운명이 가혹하다 

단점이라면 납득할 수 없을 정도로 긴 로딩과 (최면도 아니고 로딩 촛불보다가 잠드는 줄;;) 리니와 스팟은 캐릭터에 매력을 잘 불어넣었지만 나머지 캐릭터들은 매력이 처음부터 끝까지 오래 유지되지 않는다 특히 카이리(?)라는 캐릭터는 욕 나오는 행동을(아 그게 매력인가;;)

이야기의 흡입력과 이쁜 그래픽이 맘에 든 다면 구매를 추천합니다

author: {'steamid': '76561198082837044', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1346, 'last_played': 1524448761}
review:
I spent $6 on this game getting it on sale and for the price of $6 it was a delightful adventure. 

If you are a fan of point and click adventure this games, this is a good one. The animation is colorful and fun. It's a great fantasy setting. This felt like watching a long movie. The puzzles were easy to solve and continue through. In general this is a good game.

My gut reaction unfortunately was to say no I do not recommend this game. Some of the voice acting was down right off, there was very little, if any, character development, some of the details of the game like the menus did not seem to fit in with the rest of the game, and it just generally lacked the polish of a finished game. My biggest grievance though is that it was just too short. Don't look at my play time, I left it running over night. This game is about a 10 hour game. Just as the plot picks up and the puzzles are hitting their stride and I felt like I was "getting into it" the game was over. I was not expecting a crazy long blockbuster or anything but I was definitely let down.

To go back to my first point though, I only spent $6 on this game. For $6 it was great and that's why I gave it a thumbs up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027994280', 'num_games_owned': 510, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1525282397}
review:
Silence is a fun, but short adventure. If you are looking for a casual, slightly easy point-and-click adventure this is definitely a fun game for you.

[h1]Pro's[/h1]
[list]
[*]Great looking fantasy world, with fully 3d animated characters 
[*]Sound/music is okay, though not memorable
[*]Throughout the game there is a small companion that allows for some interesting problem solving
[*]More than just pointing and clicking - for example to move some objects you have to hold and drag, sometimes you need to balance by keeping your mouse steady, et cetera

[/list]
[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
[*]The story felt confusing. It started with characters talking about people you've never seen in a way that assumes you already know them, and then you end up in a world which is apparently familiar to the main characters even though you've never seen it. I felt like I was playing Silence 2 and had to have played part 1 to understand some stuff.
[*]There are barely any puzzles in the game, and the ones that there are are short, very easy and not memorable. It felt like some of them were placed as an afterthought rather than being part of the game. 
[*]You don't have any inventory, and in regards to interactions with NPC's there is only the occasional dialogue choice. There is barely any experimenting required to continue forwards as there are simply too few options and objects to interact with to begin with. 
[*]The cast of characters that you interact with are very shallow. One of them is being mentioned all the time and seems to have quite some importance, but is actually on screen for 1 small section of the game (literally 1 screen), never to be seen again. For those that have already played, I'm talking about [spoiler]the prophet[/spoiler].
[*]The voice of Renie (one of the main characters) is absolutely horrible. It annoyed me throughout the game and because of her voice I considered quitting so many times 
[/list]

If you are looking for a fun point-and-click adventure to play on the weekend, Silence could fill that gap for you!

[i]Was this review useful to you? [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/26849460/][u]Subscribe to the Izzy Reviews Curator page[/u][/url] for regular reviews for other games![/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198097520769', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1525862886}
review:
Since you are playing in an "imaginary world", where the story is based on a child, I already expected the game to be lovley.
But this game took it to a new level, not so much the interaction between characters is the best thing, but more the interaction in puzzles(Hint: they got a hint if you don't get on) so you are neither stuck in a zone for too long.
Puzzels, interactions, graphics, music, level design and much more, makes this game one of the best (non fighting)story games, I ever played.
The only thing I could have wished more is that the character dialog got more influence in the story(the story seems to be quite static)
9/10
Note: I bearly read books.This game is close to a book(but better;) )

author: {'steamid': '76561198067808396', 'num_games_owned': 560, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1525691442}
review:
优点
1.画面氛围好，过场动画不尴尬，妹妹的原画和建模满分，背景层次和细节都做的很到位，色彩很瑰丽但是运用刚刚好，不会有压过人物的感觉
2.剧情内容丰富，解谜不是很重度，玩起来比较轻松
3.互动成分多，人物对话丰富，寂静世界塑造得很精致，给玩家是一个立体完整的形象，而不是一张纸的感觉
4.操作角色不断变换，不同角色对同一个物体有完全不同的互动，对于玩惯了第一人称的解谜玩家来说确实很新奇
5.语言支持很完善，字幕和语音齐全，可以分别设置，推荐中文字幕英文语音，中文语音的断句有一种电脑合成的感觉

缺点
1.游戏节奏不好，时快时慢，有的时候无聊得真的想跳过，然而动画、对话和互动都不能跳过
2.背景交代不全，没玩过前作会很难理解
3.除非有意识的去刷，不然成就很难拿到，无聊且繁琐
4.手柄支持识别迟钝，开启手柄选项经常点不了，用steam大屏幕模式才能解决

author: {'steamid': '76561198021312876', 'num_games_owned': 1076, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1525336187}
review:
Silence - The Whispered World 2.0 

Квест созданный и выпущенный Daedalic Entertainment 15 ноября 2016 года. 
По сути игра является прямым продолжением The Whispered World. В главных ролях всё те же лица. Грустного клоуна заменил 16 летний подросток. Такой же не уклюжий и никчёмный нытик. Гусеница ( главный инструмент решения практически всех головоломок в игре ) Стала в разы симпатичнее. Ну и маленькая сестрёнка вокруг которой завязан весь сюжет. Увеличилось количество побочных персонажей. На редкость хорошо прописанных. Появились осязаемые враги. В целом сюжет стал более комплексный и интересный. 

Геймплей: Мир в Silence стал более интерактивный, появились аркадные элементы, экшен сцены в которых возможно даже умереть и добавилась иллюзия выбора. Выбор в диалогах и некоторых сценах в игре из 2 действий. По ходу прохождения она естественно практически ни на что не влияет. А настоящий выбор, влияющий на сюжет, появляется только в конце игры. Загадки стали в разы проще, но при этом логичнее. Хотя это скорее идёт проекту в минус. Сама игра в 2 раза короче оригинала. Проходится за 4-5 часов. Можно даже быстрее. 

Итог: Хорошо нарисованная сказка с достойным сюжетом. Как квест игра простенькая но и возрастное ограничение у данного проекта соответствующее 13+. По этому жаловаться на сложность и тд было бы странно. 
7.5/10 

P.S: Для людей кричащих о воздействии наркотиков на детей во время прохождения игры и о том что данные проект нельзя не вкоем случае давать своему ребёнку. Хотелось бы пояснить. Игра имеет возрастное ограничение Teen "подросток" контент обычно подходит для детей от 13 лет. Может содержать насилие, наводящие на размышления темы ( это как раз о наркотическом воздействие ) грубый юмор, минимальное кровопролитие, имитацию азартных игр и минимальную ненормативную лексику.

author: {'steamid': '76561198304018601', 'num_games_owned': 1279, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1521564833}
review:
一部迷って停滞した時間を差し引くと6時間ほどでクリア。
現代世界のまさに戦闘中の場所から防空シェルターに命からがら飛び込んだ兄妹が、爆撃の衝撃とともにファンタジーな世界『サイレンス』に行く話。

ゲーム内容は画面のポイントをクリックしてキャラを移動させたり、仕掛けを解いたりするアドベンチャーゲーム。
やっていることはVioletと同じだが、こちらの方が数段上を行く内容にはなっている。
キャラデザインはどこかネズミ―的な雰囲気を漂わせ、デフォルメが利いたキャラたちは個性があって楽しいし、どこか童話的。
　難易度が高いというのは少し違うが、舞台がファンタジーな分仕掛けの解放が思いつきづらい部分があり、進展なくウロウロする時間が発生する可能性はある。

ネタバレになるのでストーリーには触れないが、中盤から終盤に行くにつれどこか物悲しく、後ろ髪を引く部類の余韻があるゲームと言えると思うのでそういうテーマ性があることには注意されたし。

とりあえず妹ちゃんはかわいい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198048736494', 'num_games_owned': 1257, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 588, 'last_played': 1525037733}
review: Очень добротная сказка, пусть и с предсказуемым сюжетом, но при этом очень интересно преподнесённым. Сценарист видимо хороший герыч ябошил, собственно как и художник, так как визуально игра выглядит потрясающе. Даже с учётом того что я не люблю квесты, с удовольствием потратил время. После первого прохождения, возвращаться на второй круг уже не тянет, поскольку никаких разветвлений в сюжете нет. Кульминацией этой истории, является выбор концовки. Никакой интриги данный выбор не несёт, так как перед ним происходит автоматическое сохранение и можно смело загрузиться и выбрать другой вариант.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074845294', 'num_games_owned': 1302, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1524948482}
review:
I really enjoyed this. but don't be fooled, it's not that much of a "game" really. you click here and there from time to time, but that doesn't matter you won't enjoy it. I relaxed for three evenings after work and loved every minute of Silence.
It looks great, it has a fine adventure story, likeable characters, nice music. and it all feels like a sunday afternoon cartoon in the best meaning of it. I really love it. sometimes the loading times are annoyingly long, but not like you have time to make yourself a coffee. it just draws you back from the story a little bit at times, but overall I love this.
buy it on sale and play it when you feel like playing, but more for the story and relax than for action packed experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198348136663', 'num_games_owned': 856, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1524845044}
review:
一个来自德国的游戏，说真的难度不是特别大，不过有一两关确实过不去，查了一下居然还没有中文的解谜，只好硬着头皮看德语的。。。说实话开始的时候确实需要点耐心，但是玩到后面发现还是很有意思的。

然而结局的悲伤真的让我措不及防。。

游戏感觉有好几种结局，目前只玩到第一个，前面一直很欢乐的怎么到最后一下子就悲伤起来了？很有深意嗯。

以下有剧透  ;）
















这其实就是个悲伤的故事。

兄妹一开始被炸弹轰炸，两人双双进入精神世界，应该是现实中已经濒死了。

然后一开始哥哥以为自己是主角，可是他想错了，不过因为他之前打碎过镜子，所以已经算活过一次了。

结果这次并不是他，而是他的妹妹。

只有让妹妹打碎镜子，才能让她醒来（游戏中反复提及）。感觉哥哥让妹妹说自己是萨德维克的时候表情特别凝重，也许他知道这次他已经醒不过来了吧。

可他不愿意让她活在一个虚构而美好的世界。外面的世界，虽然残酷，但毕竟那才是真实。

可惜最后我选择打破了镜子，虽然很痛苦。但哥哥应该也想让妹妹醒过来吧。真的真的很悲伤。

总结以下：
我们要反对战争！！Der Krieg beeinträchtigt unser Wohlbefinden.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062771675', 'num_games_owned': 406, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1524817621}
review:
I was lured into buying this game on visuals alone, I'm a real sucker for style over substance kinda media, but I am more than happy to say Silence has [i] both [/i] style and substance to bring to the table. A rare feat for any kind of interactive media. Whats more this title's 2016 release saw itself stacked up against its main competition's weakest year. As prolific a studio and talented a development staff that is Telltale Games its 2016 lineup stand as an example of a formula getting stale, between Minecraft: Story Mode and The Walking Dead: Michonne, 2016 was a real groaner year for mainstream point and click adventure fair. So for this game as stylish and imaginative as it is to fly under my radar is a crying shame, but I am damn happy to have played it finally.

From what I've gathered via context clues from dialogue and world-building throughout the story, this [i] IS [/i] a sequel to another game, one which I have bought but have yet to play. At first, once I learned of this I thought I would be left behind as the story ran far ahead of me leaving me clueless as to what was going on. But the way things get explained and how the story is told I was almost always on the same page in regards to where the story was at and what the stakes were. If something confused me it was very adequately explained in that or the next scene. I imagine this is because the cast is made of largely new faces, and our main heroine is a newcomer to everything with only secondhand at best knowledge of the world, so she always has questions about the goings-on. This allows for very naturalistic ways in which characters can exposit plot points or describe nuances to her and avoid the common pitfall of awkward exposition dumps. Gameplay is pretty typical of a point and click title with a few wrinkles added in, like one where you must pull the mouse in a direction to make the player feel like the character is struggling to do something. It has some puzzles but none of them are outright difficult, only mild brain teasers that will only need a short amount of time to figure out. I think it's for the best that the game is light on puzzles, as Silence's strengths lie in its visuals and story.

If I had one criticism though, it would have to be about the voice acting. I played the English Dub in which I found a few things to be off. Particularly, the timing of lines sometimes came too soon, where one character may have a had a witty retort but the audio plays as the other character is still talking. I also felt some of the delivery of lines were a little mediocre, calling out voice acting is something I don't normally do as I respect it as an art form and I won't outright call any of the performances bad, just some lines are delivered awkwardly or are not given enough emotion or urgency. that could easily be down to direction but its little things like a character saying something normally when their body language would suggest otherwise. Mostly just a nitpick, honestly.

By rights, this game should have shown up in the top sellers section on steam for me to have seen it when it released (maybe it did, might've just missed it). But you can fix that! You should totally buy Silence now!
